anya-e0301n0:820_17: samattā samādinnāti evaṃ āciṇṇaduccaritassapi ekaccassa āsannena kalyāṇa kammena
anya-e0301n0:820_18: saggagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā pubbevāssataṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:820_19: Micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnāti evaṃ āciṇṇa sucaritassapi ekaccassa āsannena pāpakammena
anya-e0301n0:820_20: apāyagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmāca ubhinnaṃpi balavabhāve sati āsannameva pariyattaṃ bhavituṃ
anya-e0301n0:820_21: arahati. Tasmā idha therena āsannameva pathamaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthaca pubbevāssakataṃ
anya-e0301n0:820_22: hotīti idaṃ āsannānussaritakammavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tambadāṭhikanāmassa coraghātakassa
anya-e0301n0:822: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ jaraggavopamaṃ dassetvā āsannameva pathamaṃ vipākaṃ detīti ekaṃsena vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:823: Na hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ evaṃ ekaṃsena vuttaṃ. Naca uṭṭhātuṃpi asakkonto so jaraggavo pajadvārassa āsanne ṭhitopi pathamataraṃ nikkhamissatīti. [Garukacatukkaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:824: 147. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo. Veditabbaṃ anu bhavitabbanti vedanīyaṃ. Phalaṃ. Diṭṭhadhamme vedanīyaṃ phalaṃ etassāti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:826: “Diṭṭhadhamme veditabbaṃ vipākānubhavana vasenāti diṭṭhadhammavedanīya”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:827_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha hi vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti
anya-e0301n0:827_1: etena idha vedanīyasaddo kammasādhano vipākātidheyyoca hotīti dasseti. Evañca sati
anya-e0301n0:827_2: idha aññapadatthasamāso eva labbhati. Na uttarapadatthasamāsoti. Diṭṭhadhammaṃ upecca
anya-e0301n0:827_3: tassa anantare pajjitvā pāpuṇitvā veditabbaṃ phalaṃ etassāti upapajjavedanīyaṃ. Teneva
anya-e0301n0:827_4: hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upapajja saddassa atthaṃ vadantena upapajjitvāti vuttaṃ. Suttapadesu
anya-e0301n0:827_5: pana upapajjevāti pāṭho diṭṭho. Tasmā diṭṭhadhammassa samīpe anantare pajjitabbo
anya-e0301n0:827_6: gantabboti upapajjo. Dutīyo attabhāvo upapajjeveditabbaṃ phalaṃ etassāti upapajjavedanīyanti
anya-e0301n0:827_7: evamattho pāṭhassa vasena veditabbo. Upapajjātivā anantare bhave pavatto eko nipāto. Yathā paccāti.
anya-e0301n0:829: “Diṭṭhadhammato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbanti upavajjavedanīya”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:830_0: Upapajjavā vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Pariyāyati punappunaṃ āgacchatīti
anya-e0301n0:830_1: pariyāyo. Aparoca so pariyā yocāti aparapariyāyo. Diṭṭhadhammā nāgatā nantara bhavehi
anya-e0301n0:830_2: añño atta bhāva parivatto. Te neva hi mahāṭīkāyaṃ aṅgutta raṭīkāyañca aparapariyāyeti
anya-e0301n0:830_4: Suttapadesu pana aparevā pariyāyetica aparāparevā pariyāyetica dvidhā pāṭho diṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:830_5: Tattha pacchimasmiṃ pāṭhesati idha majjhe ekassa aparasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. Saṅgahapoṭṭhakesu
anya-e0301n0:830_6: pana majjhe dīgho yākāranaṭṭhoca aparāpariyasaddo dissati. So bahūsu aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0301n0:832: “Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariya vedanīya”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhadhammatoti idaṃ tāva nayujjati.
anya-e0301n0:833: Na hi majjhe upapajjabhavaṃ vajjetvā pathamo diṭṭhadhammova idha tatīye pade adhikatoti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:834: [149] Atthato pana byañjanatoca sabbaṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:835_0: Aparevā pariyāye vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Aparāparevā pariyāyetivā.
anya-e0301n0:835_1: Ahosināmakaṃ kammaṃ ahosikammaṃ. Ahosikammaṃ. Bhavissatikammaṃ. Atthikammaṃ. Natassa
anya-e0301n0:835_2: vipākoti evaṃ vuttapāṭhavasena ācariyehi tathāgahitanāma dheyyaṃ sabbaso aladdhavipākavāraṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_3: kammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha sattasu kusalākusalajavanesu pathamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammave
anya-e0301n0:835_4: danīyaṃnāma. Sā hi aladdhāsevanatāya sabbadubbalattā aciraṭṭhi tikāca hoti appataravipākācāti.
anya-e0301n0:835_5: Paccayaṃ laddhā diṭṭhadhammeeva ahetukamattaṃ phalaṃ datvā vigacchati. Na ekaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:835_6: maraṇakālaṃ atikkamma santānaṃ anubandhituṃ sakkoti. Paccayaṃ pana alabhamānā ahosikaṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:835_7: hoti. Paccayotica attano phaluppattiyā okāsadāyako nānā iriyāpathesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇasamā
anya-e0301n0:835_8: gamādiko yokoci paccayopi yujjatiyeva. Ṭīkāsu pana paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāyātiādinā
anya-e0301n0:835_9: mahantaṃ katvā paccayo vutto. So kākavaliyādīnaṃ viya pākaṭataraphaladānaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:835_10: vuttoti veditabbo. Na hi kammapathajavanasantāne pavattamānā itarāpivā pathamajavanacetanā
anya-e0301n0:835_11: iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamāyogavasenapi laddha paccayā kāci attano balānurūpaṃ phalaṃ na detīti
anya-e0301n0:835_12: atthi. Nacatāya diyyamānaṃ sabbaṃpi phalaṃ mahājanassavā kammakārakasseva vāpākaṭameva
anya-e0301n0:835_13: siyāti sakkā vattunti. Yaṃ pana ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭha kathāyaṃ ekaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_14: vipākaṃ deti. Sesāni avipākānīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ aladdhapaccayāni sesāni sandhāya vuttanti
anya-e0301n0:835_15: gahetabbaṃ. Na hi eko diṭṭhadhammo ekasseva diṭṭhadhammavedanī yassa okāsoti sakkā
anya-e0301n0:835_16: viññātunti. Atthasādhikā pana sanniṭṭhāpakabhūtā satthamajavanacetanā upapajja vedanīyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:835_17: Sā hi laddhāsevanatāya thokaṃ sārabhūtā hotīti pathamacetanā viya sīghataraṃ vipaccituṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_18: nasakkoti. Balavatīca hotīti ekaṃ bhavaṃ janetuṃ sakkoti. Patita java nesu pana antimajavanatāya
anya-e0301n0:835_19: majjhimacetanāyo viya ciraṭṭhitikā na hotīti paccayaṃ laddhā anantare eva bhave paṭisandhiṃvā
anya-e0301n0:835_20: pavatti phalamevavā datvā vigacchati. Aladdhā pana ahosikammameva hoti. Na dutīyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_21: maraṇakālaṃ atikkamituṃ sakkoti. Yaṃpana ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ekaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_22: paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Sesāni avipākānīti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi paṭisandhivipākaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:835_23: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Sesānipi hi yāva dutīyacuti nāgacchati. Tāva laddhapaccayāni
anya-e0301n0:835_24: pavatti vipākaṃ dentiyeva. Idha missaka kammāni katvā anantarabhave missakakammaphalaṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_25: anubhontāni vemānika petavatthūni aññānica taṃtaṃkammaṃ katvā anantarabhave eva sugati
anya-e0301n0:835_26: yaṃ kabbipākabhūtaṃ vipattiṃ anubhavantāni duggatiyaṃvā tabbipākabhūtaṃ sampattiṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_27: anubhavantāni anekāni vatthusatāni ettha kathe tabbānīti.
anya-e0301n0:837: “Sāca paṭisandhiṃ datvāva pavattivipākaṃ deti. Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:840: “Cuti anantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa okāso”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:843: “Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti vuttaṃ”. Taṃpi na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:844_1: aparapariyāya vedanīyanti tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthi. Yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:844_2: Na cettha paṭisandhivasena evaṃ vuttanti sakkā vattuṃ. Tadatthasādhakassa aṭṭhakathāpadesassavā
anya-e0301n0:844_3: vatthussavā yuttiyāvā abhāvatoti. Majjhe pana pañcajavana cetanā aparapariyāya vedanīyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:844_4: Etā hi suṭṭhu balavantī sārabhūtāca hontīti na sīghaṃ vipaccituṃ sakkonti. Ciraṭṭhitikā
anya-e0301n0:844_5: pana honti. Tasmā tatīyabhavato paṭṭhāya yadā okāsaṃ labhanti. Tadā pañcavāre paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0301n0:844_6: datvā saṃsārapavattiyā sati kappasatasahassepi pavattivipākaṃ dentīti. Imāniyeva
anya-e0301n0:844_7: pana tīṇi kammāni attano attano khette sabbaso vipākavāraṃ alabhamānāni ahosikammaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:844_8: Khettañca nesaṃ pathamassa diṭṭha dhammacutiyā paricchinnaṃ. Dutīyassa anāgatānantarabhavacutiyā.
anya-e0301n0:845_0: 148. Pākaṭṭhānavasenāti apāyādikassa vipaccanaṭṭhānassa vasena tathā cattāri kammānināma
anya-e0301n0:845_1: hontīti yojanā. Tatthāti tesu akusalādīsu catūsu kammesu. Kammadvāravasenāti kammasiddhiyā
anya-e0301n0:845_2: aṅgabhūtānaṃ kāyādi kammadvārānaṃ vasena. Pāṇaṃ atipātenti etenāti pāṇātipāto. Atipātanañcettha
anya-e0301n0:845_3: sarasato patituṃ adatvā antarāeva payogabalena pātanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adinnaṃ ādiyanti
anya-e0301n0:845_4: etenāti adinnādānaṃ. Agamanī yavatthusaṅkhātesu vatthukāmesu micchā caranti etenāti
anya-e0301n0:845_5: kāmesumicchācāro. Tattha parapāṇe pāṇasaññino tassa jīvitindriyasantānupacchedakassa
anya-e0301n0:845_6: kāyavacīpayogassa samuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipātonāma. Sayameva attano jīvitindriyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:845_7: pātentassa pāṇātipātonāma natthi. Parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tato viyogakāraṇassa
anya-e0301n0:845_8: kāya vacīpayogassa samuṭṭhāpikā acchindakacetanā adinnādānaṃnāma. Agamanīyavatthūsu
anya-e0301n0:845_10: Keci panaetthapi agamanīya vatthusaññinoti padaṃ icchanti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:845_11: Agamayanīvatthu tasmiṃ sevanacittanti hi tattha vuttaṃ. Etena agamanīyavatthumhi
anya-e0301n0:845_12: sati gamanīya saññāyavā agamanīya saññāyavā sevantassa kammapatho hoti yevāti siddhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:845_13: hoti. Itarathā agamanīyavatthu tathā saññitā tasmiṃ sevanacittanti vuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:846_0: Apare pana sayaṃ payogaṃ katvā attani parena karīyamānaṃ maggena maggapaṭipādanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:846_1: assādentassa sevanacitte satipi natthi kammappathabhedo. Payogassa abhāvāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:846_2: Sevanacitte pana sati payogo appamāṇanti eke. Evañca sati tiyaṅgikova micchācāro,
anya-e0301n0:846_3: na caturaṅgikoti āpajjati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sevana payogena saha caturaṅgikova
anya-e0301n0:846_4: vuttoti aññe. Sevanapayogo pana yebhuyyena labbhamānattāyeva vutto. Na pana ekantaaṅgabhāvato.
anya-e0301n0:846_5: Itarathā itthīnaṃ yebhuyyena payogakiccaṃ natthīti tāsaṃ micchācāro dullabho siyāti
anya-e0301n0:846_6: ca vadanti. Bhikkhunidūsanaṃpi ettheva saṅgayhati. Sā hi rakkhitāsu saṅgahitāti.
anya-e0301n0:846_7: Ṭīkāsu pana sā dhammarakkhitāpi na hoti. Kuto mātādirakkhitā. Dhammoti hi idha pāsaṇḍiyadhammova
anya-e0301n0:846_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti vadanti. Sāsanadhammopi nana yutto. Sabrahmacāri niyopi upajjhāyinī
anya-e0301n0:846_9: ādikā tassā mātādiṭṭhāniyāeva honti. Tathā hi sikkhāpadavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ micchācāropi
anya-e0301n0:846_10: dussīlāya.La. Sāmaṇeriyā, puthujjanabhikkhuniyā, sotāpannāya, sakadāgāminiyā, tato
anya-e0301n0:846_11: anāgāminiyā vītikkamo mahāsāvajjo. Khīṇāsavāya pana ekantamahāsāvajjovāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_0: Kasmāpanettha surāpānaṃ nagahi taṃ. Taṃpihi apāyasaṃvattani kabhāvena vuttaṃ. Yathāha-surāmerayapānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_1: bhikkhave āsevitaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ tiracchānayonisaṃvattanikaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_2: pettivisayasaṃvattanikaṃ. Yoca sabbalahuko surāmeraya pānassa vipāko. So manussabhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:847_3: ummattakasaṃvattaniko hotīti. Aṭṭhakathāsupi koṭṭhāsato pañcapi pāṇātipātā dayo kammapathāevāti
anya-e0301n0:847_4: vuttanti. Vuccate, mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tāva tassa sabhāgattena micchācāre upakārakattena
anya-e0301n0:847_5: dasasupi kammapathesu anupavesoti vuttaṃ. Tattha sabhāgattaṃ gahetvā vibhāvaniyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_6: surāpānaṃpi ettheva saṅgayhatīti vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvatoti
anya-e0301n0:847_7: vuttaṃ. Upakārakattaṃ gahetvā paṭisambhidāmaggaṭīkāyaṃ kusalākusalāpica paṭisandhijanakāyeva
anya-e0301n0:847_8: kammapathāti vuttā. Vuttāvasesā paṭisandhijanane anekanti kattā kamma pathāti na
anya-e0301n0:847_9: vuttāti imassa vākyassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāvase sāti surāpānādayo tabbiramaṇādayoca.
anya-e0301n0:847_10: Surāpānañhi madassa paccayo. Mado apuññapathassa. Tabbiratipi nimmadatāya. Sāca puññapathassāti
anya-e0301n0:847_11: kammapathūpanissayāni tāni tadāsannakammavasena sandhijanakānipi hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_12: Tattha tadāsannakammavasenāti tassa surāpānassavā surāpānaviratiyāvā āsanne pavattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_13: tammūlakānaṃ apuññakammānaṃvā puññakammānaṃvā vasenāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti-yo
anya-e0301n0:847_14: suraṃ pivitvā surāmadahetu pāṇā pātādīsu yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karoti, tassa surāpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_15: tassati kammassa balavūpanissayo hoti pubbacetanāṭhāniyañca. Tadeva visuṃ paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_16: janeti, na itaranti. Yathā hi pubbāparacetanā yopi kammapathapattassa kammassa parivārabhūtāeva
anya-e0301n0:847_17: paṭisandhiṃ janenti, na itarā. Evamidaṃpīti. Na hi kammapathasuttesu sarūpato āgatānieva
anya-e0301n0:847_18: paṭisandhiṃ janenti. Na itarānīti sakkā niyametuṃ. Yāni pana ekantena paṭisandhijananasāmatthiya
anya-e0301n0:847_19: yuttāni, tāneva tattha sarūpato vuttāni. Yānipana paṭisandhijanane anekantikāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:847_20: Tāni tatthasarūpato na vuttānīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tathā hi paṭisambhidā maggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:847_21: kusalākusalāpica paṭisandhijanakāyeva kammapathāti vuttā. Vuttāvasesā paṭisandhijanane
anya-e0301n0:847_22: anekanti kattā kammapathāti na vuttāti vuttaṃ. Tasmā idaṃpi paṭisandhijanane anekantikattā
anya-e0301n0:847_23: tattha sarūpato na vuttantica. Yaṃ tadā sannakammavasena paṭisandhijanakanti pubbe
anya-e0301n0:847_24: vuttaṃ. Taṃ tattha sarūpato vuttesu tadā sannakammesu anupaviṭṭhantica sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:847_25: Tassa pana duvidhaṃ kiccaṃ paṭisandhijananaṃ kammajananañcāti. Tattha paṭijananato
anya-e0301n0:847_26: kammajananamevassa mahantaṃ mahāvipphārañca hotīti katvā sakkena devānamindena kumbhajātake –
anya-e0301n0:852_0: Evaṃ tadāsannakammavaseneva tassa apāyagāmitā vuttā. Tadubhayaṃ panassa kiccaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0301n0:852_1: surāmerayapānaṃ bhikkhave āsevitaṃ.La. Saṃvattanikanti aṅguttare vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:852_2: Ayañhisuttapadesu dhammatā. Yadidaṃ saṃvattanikanti vuttaṭṭhāne yathālābhayojanāti.
anya-e0301n0:852_3: Tathāhi mūlaṭīkāyaṃpunabbhavaṃdetipunabbhavāya saṃvattetīti pāṭhe kammasahajātā punabbhavaṃdeti.
anya-e0301n0:852_4: Kammasahāyabhūtā akammasahajā tāpunabbhavaṃ saṃvattetīti vuttaṃ. Keci pana imamatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:852_5: anupadhāretvā imāya pāḷiyā tassa visuṃ ekantakammapathabhāvaṃ maññanti. Yaṃ pana
anya-e0301n0:852_6: koṭṭhāsato pañcapi kammapathāevāti aṭṭhakathāvākyaṃ. Tattha evasaddena tesaṃ cetanādhammattā
anya-e0301n0:852_7: jhānādikoṭṭhāsikattaṃ nivatteti. Cetanā hi kammapathaṃ pattāpi apattāpi koṭṭhāsato
anya-e0301n0:852_8: kamma pathakoṭṭhāsikāeva hotīti. Teneva mūlaṭīkāyaṃ kammapathā evāti kammapathakoṭṭhāsikāevāti
anya-e0301n0:852_9: vuttaṃ. Anuṭīkāyañca kamma pathakoṭṭhāsikāeva. Na jhānādikoṭṭhāsikāti vuttaṃ. Kecipana
anya-e0301n0:852_10: imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā iminā vākyena tassa visuṃ kammapathabhāvaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:853_0: Khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbenasabbaṃ tassa kammapathabhāvo paṭikkhittoyeva,
anya-e0301n0:853_1: tattha hi purimānaṃ catunnaṃ kāyakammādibhāvañca kammapathabhāvañca visuṃ vatvā surāpānaṃpatvā
anya-e0301n0:853_2: kāyakammamevāti vuttaṃ. Etena vacīkammabhāvañca kammapathabhāvañca paṭikkhipatīti.
anya-e0301n0:853_4: ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Catutthaṃ sattakammapathavasena pañcamaṃ dasa kammapathavasenāti.
anya-e0301n0:853_5: Tattha hi tatīye surāpānamissakattā pañcakammavasena icceva vuttaṃ. Na pañcakammapathavasenāti.
anya-e0301n0:853_6: Etāsupica paṭisandhijanane anekanti kattāeva paṭikkhittoti na nasakkā vattuṃ evañhi
anya-e0301n0:853_7: sati sabbā pāḷiṭṭhakathāṭīkāyo saṃsanditā hontīti. Kāyakammanti ettha kāyo tividho
anya-e0301n0:853_8: sasambhārakāyo pasādakāyo copanakāyoti. Idha kāyaviññattisaṅkhāto copanakāyo adhippetoti
anya-e0301n0:853_9: vuttaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhāteti. Copanakāyo hi kadāci kāyaṅgena attanoadhippāyaṃ parassa
anya-e0301n0:853_10: viññā panatthāyapi karīyatīti kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti. So yevaca kammānaṃ pavattimukhattā
anya-e0301n0:853_11: dvāranti kāyadvāraṃ. Tasmiñhi tena tena upakkama kiccena pavattamāneeva jīvitindriyupacchedādikiccasiddhito
anya-e0301n0:853_12: taṃjana kassa cetanādhammassa āyūhana kiccanibbattica kāyakammanāma lābhoca hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:853_13: Tasmiṃ kāyadvāre. Etthaca yasmāsabbānipi kammāni pubbaṅgamabhūtena sampayuttamanena
anya-e0301n0:853_14: vinā nasijjhanti. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā. Manoseṭṭhā manomayāti hi vuttaṃ. Dhammāti
anya-e0301n0:853_15: cettha sucaritaduccaritadhammā vuccanti. Tasmā manodvāraṃ sabbakammasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0301n0:853_16: kammāni visesetuṃ nasakkoti. Asādhāraṇabhūtā pana kāyavacīyo eva sakonti. Yasmāca
anya-e0301n0:853_17: purimāni sattavidhāni kammāni kevalaṃ manomattena nasijjhanti. Taṃsamuṭṭhitehi pana
anya-e0301n0:853_18: kāya vacīpayogehi eva sijjhanti. Tasmā teeva tesaṃ kammānaṃ pavattimukhasaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:853_19: gacchantīti vuttaṃ kāyadvāreti. Parato vacīdvāreti ca.
anya-e0301n0:854_0: Yasmā pana kāyadvāre vuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma. Vacīdvāre vuttito vacīkammaṃnāmāti
anya-e0301n0:854_1: ettakamatte vutte pāṇātipātādīni tīṇi kāyakammaṃnāma. Musāvādādīni cattāri vacīkammaṃnāmāti
anya-e0301n0:854_2: evaṃ dvārena kammānaṃ nāmavavatthānaṃ asiddhaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ. Yadā hi purimāni dve
anya-e0301n0:854_3: āṇattivasena appakena vacīdvāre bhijjhanti. Tadā tāni kāyakammanti nāmaṃ jaheyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:854_4: Vacīkammanti saṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyuṃ kasmā vacīdvāre vuttito vacīkammaṃnāmāti vuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:854_5: Dvevā nesaṃ nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ. Ubhayadvāresupi sandissanato. Yadāpana majjhimāni cattāri
anya-e0301n0:854_6: hatthamuṭṭhādivasena appakena kāyadvāre sijjhanti. Tadā tānipi vacīkammanti nāmaṃ
anya-e0301n0:854_7: jaheyyuṃ. Kāyakammanti saṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Kasmā kāyadvāre vuttito kāyakammaṃnāmāti
anya-e0301n0:854_8: vuttattā. Dvevā nesaṃ nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ. Ubhayadvāresupi sandissanato. Evañcasati
anya-e0301n0:854_9: pāṇātipāto.La. Micchācāroceti kāyakammaṃnāmāti idaṃ vavatthānameva niratthakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:854_10: Tathā parato musāvādo.La. Ppalāpoceti vacīkammaṃnāmāti. Bāhullavuttitoti vuttepana
anya-e0301n0:854_11: ekamekena bāhullasaddena chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni vajjetvā vuttappakāraṃ dvārena
anya-e0301n0:854_12: kammavavatthānaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati. Yathā vanacarako saṅgāmāvacaroti.
anya-e0301n0:855_0: Manokammāni pana dvārantaresu carantānipi caraṇamattāni eva honti. Na dvārantarāni
anya-e0301n0:855_1: tesaṃ kammasiddhiyā aṅgaṃ honti. Tasmā tāni visuṃ katānīti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā pana
anya-e0301n0:855_2: kāyadvārassa kāyoti nāmaṃ anekesu suttasahassesu sayameva siddhaṃ pākaṭañca. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:855_3: vacīdvārassa vācāti nāmaṃ. Kusalākusala javanacittasaṅkhākassa manodvārassaca manoti
anya-e0301n0:855_4: nāmaṃ. Tasmā sabbattha kāyadvāraṃ vacīdvāraṃ manodvāranti vutte kammena dvārassa
anya-e0301n0:855_5: vavatthāna kiccaṃnāma natthi. Yattha pana kāyakammadvāraṃ vacīkammadvāraṃ manokammadvāranti
anya-e0301n0:855_6: āgataṃ. Tattheva dvārakathādīsu kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi visuṃ vattabbaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:857: “Kāyakammassaca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ kāyadvāranti vuccatīti”. Taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:859: “Tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi nasiyāti” vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:860: Na hi kāyavikārena karīyamānaṃ vacīkammaṃ kāyadvāre pavattamānaṃpi tassa dvārassa nāmaṃ bhindituṃvā attano nāmaṃ dātuṃvā sakkoti. Sabhāva siddhattā tassa nāmassāti.
anya-e0301n0:862_0: Vuttaṃ “tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre pavattati. Na itarāni. Tasmā kāyakammassa
anya-e0301n0:862_1: yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho. Brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādi
anya-e0301n0:863: Na hi kāyakammadvāranti nāmaṃ idha vuttaṃ atthīti. [Kāyakammaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:864_0: 149. Musāti abhūtatthe nipāto. Musā vadanti etenāti musāvādo. Visati paresaṃ aññamaññasammodabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:864_1: sāmaggirasaṃ saṃcuṇṇeti paribhindati mithu bhedaṃ karoti etāyāti pisuṇā. Attano piyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:864_2: paresañca mittasuññabhāvaṃ karoti etāyātivā pisuṇā. Niruttinayena. Vadanti etāyāti
anya-e0301n0:864_3: vācā. Pisuṇāca sā vācācāti pisuṇavācā. Yena suyyati, tassa hadayaṃ pharamānā usati
anya-e0301n0:864_4: dahatīti pharusā. Pharusāca sā vācācāti pharusavācā. Sādhujanehi adhigantabbaṃ saṃsukhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:864_5: hitañca phalati visarati vināseti hitasukhamaggaṃ bhindatīti samphaṃ. Taṃvā phalati
anya-e0301n0:864_6: bhijjati etenāti samphaṃ. Atthadhammāpagatassa paṭibhāṇacittassa bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇā
anya-e0301n0:864_7: dikassa vācā vatthumattassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yattha diṭṭhadhammahitabuddhiyāvā samparāyika
anya-e0301n0:864_8: hitabuddhiyāvā upāyadīpakaṃ kiñci atthadhammavinayapadaṃ natthi. Samphaṃ palapantipakārena
anya-e0301n0:864_9: kathayanti etenāti sapphappalāpo. Tattha parassavisaṃ vādanapurekkhārena visaṃ vādaka
anya-e0301n0:864_10: kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā musāvādo. So parassa atthabhañjanakova kammapathabhedo.
anya-e0301n0:864_11: Itaro kammameva. Ettha ca kamma pathoti paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggo
anya-e0301n0:864_12: vuccati. Yathā hi rajānaṃ uṭṭhānapadeso rajapathoti vuccati. Tathā loke sandissamānesu
anya-e0301n0:864_14: uṭṭhahanti. Yesuvā kiccesu tāni uṭṭhahanti pavattanti. Tāni kāyavacīcittā bhisaṅkharaṇakiccāni
anya-e0301n0:864_15: paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggattā kammapathoti vuccanti. Katamāni
anya-e0301n0:864_16: pana tānīti. Aṅgasampannāni akusalesu pāṇaghāta kiccādīni kusalesu tabbiramaṇakiccādīni
anya-e0301n0:865_0: Parassa bhedapurekkhārena bhedakakāyagacīpayogasamuṭṭhā pikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā pisuṇāvācā.
anya-e0301n0:865_1: Sāpi pare bhinneyeva kammapathabhedo. Abhinne kammameva. Parassa mammacchedakakāya
anya-e0301n0:865_2: vacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā duṭṭhacetanā pharusavācā. Etthaca maranti sattā, maraṇamattaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:865_3: dukkhaṃ nigacchanti etasmiṃ ghaṭṭiyamāneti mammaṃ. Duṭṭhavaṇo. Mammaṃ chindati bhindati
anya-e0301n0:865_4: ghaṭṭetīti mammacchedako. Vaṇaghaṭṭanapayogo. Idha pana mammaṃviyāti mammaṃ. Jātiādīsu
anya-e0301n0:865_5: dasasu akkosavatthūsu yaṃkiñci. Mammacchedakoti jātiādīsu ghaṭṭana vasena pavatto
anya-e0301n0:865_6: pharusa kāyavacī payogo. Aya mattho sīlakkhandha ṭīkā vasena veditabbo. Athavā. Mamāyatīti
anya-e0301n0:865_7: mamo. Mitto. Mamassa bhāvo mammaṃ. Mettācittaṃ. Mammaṃ chindatīti mammacchedako.
anya-e0301n0:865_8: Ayaṃpi akkositabbassa sammukhāeva kammapathabhedoti keci. Parammukhāpīti apare. Yathā
anya-e0301n0:865_9: pana paraṃ akkositvā khamāpentassa khamāpanakammaṃ parassa dūre ṭhitassapi matassapi
anya-e0301n0:865_10: sampajjati. Evaṃ akkosanakammaṃpīti dīghamajjhimaṭīkākārā icchanti. Akkosādhippāyena
anya-e0301n0:865_11: caṇḍā mahiṃsī taṃ anubandhatūtivā corā taṃ khaṇḍā khaṇḍikaṃ karontūtivā muddhā te
anya-e0301n0:865_12: phalatu sattadhātivā evamādinā nayena paraṃ abhisapantassapi kammapathabhedo hotiyevātica vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:866_0: Anatthaviññāpana kāyavacīpayoga samuṭṭhāpikā pāpacetanā samphappalāpo. Sopi bhāratayuddha
anya-e0301n0:866_1: sītāharaṇādikesu paṭibhāṇacittesu vācāvatthumattesueva kammapathabhedo. Socakho pare
anya-e0301n0:866_2: taṃ anatthaṃ saccato gaṇhanteyeva. Agaṇhante pana kammameva. Tathā rājakathādīsu
anya-e0301n0:866_3: dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathāpabhedesupi kammameva. Tañca kho tadassādavasena kathentasseva.
anya-e0301n0:866_4: Atthadhammavinayanissitaṃ katvā kathentassa pana sabbaṃpi satthakameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:866_5: Vacīkammanti ettha vacīti vācāyeva. Sā catubbidhā saddavācā virativācā cetanāvācā
anya-e0301n0:866_6: copanavācāti. Idha pana saddasahitā vacīviññattisaṅkhātā copana vācā adhippetāti
anya-e0301n0:866_7: vuttaṃ vacīviññattisaṅkhāteti. Copanavācā hi kadāci vācaṅgena attano adhippāyaṃ parassa
anya-e0301n0:866_8: viññāpanatthāyapi karīyatīti vacīviññattīti vuccatīti. Sāyevaca kammānaṃ pavatti
anya-e0301n0:866_9: mukhattā dvāranti vacīdvāraṃ. Tāya hi taṃtaṃvacīpayogakiccena pavattamānāya eva visaṃvādanādikiccasiddhito
anya-e0301n0:866_11: Tasmiṃ vacīdvāre. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāyakamme vuttamevāti. [Vacīkammaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:867_0: 150. Abhijjhāyanti assādamatte aṭṭhatvā parabhaṇḍassa attano pariṇāmanavasena atirekataraṃ
anya-e0301n0:867_1: jhāyanti nijjhāyanti etāyāti abhijjhā. Byāpādenti parasatte vināsaṃ āpanne katvā
anya-e0301n0:867_2: cintenti etenāti byāpādo. Micchādiṭṭhīti ettha micchāti viparītatthe nipāto. Atthidinnantiādinayapavattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:867_3: sabbaṃ sappurisa maggaṃ sappurisapaññattaṃ bhinditvā natthi dinnantiādinayena tabbiparī
anya-e0301n0:867_4: tato passanti etāyāti micchādiṭṭhi. Tattha parasantakaṃ disvā kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanarajjanamattesu
anya-e0301n0:867_5: aṭṭhatvā ahovata idaṃ mamassāti evaṃ attano katvā cittena pariṇāmentasseva abhijjhākammapathabhedo
anya-e0301n0:867_6: hoti. Parasantakabhāveyeva thapetvā lābhāvatime. Ye īdisaṃ paribhuñjanti. Ahovatāhaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:867_7: tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjeyyaṃ. Yācitvāvā kiṇitvāvā attano kareyyaṃ. Aññaṃvā īdisaṃ labheyyanti
anya-e0301n0:867_8: evaṃ assādentassa kammameva. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe
anya-e0301n0:867_9: uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti. Yāva na ahovata idaṃ mamassāti attano pariṇāmetīti.
anya-e0301n0:867_10: Antamaso ḍaṃsamakasādikepi ārabbha ime nassantu vinassantu. Ahovatime nasseyyuṃ vinasseyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:867_11: Avaḍḍhitāvā bhaveyyuṃ ciraṃvā natiṭṭheyyuṃ. Kadāvā nassanti vinassantīti evaṃ para
anya-e0301n0:867_12: sattassa khandhajīvavināsaṃ cintentasseva byāpādo. Itaro kammameva. Vuttañhetaṃ parasattavatthuke
anya-e0301n0:867_13: hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti. Yāva na ahovatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vināseyyāti
anya-e0301n0:867_14: tassa vināsaṃ cintetīti. Kammassavā kammavipākassavā sabbaso paṭibāhikā natthikāhe
anya-e0301n0:867_15: tukākriyavasena tividhā niyata micchādiṭṭhieva kammapathabhedo. Dasavatthukamicchādiṭṭhi
anya-e0301n0:867_16: pana natthikadiṭṭhipabhedāeva. Sabbaññudesanaṃ paṭibāhitvā pavattā ariṭṭhakaṇṭakādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:867_17: diṭṭhiyopi kammapathāevāti vadanti. Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhivā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānivākammamevāti.
anya-e0301n0:868_0: Niyatāti cettha yathā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni yattakaṃ passitvā saddhādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:868_1: gacchantassa cittuppādo attano anantaraṃ phaladānaniyamena niyato hoti. Tattakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:868_2: passanto kusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ okkamatīti vutto. Tathādiṭṭhiṭṭhā nāni kāraṇa
anya-e0301n0:868_3: paṭirūpakāni yattakaṃ passitvā micchādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa cittuppādocutianantarephaladānaniyamena
anya-e0301n0:868_4: niyato hoti. Tattakaṃ passitvā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto akusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ
anya-e0301n0:868_5: okkamati, atekicchonāma hoti. Tathā pana apassitvā kevalaṃ micchādhimokkhamattena
anya-e0301n0:868_6: evameva bhavissatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sakaṃ ācariyakaṃ samayaṃ paggaṇhitvā ṭhito
anya-e0301n0:868_7: atekicchonāma nahoti. Kasmā, phaladāna niyamābhāvāti. Ayañca attho micchattattikena
anya-e0301n0:868_8: dīpetabbo. Tattha hi phaladāna niyamavaseneva ubhinnaṃpi sammattamicchattadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:868_9: niyatasaññāpaṭilābho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti. Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanāsu pana gahaṇaniyamavasenāpi
anya-e0301n0:869_0: Aññatrāpiviññattiyāti viññattidvayena vināpi. Viññattidvayaṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvāpīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:869_1: Apisaddena pana viññattidvayena sahāpīti dasseti. Imāni hi tīṇi kammāni yadā kāyaṅgavā
anya-e0301n0:869_2: caṅgāni acopetvā manasmiṃeva sijjhanti. Tadāviññattiyā vināva pavattanti. Yadā pana
anya-e0301n0:869_3: tāni copetvā kāyavacīdvāresu sijjhanti, tadā viññattiyā saheva pavattantīti. Etena
anya-e0301n0:869_4: imesaṃ tīsupi dvāresu pavattiṃ dīpeti. Evaṃsantepi imāni manodvāreeva bahulaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:869_5: Kāyavacīdvāresu pana appakameva pavattantīti vuttaṃ manasmiṃyevabāhullavuttitoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_6: Tattha manasmiṃ yevāti kusalā kusalajavanacittasaṅkhāte manodvāreeva. Etena purimesupi
anya-e0301n0:869_7: kāyadvāre vacīdvāreti padesu evasaddasambhavo dīpito hoti. Evañhi sati tatthapi dvārena
anya-e0301n0:869_8: kammavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upapannaṃ hotīti. Itarathā upalakkhaṇādivasena atthantarapasaṅgopi
anya-e0301n0:869_9: siyāti. Apica, idha evasaddena ayaṃpi visesattho dīpito hoti. Pāṇavadhādīsu hi vadhāmi
anya-e0301n0:869_10: naṃ avaharāmi na ntiādinā saṃvidhānākārena pavattā cetayitakriyāeva padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_11: Sāca kāyavacīpayogehi vinā nasijjhati. Tasmā tesu kāya vacī payogā kammasiddhiyā
anya-e0301n0:869_12: ekaṃ aṅgaṃ honti. Taṃ sahajātāca abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikāeva hutvā abbohārikattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:869_13: gacchanti. Parabhaṇḍā bhijjhāyanādīsu pana abhijjhādīnaṃ attapadhānānaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu
anya-e0301n0:869_14: pavattānaṃpi kāya vacīpayogākammasiddhiyā aṅgameva nahonti. Tathā cintāpavatti matteneva
anya-e0301n0:869_15: tattha kammasiddhito. Iti imesu kammesu kāya vacīdvārānaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ aṅgabhāvapaṭikkhipanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:869_16: manasmiṃ yevāti eva gahaṇaṃ idheva katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana dvāresu pavattimatta
anya-e0301n0:871: “Viññattisamuṭṭhāpaka cittasampayuttācettha abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikāva hontīti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:872: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttāpi kevalaṃ manokamma kiccavisesena pavattamānā abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā honti. Cetanāeva pana abhijjhādipakkhikā hotīti. [Manokammaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:873_0: 151. Ettha ca dasannaṃpi imesaṃ kammapathānaṃ pubbāparacetanāyo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane
anya-e0301n0:873_1: anekantikapakkhaṃ gatāti paṭisambhidā maggaṭīkāyaṃ vuttā. Tasmā tāpi imaṃ sattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:873_2: māressāmi imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyissāmītiādinā nayena ādito paṭṭhāya pavattā balavapaccaye
anya-e0301n0:873_3: laddhā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhanti. Aladdhā nākaḍḍhantīti yuttā. Yāni pana kusalākusalāni
anya-e0301n0:873_4: kammapathabhedaṃ appattāni honti. Tāni kāyadvāre dissamānāni kāyakammānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:873_5: Vacīdvāre dissamānāni vacīkammānināma. Suddhe manodvāre dissamānāni manokammānināmāti
anya-e0301n0:873_6: veditabbānīti. Dosamūlenāti dosasaṅkhātamūlena dosamūlakacittenāti dvidhā attho.
anya-e0301n0:873_7: Tattha purimo byāpādavajjehi dvīhi yujjati, pacchimo tīhipi. Lobhamūlenāti ettha
anya-e0301n0:873_8: esanayo. Tatthāpiti purimo abhijjhāvajjehi dvīhi yujjati. Pacchimo tīhīti. Dvīhi
anya-e0301n0:873_9: mūlehīti kadāci dosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti. Moho
anya-e0301n0:873_10: pana sabbasādhāraṇattā visesakaro na hotīti idha na gahito.
anya-e0301n0:875_1: sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ. Tesaṃ pana sabbadubbalabhāvena aññe bhuñjanti.
anya-e0301n0:875_2: Attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantīti evamādīni vatvā sakasaññāya eva yaṃkiñci
anya-e0301n0:875_3: harantānaṃ kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlenā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:876_0: Sahajātamūlañhi idha adhippetaṃ asādhāraṇabhūtañca. Tesañca tathāharantānaṃ haraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_1: haraṇakāle kadācidosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi eva sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:876_2: Yo pana moho mahāsammatādīnaṃdhammikarājūnaṃ kāle pavattaṃ porāṇaka nidhisatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_3: thapetvā pacchā adhammikānaṃrājūnaṃ kāle pavattesu yebhuyyena adhammikesu dhammasattha
anya-e0301n0:876_4: rājasattha saṅkhātesu nidhipāṭhesu dhammikasaññīnaṃ rājūnaṃ uppanno. Yoca rājūnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_6: brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnanti evaṃ saññīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ uppanno. Yoca natthi sukata
anya-e0301n0:876_7: dukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti evaṃ diṭṭhikānaṃ kammaphalasambandhā pavādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_8: uppanno. Sosabbopi upanissayamoho nāma hoti. So idha nādhippeto. Itarathā lobho nidānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_9: kammānaṃ samudayāya. Doso nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya. Moho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyāti
anya-e0301n0:876_10: vacanato sabbepi akusalakamma pathāti mūlakāeva idha vattabbā siyunti. Evaṃpanettha
anya-e0301n0:876_11: vattabbaṃ siyā, kammesuca kammaphalesuca sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ janānaṃ kaṅkhā pariyuṭṭhāna
anya-e0301n0:876_12: cittenasahevatadanurūpāniadinnādānādīni cattārikammāni karontānaṃ tāni kammāni suddhena
anya-e0301n0:876_13: mohamūlena jāyantīti. Evañhi sati parato vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhijanakesu gahaṇaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:877_0: 152. Kāmāvacarakusalaṃpi kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāya kammanti ettha dve pariyāyā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:877_1: Kathaṃ, vakkhamānesu hi puññakriyavatthūsu yaṃkiñci puññakriyavatthuṃ kāyaṅgaṃ copetvā
anya-e0301n0:877_2: pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Vācaṅgaṃ copetvā pavattitaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Kāyaṅga
anya-e0301n0:877_3: vācaṅgāni acopetvā manodvāreeva pavattitaṃ manokammaṃ nāmāti ayameko pariyāyo. Ayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:877_4: pana mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva raho ca. Mettaṃ
anya-e0301n0:877_5: vacīkammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahoca. Mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:877_6: hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahocātica. Sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:877_7: Sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattaṃ. Sabbaṃ manokammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:880_0: Evamādīsu suttapadesu āgato. Apica, aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sakalāya navakammadvārakathāya
anya-e0301n0:880_1: ayamattho dīpetabbo. Tattha hi dānamayaṃpi kāyavacī manokammavasena tidhā vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:880_2: Tathā sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayañcāti. Yasmiṃ pana dussilye pavattamāne kāyo aparisuddho
anya-e0301n0:880_3: hoti. Kāyasaṃvaro bhijjati. Yaṃ pana kusalaṃ pavattamānaṃ tadaṅgapahānādivasena taṃ
anya-e0301n0:880_4: dussilyaṃ pajahitvā kāyadvāraṃ sodhayamānaṃ kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānaṃ pavattati. Taṃ
anya-e0301n0:880_5: kāyacopana rahitaṃpi kāyaṅga saṃvaraṇa kiccattā kiccasīsena kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:880_6: Kāyasucaritantipi vuccati. Etthaca taṃ dussilyaṃ pajahitvāti yasmiṃ citte uppajjamāne
anya-e0301n0:880_7: pāṇaghātādikaṃ kāyadussilyaṃ uppajjeyya. Tassa cittassa uppajjituṃ appadānavasena
anya-e0301n0:880_8: taṃ kāyadussilyaṃ pajahitvā. Kāyadvāraṃ sodha yamānanti yasmiṃ dussilye uppajjamāne
anya-e0301n0:880_9: kāyaṅgaṃ asuddhaṃ hoti. Tassa uppajjituṃ appadānavasena kāyadvāraṃ sodhayamānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:880_10: Kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānanti sayaṃ kāyaṅgasaṃvaraṇakiccasampādanena kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrentanti
anya-e0301n0:880_11: attho. Vacīkammepi eseva nayo. Avayesaṃ pana sabbaṃpi kalyāṇakammaṃ tīsu dvāresu
anya-e0301n0:880_12: pavattaṃpi manodvāraṃeva sodhayamānaṃ manosaṃvaraṃeva pūrayamānaṃ pavattatīti manodvāre
anya-e0301n0:880_13: pavattaṃ manokammaṃnāma. Manosucaritantipi vuccati. Ayameko pariyāyo. Ayaṃ pana anekasatesu
anya-e0301n0:880_14: kammapathasuttesu āgato. Apica, aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sakalāya dvārakathāka ayamattho dīpetabboti.
anya-e0301n0:880_15: Imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu sattusāsane kalyāṇadhammapūraṇaṃnāma yāvadeva pāpadhammapahānatthāya
anya-e0301n0:880_16: eva hotīti pacchimoyeva padhānanti veditabboti. Diyyati etenāti dānaṃ. Vatthupariccāgacetanā.
anya-e0301n0:880_17: Sīlayatīti sīlaṃ. Kāya vacīkammāni sāvajjāni nīvāretvā anavajjāni susamāhitāni katvā
anya-e0301n0:880_18: sammādahati thapeti, uparime kusaladhammeca upadhāreti. Tesaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā dhāretīti
anya-e0301n0:880_19: attho. Bhāventi etāyāti bhāvanā. Adhikusaladhamme anuppannevā uppādenti uppannevā
anya-e0301n0:880_20: vaḍḍhentīti attho. Apacāyanti etenāti apacāyanaṃ. Pūjenti kāyavācāhi attānaṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassentīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:881_0: Visesena āvaranti ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti byāvaṭānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃvā veyyāvaccaṃ. Pajjitthāti
anya-e0301n0:881_1: patti. Attani laddhapuññakoṭṭhāsassa nāmaṃ. Pāpīyatītivā patti. Parehi anumodantehi
anya-e0301n0:881_2: laddhabbassa puññānisandassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Pattiṃ dadanti etenāti pattidānaṃ. Tadeva
anya-e0301n0:881_3: parehi dinnaṃ anumodanti. Sādhukāraṃ dadanti etenāti pattānumodanaṃ. Dhammaṃ suṇanti
anya-e0301n0:881_4: etenāti dhammasavanaṃ. Dhammaṃ desenti etāyāti dhammadesanā. Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi
anya-e0301n0:881_5: yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākotiādinā dasavatthukaṃ
anya-e0301n0:881_6: sammādiṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karonti etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Sabbāni pana tāni punenti cittasantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:881_7: sodhenti etehīti puññāni. Pūjanīyabhāvaṃ nibbattentīti puññānītipi vadanti. Tānieva
anya-e0301n0:881_8: avassaṃ kattabbaṭṭhena kriyānicāti puññakriyāni. Tāniyeva sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n0:881_9: vatthūnicāti puññakriyavatthūnīti. Ettha ekamekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti purimaṃ majjhimaṃ
anya-e0301n0:881_10: pacchimanti. Tattha dāne tāva paṭiggāhakassa pariccāgakaraṇaṃ majjhimaṃnāma. Tato
anya-e0301n0:881_11: pubbe iminā paccayena dānamayaṃ puññaṃ pavattayissāmīti evaṃ paccayuppādanato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n0:881_12: dānaṃ ārabbha dānaṃ uddissa tīsu dvāresu pavattā kusalacetanā purimaṃnāma. Pacchā
anya-e0301n0:881_13: bhāge pana attanā dinnadānaṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ attamanacittaṃ uppādentassa pavattā
anya-e0301n0:881_14: kusalacetanā pacchimaṃnāmaṃ. Sabbaṃpi cetaṃ akusale vuttanayena balavapaccaye laddhā
anya-e0301n0:881_15: paṭisandhiṃ deti. Aladdhā na detīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:882_0: Puna hīna majjhimapaṇītavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena
anya-e0301n0:882_1: vīmaṃsāyavā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, majjhimena chandādinā pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ, paṇītena
anya-e0301n0:882_2: paṇītaṃ. Yasakāmatāyavā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ. Puññaphalakāmatāyavā pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:882_3: Kattabbame vidanti ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Attukkaṃsana paravambhanādīhi
anya-e0301n0:882_4: upakkiliṭṭhaṃvā hīnaṃ. Anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ lokiyasukhabhāgitāya pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:882_5: Maggaphalasukhabhāgitāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Taṇhāvasenavā bhavabhogatthāya pavattitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:882_6: hīnaṃ. Attano vimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ. Sabbasattavimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:882_7: pāramitādānaṃ paṇītanti ayamattho visuddhimagge sīlaniddesaṃ nissāya veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:882_8: Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesesupiyathā sambhavaṃ tikadvayaṃ vibhajitvā vattabbanti. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:882_9: sīlaṃ nāmabhikkhusīlaṃ, bhikkhunisīlaṃ, sāmaṇerasīlaṃ, gahaṭṭhasīlanti catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:882_10: hoti. Tattha purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ samādānakiccaṃ kammavācāya siddhaṃhoti. Antimavatthuajjhāpannenavā
anya-e0301n0:882_11: sikkhāpaccakkhānenavā kammavācāya bhinnāya sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti. Sabbāni
anya-e0301n0:882_12: upasampanna sīlāni bhinnāni honti. Tadā bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ avijahitvā ṭhito dussīlonāma
anya-e0301n0:882_13: hoti. Thapetvāpana antimavatthuṃ aññasikkhā padāni vītikkamantassa yaṃ vītikkamati.
anya-e0301n0:882_14: Tasmiṃyeva saṃvarabhedo hoti. Na samādāna bhedo. Na hi taṃ puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti
anya-e0301n0:882_15: atthīti. Paṭikammaṃ karontassa pana saṃvaro pākatiko hoti. Sañcicca vītikkamantovā
anya-e0301n0:882_16: paṭikammaṃ akarontovā alajjīnāma hoti. Na dussīloti. Esanayo sāmaṇerasīlepi. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:882_17: pana saraṇagamaneneva samādānaṃsiddhaṃ hoti. Liṅganāsanaṅgaṃ katvā saraṇagamane bhinne
anya-e0301n0:882_18: sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhijjati. Itaresu pana yaṃ vītikkamati, tasmiṃyeva saṃvarabhedo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:883_0: Gahaṭṭhasīle pana pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇavaseneva samādānaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Tasmā
anya-e0301n0:883_1: ekatogaṇhante sabbāni samādinnāni honti. Ekasmiṃca bhinne sabbāni bhinnāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:883_2: Sabbāni puna samādātabbāni. Visuṃ visuṃ gaṇhante pana yaṃ vītikkamati, etadevabhijjati.
anya-e0301n0:883_3: Tadeva puna samādātabbaṃ hotīti. Paricchinnakālā tikkamane pana sabbaṃ samādānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_4: vūpasammatiyeva. Dussīlabhāvo panettha pañcannaṃ niccasīlānaṃ bhedena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:883_5: Niccāniccesu pana yaṃ niccameva vaṭṭati. Aniccaṃ navaṭṭati sāvajjaṃ hoti. Taṃ niccasīlaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_6: nāma. Yaṃ pana niccaṃpi vaṭṭati. Mahantaṃ puññābhisandaṃ hoti. Aniccaṃpi vaṭṭati
anya-e0301n0:883_7: sāvajjaṃ na hoti. Taṃ aniccasīlaṃnāma. Tattha bhikkhu bhāve ṭhitassa bhikkhusīlaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_9: upāsakānaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānañca dasasīlaṃ niccasīlaṃnāma. Tesañhi taṃ taṃ yathāsakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_10: sīlaṃ niccaṃ suddhaṃ katvā rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati. Arakkhantānaṃ bhikkhubhāvādiko sāvajjo
anya-e0301n0:883_11: hoti asuddho. Kasmā, attano anurūpassa ācārassa vipattito. Pakatigahaṭṭhānaṃ pana
anya-e0301n0:883_12: aṭṭhaṅguposathasīlaṃ aniccasīlaṃnāma. Tañhi tesaṃ vuttanayena niccaṃpi vaṭṭati. Aniccaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:883_13: vaṭṭati. Tathā dasasīlañca. Tañhi pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ aniccasīlameva hoti. Gihinivatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_14: pahāya kāsāyavatthadhāraṇena pabbajitasaṅkhepagatānaṃ eva niccasīlaṃ. Yathā hi pakatimanussānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_15: pañcasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati. Vītikkamituṃ navaṭṭati.
anya-e0301n0:883_16: Tathā pabbajitavesadhārīnaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva
anya-e0301n0:883_17: vaṭṭati. Vītikkamituṃ navaṭṭati. Vesadhāraṇena saha siddhattāti.
anya-e0301n0:884_0: Upari vuccamānā samathavipassanāvasena duvidhā bhāvanā bhāvanānāma. Sā idha appanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:884_1: apattāva adhippetā. Dhammavinayapari yattiyā saha anavajjakammasippavijjāṭhānesu
anya-e0301n0:884_2: paricayakaraṇa cetanāpi ettheva saṅgayhati. Ratanattaye pana mātāpitūsu kulejeṭṭhesu
anya-e0301n0:884_3: ācariyesu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu aññesuca guṇavayavuddhesu yathārahaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:884_4: vandanaṃ añjalikaraṇaṃ sāmicikaraṇaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇanti evamādisabbaṃ apacāyanaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:884_5: Tesaññeva aññesañca āgantukagamikaaddhikānaṃ gilānānaṃ jiṇṇānaṃ kicca karaṇīyesu
anya-e0301n0:884_6: sabrahmacārīnaṃ cīvarakammādīsu paresaṃ taṃtaṃpuñña kammesuca parisuddhena hitapharaṇacittena
anya-e0301n0:884_7: attanokiccesu viya kāyavācāhi vāyāmakaraṇaṃ veyyāvaccaṃnāma. Attanā katassa yassakassaci
anya-e0301n0:884_8: puññassa parehi sādhāraṇakaraṇaṃ pattidānaṃnāma. Parehi dinnāya pattiyā anumodanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:884_9: attamanatāpavedanaṃ pattā numodanaṃnāma. Adinnassa puññassa anumodanaṃ pana anumodanameva
anya-e0301n0:884_10: hoti. Na pattānumodanaṃ. Pattiyāeva abhāvato. Pattica duvidhā uddisikā anuddisikāti.
anya-e0301n0:884_11: Tattha attānaṃ uddisikaṃ anumodantasseva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:884_12: Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ dānapuññesueva visesato pākaṭaṃ. Tañhi uddisakaṃ katvā devatānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:884_14: tesaṃ taṅkhaṇeeva diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyaṃ jātanti. Atthahita paṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya
anya-e0301n0:884_15: yoniso manasikāre ṭhatvā savanañca kathanañca dhammasavanaṃ dhamma desanācanāma.
anya-e0301n0:885_0: Natthi dinnaṃ natthiyiṭṭhantiādinayapavattāya dasavatthukāya micchā diṭṭhiyāvā issaranimmānādidiṭṭhiyāvā
anya-e0301n0:885_1: diṭṭhamaṅgalādidiṭṭhiyāvā visuddhaṃ katvā tehi tehi vatthūhivā yuttīhivā kāraṇehivā
anya-e0301n0:885_2: kammasakatā ñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vodānakaraṇaṃ diṭṭhujukammaṃnāmāti. Yattha
anya-e0301n0:885_3: pana tividhameva puññakriyavatthu āgataṃ. Tattha pattidānānumodanāni dāne saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0301n0:885_4: Issāmaccherānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena taṃ sabhāvattā. Apacāyanaveyyāvaccāni sīle saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0301n0:885_5: Tesaṃ cāritta sīlattā. Sesāni tīṇi bhāvanāmaye saṅgayhanti. Taṃ sabhāvattā. Kammaṭṭhānavinimutto
anya-e0301n0:885_6: dhammonāma natthīti hi vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhujukammañca ñāṇa vaḍḍhanamevāti. Tīsvevavā etaṃ
anya-e0301n0:885_7: saṅgayhati. Diṭṭhujukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyama lakkhaṇantiti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Satiyeva
anya-e0301n0:885_8: hi kammasakatāñāṇe dānādīni tīṇi sampajjantīti. Manokammamevāti manasmiṃeva kammapatha
anya-e0301n0:887: “Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattā bhāvena kāya dvārādīsu appavattanatoti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:888_0: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakaṃ abhiññākusalaṃ kāyadvārādīsu pavattamānaṃpi kāyavacīkammasaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:888_1: gacchati, kāyavācānaṃ kammapatha aṅgabhāvāsambhavatoti. Tañca bhāvanāmayanti dānasīlavasena
anya-e0301n0:888_2: appavattanato. Kevalaṃ bhāvanākammavisesattā tañca mahaggata kusalaṃ bhāvanākamma
anya-e0301n0:888_3: meva hoti. Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidā magge pathamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ. Dutīyena vitakkavicārānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:888_4: Tatīyena pītiyā. Catutthena sukhadukkhānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ. Veramaṇi sīlaṃ. Cetanā
anya-e0301n0:888_5: sīlaṃ. Saṃvaro sīlaṃ. Avītikkamo sīlanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pariyāyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:888_6: Appanāpattanti bhāvanā balena ārammaṇe anupavisitvā acalaṭṭhitibhāvena pavattanato
anya-e0301n0:890: “Pubbabhāgapavattānaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvatoti” kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:891_0: Na hi tesaṃ kāmāvacaratāmattaṃ appanāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti. Jhānaṅgabhedenāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:891_1: Jhānabhedenāti pana vattabbaṃ. Jhānaṅgabhedenātivā jhānaṅgasamudāyabhedenāti attho,
anya-e0301n0:892_1: Kasmā pana uddhaccacetanā idha pajjitāti. Paṭisandhianākaḍḍhanato. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti
anya-e0301n0:892_2: ce. Dhammasaṅgahe dassanena pahātabbesu taṃ avatvā bhāvanāya pahātabbesu eva vuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:892_4: dhammā dassanena pahātabbātica, uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo, imedhammā bhāvanāyapahā
anya-e0301n0:892_5: tabbātica, sesā pana cattāro diṭṭhigatavippayuttacittuppādā dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādāca
anya-e0301n0:892_6: siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbāti tattha vuttā. Kathañca viññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:892_7: Yo dassanenapahātabbesu na vutto, so akusaladhammo paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhatīti. Paṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n0:892_8: dassanenapahātabbadhammesueva nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayassa uddhaṭattā itarattha tassa
anya-e0301n0:892_9: anuddhaṭattāti. Yathāha-sahajātā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:892_10: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayenapaccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā
anya-e0301n0:892_11: cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattāca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayotica sahajātā
anya-e0301n0:892_13: paccayotica. Naca nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayasattiyā vinā vipākuppādanaṃnāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:892_14: Yadievaṃ sā pavattivipākaṃpi najanetīti sakkā vattuntice.Na. Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge
anya-e0301n0:892_15: tassā vipākassa uddhaṭattā. Yathāha-katame dhammā akusalā. Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ
anya-e0301n0:892_16: cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃvā.La. Ime
anya-e0301n0:892_17: dhammā akusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti.
anya-e0301n0:894: “Adhimokkhavirahena sabbadubbalaṃpi vicikicchāsahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Adhimokkhasampayogena tato balavantaṃpi uddhaccasahagataṃ nākaḍḍhatīti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:895_0: Na hi adhimokkhavirahamattena vicikicchāsahagataṃ sabbadubbalantica adhimokkhasampayogamattena
anya-e0301n0:895_1: uddhaccasahagataṃ tato balavantantica sakkā vattuṃ. Satthari kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatīti
anya-e0301n0:895_2: evamādinā nayena vuttāya vicikicchāya attano visaye mahāhatthināgassa viya balavatarattā
anya-e0301n0:895_3: ativiya kāḷakadhammattācāti. Tathā hisā ekantena dassanenapahātabbesu padhānabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:895_4: vuttā. Tatoyevaca paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃpi tassā viññātabbaṃ hotīti. Sabhāvaviruddhattāyeva
anya-e0301n0:895_5: pana vicikicchāsahagataṃ adhimokkharahitaṃ hotīti yuttaṃ. Tasmā uddhaccasahagatameva
anya-e0301n0:895_6: sabbadubbalanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbatthāpīti sugatiduggativasena sabbasmiṃpi. Yathārahanti
anya-e0301n0:895_7: tesu lokesu laddhavatthudvārānurūpaṃ. Vipaccatīti vipāceti vipakkabhāvaṃ āpādeti.
anya-e0301n0:895_8: Sabbaṃpivādvādasavidhaṃ akusalakammaṃ sattā kusalapākāni hutvā vipaccati, vipakkabhāvaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:896_0: Yasmā kusalakammāni apāyabhūmiyaṃpi pavattiyaṃ mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā mahiddhikānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_1: nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ santāne sayameva attanovipākassa okāsaṃ katvā sukhavipākaṃ janayanti.
anya-e0301n0:896_2: Aññesaṃpi āpāyikānaṃ tena tena kāraṇena iṭṭhārammaṇa samāyoge sati attano vipākassa
anya-e0301n0:896_3: okāsaṃ labhitvā sukhavipākaṃ janayanti. Tasmā tathāpavattiyañcātiādi māha. Na hi
anya-e0301n0:896_4: tāni sukhavipākāni akusakammassa vipākāni bhavituṃ arahanti. Vutteñhetaṃ vibhaṅge
anya-e0301n0:896_5: aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyyātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:896_6: Tattha mahāvipākāni sugati kāmaloke ahetukāni aṭṭhapi sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke tesuca pañcacakkhuviññāṇa
anya-e0301n0:896_7: sotaviññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa yugaḷāni rūpaloke vipaccatīti vuttaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_8: vipaccatīti. Rūpāvacara kusalañhi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpāni janayantaṃpi sayaṃ vipaccamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_9: ārammaṇantare aññabhūmika vipākabhāvena navipaccati. Kāmavirāgabhāvanābhāvena pana
anya-e0301n0:896_10: appanāpatta kamma visesattā kāmataṇhāya avisayabhūte nimittā rammaṇe attanā sabbaso
anya-e0301n0:896_11: sadisena mahaggatabhāvapattena rūpa vipākabhāveneva vipaccati. Tasmā rūpalokepi tāni
anya-e0301n0:896_12: pañcavipākāni kāmāvacarakusalassevāti veditabbānīti. Dvīsu kammassa vipaccanaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0301n0:896_13: paṭisandhināma mahantaṃṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā tadā vipaccantaṃ kammaṃ attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_14: nātihīnaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ sakkoti. Pavattiyaṃ pana nānāṭhānesu nānākiccehi vipaccati.
anya-e0301n0:896_15: Tasmā tadā vipaccantaṃ kammaṃ attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ vipaccetuṃ nasakkoti. Pañcaviññāṇaṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0301n0:896_16: parittakesu vipaccamānaṃ ṭhānā nurūpaṃ vipaccati. Tadārammaṇaṭṭhāne vipaccamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_17: yebhuyyena javanā nurūpaṃ vipaccati. Tasmā soḷasakamaggo dvādasakamaggo ahetu kaṭṭhakanti
anya-e0301n0:896_18: evaṃekekassa kammassa vipākappabhedo pavattotitaṃ pabhedaṃdassetuṃ tatthāpītiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:897_0: Kusalaṃ duvidhaṃ sampajānakataṃ asampajānakatanti. Tattha kammā yūhanakāle antamaso
anya-e0301n0:897_1: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ diṭṭhujukammañāṇaṃpi suṭṭhu yojetvā kataṃ sampajānakataṃnāma. Yathāha-kammañca
anya-e0301n0:897_2: kammaphalañca saddahitvā kataṃ sampajānakataṃ nāmāti. Diṭṭhujukammañāṇa mattaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:897_3: ayojetvā taṃ asampajānakataṃ nāma. Yathāha-kammaṃpi kammaphalampi ajānitvā kataṃ
anya-e0301n0:897_4: asampajānakataṃ nāmāti. Tattha sampajānakataṃ tihetukaṃ hoti. Asampajānakataṃ duhetukaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:897_5: Yathāha-sampajānakaraṇaṃ pana catuñāṇasampayuttehi hoti. Asampajāna karaṇaṃ catūhi
anya-e0301n0:897_6: ñāṇavippayuttehīti. Tattha ekamekaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ omakanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha kusalasamaye
anya-e0301n0:897_7: pariyuṭṭhite nīvaraṇadhammevā attukkaṃsana paravambhanādike pāpadhammevā suṭṭhu sodhetvā
anya-e0301n0:897_8: kataṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Asodhetvā kataṃ tehivokiṇṇaṃ omakaṃnāma. Apica, yaṃ katvā pacchā
anya-e0301n0:897_9: lābhā vata me. Naca vata me alābhā. Suladdhaṃ vata me. Naca vata me dulladdhaṃ. Yassa
anya-e0301n0:897_10: me īdisaṃ puññaṃ pasutanti evaṃ punappunaṃ anumoditaṃ. Taṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ katvā pacchā
anya-e0301n0:897_11: yenakenaci kāraṇena duṭṭhukataṃ mayāti vippaṭisāro uppajjati. Taṃomakaṃ. Evaṃ catubbidhassa
anya-e0301n0:897_12: kammassa vasena catubbidhaṃ vipāka koṭṭhāsaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ tathāpītiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:897_13: Tatthāpīti tasmiṃ kāmāvacarakusalepi. Tihetukamukkaṭṭhanti ukkaṭṭhabhūtaṃ paṇītabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:897_14: catubbidhaṃ tihetukaṃ. Tihetukapaṭisandhinti catubbidhaṃ tihetuka paṭisandhivipākaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:897_15: Etthaca ekacetanā ekameva paṭisandhiṃ deti. Pavattivipākaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyesupi bhavesu
anya-e0301n0:899: Devesuca manussesu, sesena parinibbutoti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:900_0: Tasmā ekā cetanā ekameva paṭisandhiṃ detīti idaṃ na yujjatīti. Na na yujjati. Pubbāparacetanāhi
anya-e0301n0:900_1: saddhiṃ sahassakappa koṭi parimāṇassa vattabbattā. Cittañhināma ekaccharakkhaṇepi
anya-e0301n0:900_2: anekasata sahassa koṭisaṅkhaṃ uppajjati. Tatociratarekālevattabbameva natthīti. Sahassa
anya-e0301n0:900_3: kappakoṭiyoti ca sahassaāyukappakoṭiyo sahassa attabhāvakoṭiyoti nettiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:900_4: vuttaṃ. Pubbāparacetanānañca paṭisandhidānabhāvo kosalasaṃyuttakena dīpetabbo. Ekapiṇḍapātadānasmiṃhi
anya-e0301n0:900_5: ekācetanādve paṭisandhiyo na deti. Pubbapacchimacetanāvasena sattakkhattuṃ sagge
anya-e0301n0:900_6: sattakkhattuṃ seṭṭhikule nibbattoti hi saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tihetu kaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:900_7: kammaṃ paṭipakkhehi abhibhuyyamānaṃ vihatasāmatthiyaṃ hutvā tihetukavipākaṃ janetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:900_8: na sakkoti. Naca taṃ atidubbalaṃpi samānaṃ kosallasaṅkhātena ñāṇena yuttattā atibyāmuḷhapaccaya
anya-e0301n0:900_9: bhūhaṃ jaccandhādivipattisahitaṃ ahetukavipākaṃ janetīti vuttaṃ tihetukamomakantiādi.
anya-e0301n0:900_10: Dvādasavipākānivipaccati. Ayaṃ dvāda sakamaggonāma ahetukavipākāneva vipaccati. Idaṃ
anya-e0301n0:900_11: ahetu kaṭṭhakaṃnāma. Evaṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādavasena vipākappavattiṃ dassetvā
anya-e0301n0:900_12: idāni moravāpivāsi mahādattattheravādaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha. So hi therovipākānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:900_13: asaṅkhārikatā sasaṅkhārikatāca kammavaseneva siddhāpi katvā asaṅkhāraṃ kammaṃ sasaṅkhāravipākāni
anya-e0301n0:900_14: na paccati. Sasaṅkhāraṃkammaṃ asaṅkhāravipākāni navaccatīti vadati.
anya-e0301n0:901_0: Yathā mukhanimittaṃ nāma mukhe sannisinne sannisīdati. Calante calati. Evaṃ payogena
anya-e0301n0:901_1: asādhanīyānaṃ vipākānaṃ tikkhamandatā visesabhūto saṅkhārabhedo kammavaseneva vattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:901_2: Na payogavasena. Itarathā kammavisesena tikkhamandajātānaṃ tesaṃ sannihitapaccayamattena
anya-e0301n0:901_3: mandatikkhatāpattināma siyāti. Ahetu kavipākānaṃ pana paridubbalattā aparibyattova
anya-e0301n0:901_4: tikkhamandatā visesoti ubhayakammanibbattanti adhippāyo. Yasmā pana tesaṃ sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhārabhāvo
anya-e0301n0:901_6: bhāvābhāvena vattuṃ yutto. Na kammāgamanavasena, na hi kammabhave saṅkhāro bhavantare
anya-e0301n0:901_7: vipākāni visesetuṃ yutto. Tasmā imaṃ vādaṃ kecivādaṃnāma karonto kecanāti āha.
anya-e0301n0:902_0: Imasmiṃ kecivāde asaṅkhārikakamme sasaṅkhārika vipākāni sasaṅkhārikakammeca asaṅkhārikavipākāni
anya-e0301n0:902_1: vajjetvā catūsu tihe tukukkaṭṭhesu kammesu asaṅkhārikadvaye vipākāni paṭisandhiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:902_2: dve, pavattiyaṃ dvādasa. Sasaṅkhārikadvaye paṭisandhiyaṃ dve, pavattiyaṃ dvādasa.
anya-e0301n0:902_3: Catūsu dvihetukomakakammesu asaṅkhārikadvaye paṭisandhiyaṃ dve, pavattiyaṃ dasa.
anya-e0301n0:902_4: Sasaṅkhārikadvaye paṭisandhiyaṃ dve, pavattiyaṃ dasa. Tathā catūsu dvihetukukkaṭṭhesu.
anya-e0301n0:902_5: Catūsu dvihetukomakesu pana paṭisandhiyaṃ ekaṃ ahetukaṃ pavattiyaṃ aṭṭhaahetukānīti
anya-e0301n0:902_6: evaṃ vipākānaṃ dve dvādasakamaggā cattāro dasakamaggā ekaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca honti,
anya-e0301n0:903_0: Tesanti tesaṃ kesañci therānaṃ vāde. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana tihetukena kammena paṭisandhitihetukāva
anya-e0301n0:903_1: hoti. Na duhetukā nacaahetukā. Duhetukena kammena paṭisandhi duhetukāpi hoti ahetukāpi.
anya-e0301n0:903_2: Tihetukā pana nahotīti evaṃ pavatto mahādhammarakkhitattheravādopi āgato. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:903_3: yathā duhetukena hīnena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhi avassaṃ icchitabbā hoti. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:903_4: tihetukenapi hīnena kammena duhetukāpi paṭisandhi avassaṃ icchitabbāyevāti katvā
anya-e0301n0:903_5: idha ayaṃvādo therena na gahitoti veditabbo. Paṭisambhidāmagge pana-gatisampattiyā
anya-e0301n0:903_6: ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti. Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:903_7: tayo hetū kusalā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatātica
anya-e0301n0:903_8: gati sampattiyā ñāṇa vippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hohi. Kusalassa
anya-e0301n0:903_9: kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:903_10: dve hetū abyākatātica evaṃ tihetukena kammena paṭisandhi tihetukāva vuttā. Dvihetukena
anya-e0301n0:903_11: kammena dvihetukāva. Na pana gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayātiādinā
anya-e0301n0:903_12: tihetukena kammena dvihetukā paṭisandhi vuttā. Naca catunnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayātiādinā
anya-e0301n0:904_0: Tattha pana tīsu khaṇesu sahajāta hetūnaṃ vasena hetu mūlakova ayaṃ desanāvāroti
anya-e0301n0:904_1: katvā anokāsatāya ahetukapaṭisandhi tattha navuttā. Na pana alabbhamānatāya. Dvihetuka
anya-e0301n0:904_2: paṭisandhi pana anokāsāyeva nahoti. Alabbha mānattāyeva sā navuttāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:904_3: Tasmā yuttito pāḷiyeva balavatarāti katvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravādova pāḷiyā sametīti
anya-e0301n0:904_4: paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Ṭīkākārā pana kammasarikkhaka vipākadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:904_5: sāvasesa pāṭhova mahātherena vuttoti icchanti. Evañca katvā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃpi tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādova
anya-e0301n0:905: Vibhāvaniyaṃ idāni ekāya cetanāya dvādasavipākāni ettheva dasakamaggopi ahetukaṭṭhakampiti āgatassa moravāpivāsi mahādhammarakkhitattherassāti pāṭho.
anya-e0301n0:906_0: Moravāpivāsimahādattattherassāti pana vattabbo. Mahādhamma rakkhitattheravādopi pana
anya-e0301n0:906_1: ettha ekadesena saṅgahitoyeva. Tasmiṃpi hi asaṅkhārikaṃ kammaṃ asaṅkhārikavipākameva
anya-e0301n0:906_2: deti. No sasaṅkhārikaṃ. Sasaṅkhārikaṃ kammaṃ sasaṅkhārikavipākameva deti. No asaṅkhārikanti
anya-e0301n0:907_0: 154. Rūpāvacarakamme parittanti duvidhaṃ parittaṃ apaguṇatā yavā hīnatāyavā. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:907_1: yaṃ paṇītehi chandādīhi yuttaṃpi abhāvitaṃ hoti paṭiladdhamattaṃ, taṃ apaguṇatāya
anya-e0301n0:907_2: parittaṃnāma. Yaṃ sandhāya yaṃ apaguṇaṃ hoti, upari jhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na
anya-e0301n0:907_3: sakkoti, idaṃ parittaṃnāmāti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana subhāvitaṃpi samānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:907_4: hīnehi chandādīhi yuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ hīnatāya parittaṃnāma. Yaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:907_5: chandovā hīno hoti. Vīriyaṃvā, cittaṃvā, vīmaṃsāvā, taṃ hīnaṃnāmāti tattheva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:907_6: Majjhimaṃpi duvidhaṃ. Tattha nātipaguṇa tāya majjhimaṃ sandhāya nātisubhāvito majjhimoti
anya-e0301n0:907_7: visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Majjhimehi chandādīhi yuttatāya majjhimaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:907_8: te dhammā majjhimā honti. Taṃ majjhimanti aṭṭha sāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṇītaṃpi duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:907_9: Tattha atipaguṇatāya paṇītaṃ sandhāya subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti visuddhimagge
anya-e0301n0:907_10: vuttaṃ. Paṇītehi pana chandādīhi yuttatāya paṇītaṃ sandhāya yassa āyūhanakkhaṇe te
anya-e0301n0:907_11: dhammā paṇītā honti. Taṃ paṇītanti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yāni apaguṇatādi
anya-e0301n0:907_12: vasena parittādīni vuttāni, tāni idha nādhippetāni. Yāni pana hīnādīhi chandādīhi
anya-e0301n0:907_13: yuttatāya parittādīni vuttāni, tāneva idhādhippetāni. Imāneva hi tividhāsu bhūmīsu
anya-e0301n0:907_14: tividhaṃ brahmupapattibhedaṃ sādhentīti. Itthīnaṃ jhānesu vasīpattānaṃpi chandādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:907_15: apaṇītatāya mahābrahmesu anuppajjanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Tenevaca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ chandādivasena
anya-e0301n0:907_16: siddhāni hīna majjhima paṇītāni aṭṭhārasapabhedena vibhajitvā imāni aṭṭhārasa kammadvārāni
anya-e0301n0:907_17: nāma imehi pabhāvitattā imesaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasakhattiyā aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇā aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0301n0:907_18: vessā aṭṭhārasa suddā aṭṭhacattā līsa gotta caraṇāni veditabbānīti vuttaṃ. Etena
anya-e0301n0:907_19: hi devānaṃpi brahmūnaṃpi labbhamānaṃ upapattibhedaṃ upalakkhetīti.
anya-e0301n0:909_0: “Paṭiladdhamattaṃ anāsevitaṃ parittanti avisesatova aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā nāti
anya-e0301n0:909_1: subhāvitaṃ amaripuṇṇavasībhāvaṃ majjhimaṃ. Ativiyasubhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇa
anya-e0301n0:909_2: vasībhāvaṃ paṇīta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ idha nayujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:910: Tañhi upari jhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthāsamatthaṃvā hāna bhāgiyatādi visesaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na pana upapatti bhedajanaka visesanti.
anya-e0301n0:912: “Ācariyena panettha parittaṃpi īsakaṃ laddhāsevanameva adhippetanti dissati. Tathā hānena nāmarūpaparicchede-
anya-e0301n0:914: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetu, mabhiññā na vipaccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:915: Samānabhūmikatova āsevana lābhena balava bhāvato mahaggatadhammānaṃ vipākadānaṃ vatvā tadabhāvato abhiññāya avipaccanaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi vicāretabbameva.
anya-e0301n0:916_0: Yathā hi ariyamaggacetanā attanā samānabhūmakajavanato aladdhāsevanāpi samānā vipākaṃ
anya-e0301n0:916_1: na detīti natthi. Tathā ādi kammikavīthiyaṃ ekavāramattabhūtā sabbasamāpatti vīthīsuca
anya-e0301n0:916_2: sabbapatha mabhūtā mahaggatacetanāpi samānabhūmakadhammato aladdhāsevana tāya dubbalattā
anya-e0301n0:916_3: vipākaṃ nadetīti natthīti na na sakkā viññātunti. Ettha siyā- tasseva rūpāvacarassa
anya-e0301n0:916_4: kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ.La. Pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti
anya-e0301n0:916_5: vuttaṃ. Na ca sā cetanā upacitānāma hoti. Samānabhūmaka dhammato aladdhāsevanattāti.Na.
anya-e0301n0:916_6: Maggacetanāyapi avipākatāpattito. Sāpihi tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa
anya-e0301n0:916_7: katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ. La. Pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti vuttā. Naca
anya-e0301n0:916_8: sāpi samānabhūmakadhammato laddhāsevanā hotīti. Ubhayattha pana pathamasamannāhārato
anya-e0301n0:916_9: paṭṭhāya upacinitvā bhāvetvā āgatattā asamānabhūmika javanehipi laddhāsevana bhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:916_10: paṭicca upacitatā bhāvitatāca vuttāti sakkā vattunti. Tasmā ādi kammikabhūtāpi mahaggatacetanā
anya-e0301n0:916_11: maraṇā sanne laddhā abbhuṇhā āsannakammabhūtā vipākaṃ nadetīti na vattabbā. Abhiññācetanā
anya-e0301n0:916_12: ca samānabhūmakehipi nānāvajjanavīthijavanehi suṭṭhutaraṃ laddhāsevanattā tikkhatarabhūtā
anya-e0301n0:916_13: kathaṃ dubbalānāma siyā. Teneva ayaṃ vādo anuṭīkāyaṃ paṭikkhitto. Vuttañhi tattha
anya-e0301n0:916_14: keci pana samāna bhūmakato āsevanalābhena balavantāni jhānānīti tāni vipākaṃ denti.
anya-e0301n0:916_15: Abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukattāvā dubbalā.
anya-e0301n0:916_16: Tasmā vipākaṃ na dentīti vadanti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Punappunaṃ parikammavasena abhiññā
anya-e0301n0:916_17: yapi vasībhāvasambhavatoti. Catutthajjhānasamādhissa pana ānisaṃsabhūtā abhiññācetanā
anya-e0301n0:916_18: tassa phalasadisā phalaṭṭhāne ṭhitā, tasmā sā vipākaṃ nadetīti icchanti ṭīkākārā.
anya-e0301n0:916_19: Tassa pana iddhi vikubbanādikiccaṃ vipaccanakiccatopi mahantataraṃ hoti. Sabbathā
anya-e0301n0:916_20: menaca vikubbanādikiccaṃ sādhentiyā vipaccanathāmepi tena thāmena saha parikkhayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:916_21: gacchati. Tasmā sā puna vipākaṃ nadetītipi yujjatiyeva. Pañcamajjhānanti abhiññābhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:916_22: apattaṃ parittādibhedena tividhaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ. Tadevāti pañcamajhānameva. Saññāvirāgaṃ
anya-e0301n0:916_23: bhāvetvāti citte sati rajjana dussana muyhanāni honti. Tasmiṃ asati diṭṭhadhammanibbānappattonāma
anya-e0301n0:916_24: hotīti evaṃ citte eva ādīnavaṃ disvā acittakabhavapatthanā sahitaṃ vāyokasiṇevā kesañci
anya-e0301n0:916_25: matena paricchinnākāsa kasiṇevā saññāvirāgaṃ bhāvetvā. Asaññasattesu uppajjantīti
anya-e0301n0:916_26: yena yena iriyāpathena idha maranti, teneva tattha uppajjanti. Kammakiriyavādititthiyā
anya-e0301n0:916_27: evāti adhippāyo. Na hi akammakiriyavādīnaṃ jhānabhāvanā nāma atthīti. Anāgāmino pana
anya-e0301n0:916_28: suddhāvāsesu uppajjantīti suddhāvāsesu pana anāgāmino eva uppajjanti. Na aññe sakadāgāmiādayoti
anya-e0301n0:916_29: attho. Etena anāgāmīnaṃ aññasmiṃpi brahmaloke uppatti appaṭisiddhā hoti. Anāgāmīsuca
anya-e0301n0:916_30: saddhādhiko avihesu uppajjati, vīriyādhiko atappesu. Satādhiko sudassesu. Samādhādhiko
anya-e0301n0:916_31: sudassīsu. Paññādhiko akaniṭṭhesūti. Yathākkamaṃ bhāvetvā yathākkamaṃ arūpesu uppajjantīti
anya-e0301n0:916_32: yojanā. Etthaca pathamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvātiādi sabbaṃ pathamajjhānādīnaṃ yathā
anya-e0301n0:916_33: sakaṃ vipaccanabhūmi vavatthānavasena vuttaṃ. Samāpattilābhino pana puthujjana sotāpanna
anya-e0301n0:916_34: sakadāgāmino attanā laddhasamāpattīnaṃ vipaccanabhūmīsu icchitabhūmiyaṃ nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n0:916_35: Tesu puthujjano nikantiyā sati kāmalokepi nibbattatiyeva. Itare pana jhāne apari
anya-e0301n0:916_36: hīne sati kāmalokepi nibbattatiyeva. Itare pana jhāne aparihīne sati kāmabhave nikantināma
anya-e0301n0:916_37: tesaṃ na sambhavatīti parihīnajjhānāeva tattha nibbattanti.
anya-e0301n0:918_1: kāmabhavepi kāmāvacara kammabalena. Ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattāti
anya-e0301n0:918_2: hi vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:919_0: Tehi jhāne aparihīne ekantena brahmalokagāminoeva honti. Yato te jhānaanāgāminonāmāti
anya-e0301n0:919_1: vuccanti. Jhānapari hānica tesaṃ taṃtaṃ palibodha vaseneva hoti. Na pana kāma rāgādivasena.
anya-e0301n0:919_2: Kasmā, maggasahāyena jhānena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitattā. Vuttañhetaṃ aṅguttare-sahadassanuppādā
anya-e0301n0:919_3: bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni mahīyanti.La. So vivicceva.La. Pathamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:919_4: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Tasmiṃ ce samaye bhikkhave ariyasāvako kālaṅkareyya.
anya-e0301n0:919_5: Natthi tassa saṃyojanaṃ. Yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna yimaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyyāti.
anya-e0301n0:919_6: Etthaca tasmiṃ ce samayetiādinā so laddhajjhānaṃ aparihāpetvā ce kālaṅkaroti. Ekantena
anya-e0301n0:919_7: brahmalokameva gamissati. Parihāpentassa pana taṃ saṃyojanaṃ pākatimevāti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:919_8: Paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyañca jhānalābhīnaṃ pana anāgāmissaca brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhidānato
anya-e0301n0:919_9: paccayo nahotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānalābhīnanti mahaggatajjhānalābhīnaṃ sotāpanna
anya-e0301n0:919_10: sakadāgāmīnaṃ. Paccayo nahotīti tesaṃ vipassanānikanti taṇhā kāmasugatipaṭisandhiyā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:920_0: Tasmā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sekhānaṃ kuppadhammānaṃpi sataṃ jhāne vijjamāne kāmabhave nikanti
anya-e0301n0:920_1: nāma natthīti veditabbaṃ. Anāgāmissa pana niddāyantasseva satthena gīvaṃ chinditvā
anya-e0301n0:920_2: mārīyamānassapi jhānaṃ alabhitvā cavanaṃnāma natthi. So hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārīti
anya-e0301n0:920_3: vutto. Itthiyo pana aṭṭhasamāpattiyo labhitvā anantare bhave akaniṭṭhe nibbattamānāpi
anya-e0301n0:920_4: adhipatibhūtesu mahābrahmesu na nibbattanti. Hīnajjhāsayattā purohita pārisajjesueva
anya-e0301n0:920_5: nibbattanti. Tathāhi aṭṭhakathāsu yaṃ itthī brahmattaṃ kareyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti
anya-e0301n0:920_6: suttapadassa atthavacane brahmattanti mahābrahmattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Itthī ca idha jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:920_7: bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati, na mahābrahmānanti
anya-e0301n0:920_8: vuttaṃ. Brahmapārisajjānanti cettha brahmapurohitānaṃpi saṅgahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Te
anya-e0301n0:920_9: hi brahmānaṃ parisabhūtā hontīti. Vuttañhetaṃ saṃyuttake –
anya-e0301n0:921: Athakho bhikkhave sikhībhagavā abhituṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi. Paṭibhātu taṃ brāhmaṇa brahmunoca brahmaparisāyaca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammikathāti.
anya-e0301n0:922_0: Parisabhāveca sati parisāsu jātāpināma hontīti. Tattha brahmunoti mahābrahmuno. Brahmaparisāyāti
anya-e0301n0:922_1: brahmapurohita gaṇassāti attho. Nanu brahmapārisajjānanti vuttattā na mahābrahmānanti
anya-e0301n0:922_2: ettheva tesaṃ saṅgahaṇaṃ yuttanti ce. Na. Yaṃ itthī sakkattaṃ kareyya, mārattaṃ kareyya,
anya-e0301n0:922_3: brahmattaṃ kareyya, netaṃṭhānaṃ vijjatīti evaṃ adhipati bhūtehi sakkādīhi saha vuttattā
anya-e0301n0:922_4: idha adhipatipaṭikkhipanasseva sambhavato. Teneva hi nettiyaṃ-itthī mahābrahmā siyāti,
anya-e0301n0:922_5: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā vehapphalādīsu uparibrahmalokesupi purohitapārisajjabrahmānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:922_6: atthitā siddhā hoti. Teneva saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ therānañhi bhaṇḍagāhakadaharā viya
anya-e0301n0:924: “Itthiyopi pana ariyāvā anariyāvā aṭṭhasamāpattilā bhiniyo brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattantīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:925: Tattha brahmapārisajjesuyevāti akaniṭṭhe nibbattamānāpi brahmānaṃ paricārika brahmesueva nibbattanti. Na mahābrahmesūti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:927: Brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattanti, na brahmapurohitādīsūti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:929: Sāmāvatiyādīnaṃ pathamaṃ brahmapārisajjesu nibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:930_0: Yasmā pana tā imasmiṃ attabhāve ariyaphalāni sacchākaṃsu. Tasmā tattha anāgāminiyo
anya-e0301n0:930_1: suddhāvāsesu uppannā. Itarā kāci tāvatiṃsesu kāci paranimmitavasavattīsu uppannā
anya-e0301n0:930_2: icceva udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti. Apicettha vehapphale akaniṭṭhe catutthāruppeti
anya-e0301n0:930_3: tīsu bhavaggesu nibbattā ariyā aññattha nuppajjanti. Sesabrahmalokesu nibbattā heṭṭhābhūmīsu
anya-e0301n0:931_0: 155. Āyukkhayena maraṇaṃ kammakkhayena maraṇantiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Tattha aparikkhīṇeyeva
anya-e0301n0:931_1: kammānubhāve tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye yathāniyamitassa āyuparimāṇassa parikkhayena
anya-e0301n0:931_2: paripuṇṇena maraṇaṃ āyukkhaya maraṇaṃnāma. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave dubbalena kammena
anya-e0301n0:931_3: nibbattassa sattassa aparikkhīṇeyeva āyuparimāṇe kevalaṃ kammasattiparikkhayena antarāva
anya-e0301n0:931_4: maraṇaṃ kammakkhaya maraṇaṃnāma. Tadubhayassa samaṃ parikkhayena maraṇaṃ ubhayakkhaya
anya-e0301n0:931_5: maraṇaṃnāma. Dharamānepi tadubhaye purimabhavesuvā imasmiṃvābhave katena upaghātakakammena
anya-e0301n0:931_6: ajjhattabahiddhābhūte nānārogābādha pathavīpavesa asanipātādike jīvitantarāye samuṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:931_7: dussimārakalāburājādīnaṃviya antarāva uparodhita khandhasantānassa sattassa maraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:931_8: upacchedaka maraṇaṃnāma. Nanu cettha marantānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃpi taṃtaṃbhavaṃ janentaṃ
anya-e0301n0:931_9: kammaṃ khiyyatiyeva. Athakasmā itarepi vuttāti. Vuccate, sarasavaseneva hi kammasāmatthiyassa
anya-e0301n0:931_10: khayo idha kammakkhayoti adhippeto. Ye pana dasavassa vīsativassa yāva asaṅkhyeyya
anya-e0301n0:931_11: vassādi vasena nānāāyukappavidhāyakā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye sabbajana sādhāraṇā
anya-e0301n0:931_12: sattānaṃ ajjhattabahiddhasambhūtā utuāhārānāma honti. Te tassa tassa āyukappassa
anya-e0301n0:931_13: ṭhitikarā vuddhikarā hānikarācāti tividhā honti. Tattha akusalamūlesu vaḍḍhamānesu
anya-e0301n0:931_14: hānikarā vaḍḍhanti. Kusalamūlesu vaḍḍhamānesu buddhikarā vaḍḍhanti. Ubhayamūlesu
anya-e0301n0:931_15: samaṃ ṭhitesu ṭhitikarā samaṃ pavattanti. Tesaṃ vasena sattānaṃ āyukappo katthaci
anya-e0301n0:931_16: sadā ṭhitibhāgo hoti. Katthaci kadāci hānibhāgo kadāci vuddhibhāgo hoti. Tayopi cete
anya-e0301n0:931_17: ṭhitikarādayo taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ ajjhottharamānā āyuṃ paricchindantā pavattantīti
anya-e0301n0:931_18: asaṅkhyeyyāyuka saṃvattanikaṃ cakkavattisampatti saṃvattanikañca kammaṃ dasavassike
anya-e0301n0:931_19: kāle vipaccamānaṃ tadanurūpaṃeva bhogañca issariyañca datvā dasavasena khiyyati.
anya-e0301n0:931_20: Taṃ taṃ sattanikāya pariyāpannā sattā santānabhūtā rūpadhammā sabbaññu buddhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:931_21: khandhasantāna bhūtāpi taggatikā tadanūvattikā eva hutvā pariṇamanti aññatra iddhimaya
anya-e0301n0:931_22: vijjāmaya rasāyanavidhi jīvita saṅkhāra vidūhīti. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāpadānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
anya-e0301n0:932: Sabbepi sabbaññubuddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā. Kasmā te asaṅkhyeyyaṃ na aṭṭhaṃsūti. Utubhojanavipattiyā. Utubhojanavasena hi āyu hāyatipi vaḍḍhatipīti.
anya-e0301n0:933_0: Tasmā padhānanissayabhūtesu dvisamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu taṃ taṃ āyukappavasena pariṇamantesu
anya-e0301n0:933_1: jiyyamānesu yāvamahantaṃpi kammaṃ attano vipākādhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā khiyyatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:933_2: Socassa khayo na sarasena hoti. Athakho āyusaṅkhāravipattiyā eva hotīti idha āyukkhayo
anya-e0301n0:933_3: visuṃ gahitoti. Esanayo upacchedakamaraṇepi netabbo. Tattha upacchedakamaraṇanti
anya-e0301n0:933_4: akālamaraṇaṃ vuccati. Tañhipavattamānaṃ upacchedakakammunāvā pavattati. Aññehivā
anya-e0301n0:933_5: aneka sahassehi kāraṇehi. Tāni pana pāḷiyaṃ mūlabhedato saṃkhipitvā aṭṭhadhā vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:933_6: Katamāni pana tānīti. Atthi vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā. Atthi vittasamuṭṭhānā. Atthi semha
anya-e0301n0:933_7: samuṭṭhānā. Atthi sannipātikā. Atthi utusamuṭṭhānā. Atthi visamaparihārajā. Atthi
anya-e0301n0:933_8: opakkamikā. Atthi kammavipākajā ābādhāti. Tattha kammavipākajā keci upapīḷakakammajākeci
anya-e0301n0:933_9: upacchedakakammajā. Yasmā pana vāto kuppamāno sītuṇhādīhi dasahi kāraṇehi kuppati.
anya-e0301n0:933_10: Tesuca ekameva kamma vipākajaṃ hoti. Sesāni pana akammavipākajānīti milinda pañhe
anya-e0301n0:933_11: vuttaṃ. Yasmāca kammavipākajāpi ābādhā uppajjamānā vāta kuppanādīhi vinā na uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:933_12: Tasmā keci vātasamuṭṭhānādayopi kammavipākajā hontiyevāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:934_0: Tattha sannipātikāti vātādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃvā sannipatitānaṃ vasena pavattā. Ye
anya-e0301n0:934_1: pana loke sattānaṃ payogamuttā sayaṃ jātā nānābhayupaddavā. Te utusamuṭṭhānesu saṅgahitāti
anya-e0301n0:934_2: daṭṭhabbā. Visamaparihārajāti anisammakārīnaṃ anekavidhe visame vipattimukhe attānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:934_3: payojantānaṃ tato tatovā tattha tattha vā patana pakkhalanādivasena pavattā. Opakkamikāti
anya-e0301n0:934_4: attanāvā parehi rājacoraverīhivā amanussavāḷayakkhadevatāhivā vāḷamigādīhivā katānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:934_5: payogānaṃ vasena pavattā. Kuppitā hi devatā sakalaṃ rajjaṃvā raṭṭhaṃvā dīpakaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:934_6: ekappahārena asesaṃ katvā vināsenti daṇḍakaraṭṭha majjharaṭṭha kaliṅgaraṭṭha mātaṅgaraṭṭhesu
anya-e0301n0:934_7: viya. Anekasahassevā vāḷayakkhe vissajjanti vesāliyaṃ viya. Rakkhasevā vissajjanti
anya-e0301n0:934_8: suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃviya. Vuttañhetaṃ aṅguttare yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti. Tena
anya-e0301n0:934_9: bahumanussā kālaṃ karontīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi yakkhāti yakkhādhipatino. Vāḷe amanusse
anya-e0301n0:934_10: ossajjantīti caṇḍe yakkhe manussapathe vissajjanti. Te laddhokāsā mahājanaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:934_11: pāpentīti vuttaṃ. Tattha vissajjantīti visamācāra bahule manusse disvā bhinnasaddhā
anya-e0301n0:934_12: yakkhasenāpatino manussānaṃ atthāya pubbeviya ārakkhaṃna gaṇhantīti attho. Janapadanagaranigamagāmesuceva
anya-e0301n0:934_13: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggaleca vattabbameva natthi. Aṅguttare vuttā satthadubbhikkharoga
anya-e0301n0:934_14: kappāpi idha vattabbāti. Kammavipākajāti upapīḷakopaghātakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanavasena
anya-e0301n0:934_15: pavattā ābādhāti attho. Evaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ upacchedakammunāvā aññehivā anekasahassehi
anya-e0301n0:934_16: kāraṇehi hotīti. Yehi keci loke dissanti. Pāṇaharā jīvitavināsakā nānārogāvā nānābādhāvā
anya-e0301n0:934_17: nānābhayā nivā nānā daṇḍāvā nānā upaddavu pasaggāvā. Sabbe te sakakamma samuṭṭhitāeva
anya-e0301n0:934_18: attano sādhāraṇāti natthi. Parakammasamuṭṭhitāpi attano sādhāraṇāeva. Sakakammasamuṭṭhitāpi
anya-e0301n0:934_19: paresaṃ sādhāraṇāeva. Kammena vinā yato kutoci samuṭṭhitāpi attano vā paresaṃvā sādhāraṇāeva.
anya-e0301n0:935: Yathā catumahāpathe thapite lakkhamhi sabbadisāhi āgatā sarasattitomarapāsāṇādayo nipatanti. Evaṃ kāyepi sabbupaddavā nipatantīti.
anya-e0301n0:936_0: Yesuca rajjaraṭṭhādīsu te uppajjanti. Tattha yejanā upāya kusalāvā na honti. Naca
anya-e0301n0:936_1: paṭikārakusalā. Nāpi parihāra kusalā. Kammañca yesaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti. Uppanno anattho
anya-e0301n0:936_2: bala vā. Tejanā vināpi upacchedakakammunā tato na muccanti. Maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:936_3: dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantiyeva. Kalyāṇabhūtaṃpi hi kammaṃ attano balavataraṃ yatokutoci samuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:936_4: rogaṃvā ābādhaṃ vā bhayaṃvā daṇḍaṃvā upaddavupasaggaṃvā paṭibāhituṃ nasakkoti. Rogādayoeva
anya-e0301n0:936_5: taṃkhepentā pavattanti. Yathā hi udakaṃ attano balavataraṃ aggiṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:936_6: Aggieva taṃ khepento pavattatīti evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imesañca sattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:936_7: pakatiyāpi kammassa dubbalabhāvo mahāniddese jarā suttaniddesena visuddhi maggeca
anya-e0301n0:936_8: maraṇassati niddese āyu dubbalatoti padassa niddese na dīpetabbo. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:937: Āyunāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ. Tathā hi sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsupanibandhañceva iriyāpathupanibandhañca sītuṇhu panibandhañca mahābhūtupanibandhañca āhārupanibandhañcātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:938_0: Tathā kāyabahusādhāraṇato animittatoti imesaṃ padānaṃ niddesenapi pākaṭoyeva. Kammanibbattassa
anya-e0301n0:938_1: hi āyuno tiṇagge ussāvabindusseva paridubbalabhāve pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathā yañca vutte
anya-e0301n0:938_2: kammasāpi tatheva paridubbalatā siddhā hotīti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Itarathā
anya-e0301n0:939: Idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇovā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃ diṭṭhī. Yaṃ kiñcāyaṃpurisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā adukkhamasukhaṃvā. Sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetūti.
anya-e0301n0:940_0: Ayañca attho milindapañhe tīsu ṭhānesu vitthārato āgato. Yathāvuttehi pana anekasahassehi
anya-e0301n0:940_1: kāraṇehi pavattamaraṇaṃpi akālamaraṇatāsāmaññena idha upacchedakamaraṇe saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:942: “Idaṃ pana nerayikānaṃ uttarakuruvāsinaṃ kesañci devānañca nahotīti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:943_0: Yathā pana mahāṭīkāyaṃ kesañci petānaṃ ito ñātake hi dinnaṃ puññapatti anumoditvā
anya-e0301n0:943_1: taṅkhaṇeyeva cavitvā sugatiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ kusalabhūtaṃ upacchedakaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:943_2: kesañci nerayi kānaṃpi yamarañño samanuyuñjanakālādīsu attanā katapuññaṃ anussaritvā
anya-e0301n0:943_3: taṅkhaṇeyeva cavitvā sugatiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ upacche dakamaraṇaṃnāma na na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:943_4: Kesañci tāvatiṃsādīnaṃ devānañca taṃ upacchedakamaraṇaṃ hotiyeva. Tathā hi subrahmadeva
anya-e0301n0:943_5: putta saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakakammādi vasenaekappahāreneva
anya-e0301n0:943_6: kālaṅkatvā avīcimhi nibbattāti vuttaṃ. Tattha rukkhanti tāvatiṃse pāricchattakarukkhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:943_7: Abhiruḷhāti āruḷhā pañca satadevaccharāyo. Manopadosika khiṭṭāpadosika devānaṃ maraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:943_8: mahābodhisattānaṃ dighāyuke devalokevā brahmalokevā nibbattānaṃ adhimutti kālaṅkiriyā
anya-e0301n0:943_9: channattheragodhikattherādīnaṃviya sayameva satthaṃ āharitvā parinibbāyantānaṃ maraṇañca
anya-e0301n0:943_10: ettheva saṅgayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathācāti tehi pakārehica. Marantānaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:943_11: aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhātīti sambandho. Maraṇakāleti maraṇāsannakāle. Yathārahanti
anya-e0301n0:943_12: sugatiduggatigāmīnaṃ arahānurūpaṃ. Yepana khīṇāsavā katthaci nuppajjanti. Tesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:943_13: pakatiyā yatho paṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpa meva antima javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃhoti. Samāpattilābhīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:943_15: parinibbāyantānaṃ jhānaṅgāni abhiññāsamanantare parinibbāyantānaṃ attano karajarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:943_16: Jīvita samasīsīnaṃ pana aggamaggassa paccavekkhanasamanantare parinibbāyantānaṃ maggaṅgādini
anya-e0301n0:943_17: antimajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Parinibbānacuticittassa pana sabbesaṃpi ādito attano
anya-e0301n0:943_18: attano paṭisandhiyāyathāgahitaṃ kammādīsu aññatarameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:943_19: Yepana anejosanti mārabbhayaṃ kālamakarīmunīti imaṃ suttapadaṃ disvā nibbānameva
anya-e0301n0:943_20: bhagavato parinibbānacutiyā ārammaṇanti vadanti. Te tena sayameva abhidhamme ārammaṇattikesu
anya-e0301n0:944: Katame dhammā parittārammaṇā, sabbo kāmāvacaravipāko kriyamanodhātu kriyāhetuka manoviññāṇa dhātu somanassasahagatā. Ime dhammā parittārammaṇāti.
anya-e0301n0:945_0: Yasmā pana parinibbānaṃnāma santi atthāyeva hoti. Ajjhāsayo cassa ekantena santininnoyeva
anya-e0301n0:945_1: hoti. Tasmā anejosanti mārabbhāti suttapadaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ santimārabbhāti
anya-e0301n0:945_2: anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāyāti vuttaṃ. Na pana vuttaṃ ārabbha ālambitvā
anya-e0301n0:945_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvāti. Theragāthaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana santimārabbhāti santiṃ anupādisesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:945_4: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ mahāparinibbānapāḷiyā tadaṭṭhakathāyaca nasameti.
anya-e0301n0:945_5: Tāsu hi bhagavato parinibbānaṃ jhānaṅga paccavekkhanasamanantaranti vuttaṃ. Etthaca
anya-e0301n0:945_6: purimāni dve samanantarāni parinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni. Abhiññāsamanantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:945_7: udānaṭṭhakathādisu āgataṃ. Yathāha-vuṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyīti iddhicittato vuṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0301n0:945_9: āgataṃ. Yathāha-ekūnavīsati me paccavekkhanaññāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:945_10: Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana arahattamaggānantaraṃ phalaṃ. Phalānantaraṃ bhavaṅgato
anya-e0301n0:945_11: vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhanaṃ. Taṃ pana paripuṇṇaṃvā hoti aparipuṇṇaṃvā. Tikhiṇena asinā
anya-e0301n0:945_12: sīse chijjamānepi ekaṃvā dvevā paccavekkhanāni uppajjantiyevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:947_0: Evaṃ vavatthānaṃ akatvā yaṃ vuttaṃ. “Katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa
anya-e0301n0:947_1: yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati. Na
anya-e0301n0:947_2: kamma kammani mittādayoti.” Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:948_0: Na hi tassa cuticittaṃ kammakammanimittādayo ārammaṇaṃ nakaroti. Naca cutiyā gahitāni
anya-e0301n0:948_1: kammādīnināma sabbasattānaṃpi bhavantarassa atthāya bhavantīti. Abhimukhībhūtanti
anya-e0301n0:948_2: kammantarassa okāsaṃ adatvā attano okāsaṃ katvā paccupaṭṭhitaṃ. Kammaṃvā paccupaṭṭhātīti
anya-e0301n0:948_3: sambandho. Upaladdhapubbanti tassa kammassa ārammaṇa bhūtāni deyyadhamma vatthādīni
anya-e0301n0:948_4: parapāṇādīnica sandhāya vuttaṃ. Upakaraṇabhūtanti kammasiddhiyā upakaraṇabhūtāni
anya-e0301n0:948_5: parivārabhūtānica paṭiggāhakādīni āvudhabhaṇḍādinica sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yasmāca lakkhaṇa
