anya-e0301n0:948_6: saṃyutte gavādīni vadhitvā rāsikatāni aṭṭhipuñjādīni kammanimittāni hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti
anya-e0301n0:948_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā kammasambandhāni yāni kānici vatthūni vā ārammaṇānivā
anya-e0301n0:948_8: idha upakaraṇe saṅgahi tānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Upalabhitabbanti duggatinimittaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:948_9: vuttaṃ. Upabhogabhūtanti sugatinimittaṃ. Ubhayaṃpi vā yaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā labhitabbaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_10: hoti. Taṃ upalabhitabbaṃnāma. Apaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā kevalaṃ sukhadukkhānubhavanatthāya
anya-e0301n0:948_11: labhitabbaṃ upabhoga bhūtaṃnāma. Etthaca aggijāla lohakumbhi nirayapāla nirayasunakhādīni
anya-e0301n0:948_12: nirayanimittaṃ. Taṃ pana kesañci janānaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāneviya upaṭṭhāti. Kesañci
anya-e0301n0:948_13: tato tato āgantvā attānaṃ saṃparivārentaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti. Yathāha-tassa gilānaseyyāya
anya-e0301n0:948_14: nippannassa nirayo upaṭṭhāti. Soṇagiripādato mahantā mahantā sunakhā āgantvā khāditukāmāviya
anya-e0301n0:948_15: saṃparivāresunti. Tathā deva nimittepi. Yathāha-nandavana cittalatāvana missakavana
anya-e0301n0:948_16: phārusakavana vimānāniceva devanāṭakānica parivāretvā ṭhitāniviya ahesunti. Kesañci
anya-e0301n0:948_17: pana sayaṃ tattha tattha patvā diṭṭhaṃviya upaṭṭhāti. Kambalayānasadiso mātukucchivaṇṇo
anya-e0301n0:948_18: manussanimittaṃ. Pabbatapāda vanasaṇḍa narakapapātādīni tiracchānagatānaṃ nimittānīti.
anya-e0301n0:948_19: Kammabalenāti idāni paṭisandhiṃ janetuṃ paccupaṭṭhitassa kammassa ānubhāvena. Idañca
anya-e0301n0:948_20: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Pakatiyā pana āciṇṇa bhūtaṃvā taṅkhaṇakataṃvā parena sarāpitaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:948_21: sayameva anussaritaṃvā pakatiyāva kukkuccaṃvā somanassaṃvā janetvā ṭhitaṃvā kammaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:948_22: tassanimittaṃvā aññenapi kāraṇabalena paccupaṭṭhātiye vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tameva tatopaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_23: ārammaṇaṃ ārabbhāti idañca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Tato hi kesañci pathamaṃ kammabalenavā
anya-e0301n0:948_24: kāraṇantarenavā pāpapakkhiyesu upaṭṭhahantesu puna duṭṭha gāmaṇi rañño viya pubbakataṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_25: balavantaṃ puññaṃ anussarantānaṃvā soṇatthera vitu viya taṅkhaṇeyeva pasādajanakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_26: puññaṃ karontānaṃvā pacchā kalyāṇapakkhiyāni upaṭṭhahanti. Tathā kesañci pathamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_27: kalyāṇa pakkhiyesu upaṭṭhahantesu dhammāsokarañño viya pacchā kenaci kāraṇena domanassaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_28: uppādetvā pāpakammassa okāsaṃ karontānaṃ pāpapakkhiyāni upaṭṭhahantīti. Vipaccamānaka
anya-e0301n0:948_29: kammānurūpanti yassa vipaccamānakaṃ kammaṃ kusalaṃ hoti. Tassa parisuddhaṃ kusalacittasantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_30: abhiṇhaṃ pavattati. Yassa taṃ akusalaṃ hoti. Tassa upakiliṭṭhaṃ akusala cittasantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_31: abhiṇhaṃ pavattatīti attho. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi sugatigāmīnaṃ kusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_32: paṇītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpātamāgacchatītica duggatigāmīnaṃ akusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ hīnārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_33: āpāta māgacchatī tica vuttaṃ. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ mahāṭīkāyañca āsanne akusalaṃ duggatiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_34: kusalañca sugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiyā upanissayo hotīti vuttaṃ. Ettha siyā, yadā devaccharādīni
anya-e0301n0:948_35: sagganimittāni upaṭṭhahanti. Tadā tāni taṇhāya assādentasseva sato cavantassa kathanti.
anya-e0301n0:948_36: Vuccate. Upakiliṭṭhaṃyeva tassa cittaṃ. Tasmā duggatieva tassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbāti
anya-e0301n0:948_37: vadanti. Yasmā pana paṭisambhidā magge tādisiyā taṇhāya kusalakammassa sahakāri kāraṇa
anya-e0301n0:948_38: bhāvo vutto. Yathāha-nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalāti. Tasmā sugatibhavanibbattanepi
anya-e0301n0:948_39: ayaṃ taṇhā ekantena kusala kammassa niyāmakasahakāripaccayabhūtāti katvā tassa tānivā
anya-e0301n0:948_40: devaccharādīni kusalakamma kammanimittānivā assādentasseva sato cavantassa sātaṇhā
anya-e0301n0:948_41: tadupatthambhikāeva bhavituṃ arahati. Na taṃ paṭibāhikāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Yañca nimittassādagadhitaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:948_42: bhikkhave viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ vā. Tasmiṃ ce bhikkhave
anya-e0301n0:948_43: samaye kālaṅkareyya, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati. Yaṃ dvinnaṃgatīnaṃ aññataragatiṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0301n0:948_44: nirayaṃvā tiracchāna yoniṃvātiādittapariyāye vuttaṃ. Taṃpi attano paresaṃ vā hatthapādādīsu
anya-e0301n0:948_45: gadhitaṃ taṇhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nakammādīsūti sakkā vattunti. Upalabhitabba bhavānurūpanti
anya-e0301n0:948_46: upalabhitabbo bhavo yadi sugatibhavo hoti, taṃ assādanākārena. Yadi duggatibhavo
anya-e0301n0:948_47: hoti, taṃ anassādanākārenāti evaṃ upalabhi tabbassa bhavassa anurūpaṃ. Tatthoṇataṃvāti
anya-e0301n0:948_48: tasmiṃ yatho paṭṭhite ārammaṇe oṇamantaṃeva. Tathā hi bālapaṇḍitasutte tānissa tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_49: samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha tānissāti assa puggalassa
anya-e0301n0:948_50: tāni puññāpuñña kammāni. Kammasīsena vuttāni kammanimitta gatinimittānica. Olambantīti
anya-e0301n0:948_51: tassa cittasantānaṃ attanieva oṇamantaṃ ajjhoṇamantaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ katvā lambanti
anya-e0301n0:948_52: palambanti. Bandhitvā ākaḍḍhantāni viya upaṭṭhahantīti attho. Evaṃ pana tesu tathā
anya-e0301n0:948_53: olambantesu taṃcittasantānaṃ tesu ninnapoṇapabbhārameva hotīti vuttaṃ tatthoṇataṃvāti.
anya-e0301n0:948_54: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kilesabalavināmitaṃ sutvā tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:948_55: appahīnattā avijjāya paṭicchā ditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti sahajāta saṅkhārā
anya-e0301n0:948_56: khipantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha tanti viññāṇaṃ. Cittasantānaṃ icceva attho. Tasmiṃvisayeti
anya-e0301n0:948_57: kammādiārammaṇe. Taṇhānāmetīti vaṭṭamūlaka taṇhā taṃ tasmiṃ oṇamantaṃ katvā niyojetīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:950: “Tatthoṇataṃvāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ viya oṇataṃeva vā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:951: Abhiṇhanti nirantaraṃ. Tathāpavatti pana saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ eva labbhati. Lahuka maraṇena marantānaṃ pana na labbhatīti vuttaṃ. Bāhullenāti
anya-e0301n0:953: “Bāhullenātiettha adhippāyo yebhuyyena bhavantareti ettha vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:954_0: Na hi tasmiṃ vuttānaṃ asaññisattānaṃ cittasantānassa abhiṇhappagattipasaṅgonāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:954_1: Cittasantānasseva tesaṃ abhāvatoti. Idāni aparena pakārena kammu paṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:954_2: tamevavā pana.La. Dvārapattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:954_3: hotīti pubbe katasaññaṃ ajanetvā taṅkhaṇe eva karaṇākāraṃ janetvā attānaṃ abhinavaṃ
anya-e0301n0:954_4: viya katvā manodvāre taṃsadisajavanappavattivasena pattaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:954_5: Yathā hi imasmiṃbhavepavattaṃ kiñci pākaṭaṃ kammaṃ asukasmiṃ kāle idaṃnāmamayākatanti
anya-e0301n0:954_6: evaṃ pubbekatasaññaṃ janetvāpi upaṭṭhāti. Na tathā bhavantare pavattaṃ bhavapaṭicchannaṃñca
anya-e0301n0:954_7: imasmiṃ bhave pavattaṃ apākaṭañcāti. Apica, idhekacce buddhādīsu tīsu vatthusu dānapūjādivasena
anya-e0301n0:954_8: āciṇṇabahulā honti. Te maraṇanti kābādhabalena visīdappattā kiñci dukkhaṃajānitvā
anya-e0301n0:954_9: visīdantare pubbe viya bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ dentācetiyaṃ vandantā pūjaṃ karontā
anya-e0301n0:954_10: vippasannacittā pamodacittā eva honti. Tabbiparītena pāpakammabahulāpi vattabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:954_11: Idaṃpi dvārapattamevāti. Sabbañcetaṃ lakkhaṇa saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāya dīpetabbaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:954_12: asilomapetādi patthūsu tassa ukkhittāsikabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti ca. Tassa sattiyā
anya-e0301n0:954_13: vijjhanaka bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica. Tassa usunā vijjhanakabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica.
anya-e0301n0:954_14: Tassa patodasūciyā vijjhanakabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica. Tassa sūcīhi patodanadukkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:954_15: paccanubhavituṃ kammameva nimittaṃ katvā sūcilomapeto jātotica evaṃ bahuṃdvāra pattavasena
anya-e0301n0:954_16: kammupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti. Tattha hi tassa ukkhittāsika bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti tassa
anya-e0301n0:954_17: niraye pacitvā puna āsanna maraṇassa taṃkammaṃ tadā tassa ukkhittāsikasaññaṃ janetvā
anya-e0301n0:954_18: dvāra pattavasena nimittaṃ ahosīti attho. Esanayo sesesupīti. Soca dvārappattākāro
anya-e0301n0:954_19: kammakoṭṭhāsiko eva hoti. Tassa sattassaca apākaṭonāma natthīti tassa paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0301n0:954_20: gahaṇayogyatā jātāti. Paccāsanna maraṇassāti antima javanapavattivasena puna āsannamaraṇassa.
anya-e0301n0:954_21: Vīthicittā vasānevāti kāmabhavato cavitvā kāmabhaveyeva uppajjamānānaṃ javana pariyosānānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:954_22: tadārammaṇa pariyosānānaṃvā vīthicittānaṃ avasāne. Itaresaṃ pana javanapariyosānānaṃeva
anya-e0301n0:954_23: vīthicittānaṃ avasāneti attho. Ayamattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi vuttoyeva. Yathāha-taṃ ārabbha
anya-e0301n0:954_24: uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya suddhāyavā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:956: “Tattha kāmabhavato cavitvā tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ tadārammaṇapariyosānāni sesānaṃ javanapariyosānānīti dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:957_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vutte kiṃaparipuṇṇāya dhammā nusāraṇiyāti. Bhavaṅgakkhayevāti
anya-e0301n0:957_1: bhavaṅgāvasānevā iccevattho. Yadi duvidhapīthicittato paraṃ pañcavokāre vatthurūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:957_2: catuvokāre cittasantānaṃ dvicittakkhaṇāyusesaṃ hoti. Tadā ekassa bhavaṅgassa avasāneti
anya-e0301n0:957_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Etthaca somanassa paṭisandhikassa domanassacittena cavantassa āgantukabhavaṅga
anya-e0301n0:957_4: sambhavo. Taṃ sambhaveca sati aññabhavaṅgasambhavopi avāri toti suvuttametaṃ bhavaṅgakkhayevāti.
anya-e0301n0:957_5: Tasmiṃniruddhāvasāneti tasmiṃ niruddhe tassa niruddhassa avasāne. Ye pana loke cuti
anya-e0301n0:957_6: paṭisandhīnaṃ antare eko antarābhavonāma atthi. Yattha uppanno satto dibbacakkhuko
anya-e0301n0:957_7: viya iddhimā viya ca khaṇena icchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samattho. Ito cutā keci tattha
anya-e0301n0:957_8: uppajjitvā mātāpitu samāgamādīni āgamentā sattāhaṃvā atireka sattāhaṃvā tiṭṭhantīti
anya-e0301n0:957_9: laddhiṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ taṃnisedhetuṃ tassānantaramevāti vuttaṃ. Savatthukaṃ pañcavokāre
anya-e0301n0:957_10: avatthukamevavā catuvokāre. Yathārahanti kusalabhūtassavā akusalabhūtassa vā saṅkhārassa
anya-e0301n0:957_11: arahānurūpaṃ. Avijjātaṇhānusayā kusalabhūtassa appahīnaṭṭhena akusalabhūtassa pana
anya-e0301n0:957_12: sahajātabhāvenāpi parivārabhūtā mūlabhūtāca hontīti attho. Pariyuṭṭhānāvatthaṃ apatvā
anya-e0301n0:957_13: kusalābyākatacittasantānenapi aviruddhabhāvena anurūpaṃ. Anubandhamānovā seti, anuanuvānirantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:957_14: setīti anusayo. Anusayabhūtāya avijjāya parikkhittoti avijjānusayaparikkhitto. Taṇhānusayo
anya-e0301n0:957_15: mūlaṃ etassāti taṇhānusaya mūlako. Avijjānusaya mūlakena taṇhānusaya parikkhittenāti
anya-e0301n0:957_16: pana vutte suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati. Avijjā hi taṇhāyapi mūlabhūtā hoti. Tāya paṭicchāditādīnave
anya-e0301n0:957_17: eva ārammaṇe taṇhāpavattisambhavato. Taṇhā ca pana sahakāri kāraṇa bhāvena taṃ taṃ
anya-e0301n0:957_18: saṅkhāraṃ niyojentī pavattatīti saṅkhārassa parivārabhūtā balavaāsanna sahāyabhūtā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:958_0: Etthaca akusalakamma sahajātānaṃvā kammanikanti nimittanikanti sahajātānaṃvā vippaṭisāra
anya-e0301n0:958_1: saha jātānaṃvā maraṇāsanna javana sahajātānaṃvā avijjātaṇhānaṃpi dhammato anusayasadisatāya
anya-e0301n0:958_2: anusaya vohārasambhavo veditabbo. Apica, anusayānāma paṭisandhijanane kusalasaṅkhārassapi
anya-e0301n0:958_3: balavasahāyabhūtā honti. Tasmā idha ekantānusayabhūtāeva pariyattāti kiṃsahajātānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:958_4: gahaṇenāti. Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi taṇhā avijjānaṃ appahīnattāti evaṃ appahīnasaddena
anya-e0301n0:958_6: Taṃ sahajātaphassādidhammasamūhenapivā. Sopi hi upanissayabhāve na paṭisandhiṃ janetiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:958_7: Athavā, saṅkhārenāti maraṇasanna javanaviññāṇa sahajātena cetanāsaṅkhārena. Taṃ sahajāta
anya-e0301n0:958_8: phassādidhammasamūhenapivā. Tadubhayaṃpi hi kammādivisaye khipanaka saṅkhārabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:958_9: paṭisandhiṃ janetīti. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṇhā avijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāya
anya-e0301n0:958_10: paṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti. Sahajātasaṅkhārā khipantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:958_12: phassādayoti vuttaṃ. Sakalena pana vacanena aggamaggena appahīnā avijjākammādivisayevā
anya-e0301n0:958_13: bhavantarevā ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādeti, tathā rūpāyeva taṇhā tadubhayasmiṃ cittasantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:958_14: nāmeti. Yathāvuttasaṅkhārā taṃ tattha khipanti. Tasmiṃ abhinava viññāṇapātubhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:959_0: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti phassādīhi sampayuttadhammehi parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:959_1: Sahajātānanti nāmarūpadhammānaṃ. Adhiṭṭhāna bhāvenāti nissayabhāvena. Pubbaṅgamabhūtanti
anya-e0301n0:959_2: padhānabhūtaṃ. Pada dvayena vijānanadhātuyā ativiya mahānubhāvabhāvaṃ dasseti. Yathā
anya-e0301n0:959_3: hi loke ekasmiṃ mahānubhāve purisavisese jāyamāne parivārabhūtā sahajātajanāca tassa
anya-e0301n0:959_4: upabhoga paribhogabhūtā pāsādakapparukkhādayova tena saha jāyanti. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ
anya-e0301n0:959_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasenāti ekasmiṃbhave niruddhe tena saha nirantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:959_6: katvā bhavantarassa paṭisandahana vasena. Uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti na purimabhave
anya-e0301n0:959_7: uppajjitvā anirujjhitvā ṭhitibhāvena gantvā bhavantare patiṭṭhātīti adhippāyo. Na
anya-e0301n0:959_8: hi uppannuppannā dhammā pakatikālepi desantaraṃvā khaṇantaraṃvāsaṅkantā nāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:959_9: Kuto maraṇakāle bhavantaraṃ. Yañca anamataggo yaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro. Pubbakoṭi napaññāyati
anya-e0301n0:959_10: avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsaratanti vuttaṃ, taṃpi
anya-e0301n0:959_11: pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yesañhi avijjā taṇhāsaṅkhārānaṃ vasena bhavantare paṭisandhi pātubhavati.
anya-e0301n0:959_12: Teca pubbe yassa santāne pavattanti, so tesaṃ hetuphalasambandhena bhavantaraṃ sandhāvati
anya-e0301n0:959_13: saṃsaratīti vuccatīti. Tatoyevaca tassā paṭisandhiyā purimabhavapari yāpannehi hetūhi
anya-e0301n0:959_14: vinā anuppajjanaṃpi siddhaṃ hotīti. Paṭighosa padīpamuddhādīni cettha nidassanānīti.
anya-e0301n0:960_1: mandaṃ hutvā pavattāni. Tasmā paccuppannā lambaṇakā labbhatīti sambandho. Dharantesvevāti
anya-e0301n0:960_2: tiṭṭhantesu eva. Paṭisandhi bhavaṅgānaṃpīti paṭisandhiyāpi katipayabhavaṅgānaṃpi.
anya-e0301n0:960_3: Iti katvāti iminā kāraṇena. Kāmañcettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ gatinimittaṃnāma nibbattanakaokāse
anya-e0301n0:960_4: eko vaṇṇo upaṭṭhātīti vatvā sabbesu gatinimittavāresu gabhinimittaṃ vaṇṇāyatanameva
anya-e0301n0:960_5: manodvāra gahitameva paccuppannamevaca dassitaṃ. Tathāpi chadevalokato attano santikaṃ
anya-e0301n0:960_6: āgate dibbaratheyeva gatinimittaṃ katvā cavantānaṃ dhammikaupāsaka duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayarājādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:960_7: vasena taṃpi kammanimittaṃviya chabbidhaṃpi chadvāragahitaṃpi paccuppannamatītaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:960_8: sambhavatīti adhippāyena taṃkammanimittena nibbisesaṃ katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā.La.
anya-e0301n0:960_9: Upalabbhatīti vuttaṃ. Tathā cavantā hi dibbavaṇṇopi devatānaṃ ānubhāvena cakkhunā
anya-e0301n0:960_10: diṭṭhoyeva hoti. Dibbo rathasaddovā tūriyasaddovā vacanasaddovā sotena sutoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:960_11: Dibbagandhopi ghānena ghāyitoyeva. Nirayato uggatena aggijālena dayhamānakāyena cavantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:960_12: devadatta nandayakkha nandamāṇa vakādīnaṃ khuracakke āsajjamānānaṃ mittavindakādīnañca
anya-e0301n0:960_13: vasena phoṭṭhabbaṃpi sambhavatiyeva. Rasadhammāpi yathā sambhavaṃ yojetabbāti. Vuttañca saccasaṅkhepe –
anya-e0301n0:961: Pañcadvāre siyā sandhi, vinā kammaṃ dvigocareti.
anya-e0301n0:962_0: Mahāṭīkāyaṃpi ayamattho vuttoyeva. Yadā pana antima javanavīthito pubbabhāge yathopaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:962_1: gatinimittaṃ antimajavanassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tadā taṃ atītaṃpi hotiyevāti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:962_2: pana santativasena tassa paccuppannatāva vuttā. Tathā vaṇṇārammaṇabhāvo manodvārena
anya-e0301n0:962_3: gahitabhāvoca yebhuyyena vuttoti veditabbo. Itarathā kammanimittaṃpi paccuppannabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:962_4: pañcadvāreeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitanti taṃpi manodvāragahitaṃ paccuppannabhūtaṃ pañcārammaṇaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:962_5: dhammārammaṇaṃvā nasambhavatīti vattabbaṃ siyā. Naca sakkā tathā vattuṃ. Kasmā, cakkhuṃ
anya-e0301n0:962_6: aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantītiādinā paṭṭhāne vuttassa chaḷārammaṇa bhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:962_7: purejātapaccayassa manodvārika maraṇāsanna javanānampi icchitabbattā. Tatoyevaca
anya-e0301n0:964: Tathā avicāretvā yaṃvuttaṃ “paccuppannārammaṇesu āpātamāgatesu manodvāre gatinimittavasena pañcadvāre kammanimittavasenā”ti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:966: “Chadvāragahitanti kammanimittaṃ chadvāragahitaṃ gatinimittaṃ chaṭṭhadvāragahitanti yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:967: Evañhi sati kammaṃ viya gatinimittaṃpi therena bhinditvā vuttaṃ siyā. Naca taṃ vuttanayena pañcadvāragahitaṃ na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:969_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ mūla ṭīkādīsuca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ sāvasesapāṭhaṃ avicāretvā “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:969_1: pana gatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpātamāgacchatīti vuttattā tadārammaṇāyaca pañcadvārikapaṭisandhiyā
anya-e0301n0:969_2: adassitattā mūlaṭīkādīsuca kamma balena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassaviya
anya-e0301n0:969_3: dibba cakkhussa viyaca manodvāreyeva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:969_4: vacanaṃ nasampaṭicchanti ācariyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthapi asampaṭicchantānaṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:970_0: Paccuppannamatītanti ettha yassa javanāvasānāya pañcadvārikavīthiyā cavanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:970_1: Tassa paṭisandhiyā dvinnañca bhavaṅgānaṃ paccuppannā rammaṇatā upalabbhati. Yassa
anya-e0301n0:970_2: tadārammaṇāvasānāya, tassa paṭisandhiyā eva. Yassa pana javanāvasānāya paccuppannārammaṇāya
anya-e0301n0:970_3: manodvārikavīthiyā cavanaṃ hoti, tassa paṭisandhiyā channañca bhavaṅgānaṃ. Yassa
anya-e0301n0:970_4: pana tadāraṇāvasānāya, tassa paṭisandhiyā catunnañca bhavaṅgānanti. Etthaca ārammaṇe
anya-e0301n0:970_5: bahutarāyuke balavantepi vatthudubbalabhāve sati kāmasattānaṃpi javanāvasānā vīthi
anya-e0301n0:970_6: hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānāya eva yojitattā manodvāre
anya-e0301n0:970_7: paṭisandhito paraṃ catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānaṃ pañcadvāre paṭisandhiyāeva paccuppannārammaṇatā
anya-e0301n0:970_8: vuttā. Tadārammaṇa pariyosānāyavā suddhāyavā javanavīthiyāti vuttattā pana idha javanāvasānāpi yojitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:972: Evaṃ avicāretvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “manodvāre tāva paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānañca pañcadvāre paṭisandhiyāeva paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatī”tiādi. Taṃ anupapannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:973_0: Etthaca yasmā paṭisandhijanakasseva kammassa ārammaṇaṃvā upakaraṇaṃvā kammanimittanti
anya-e0301n0:973_1: adhippetaṃ. Pañcadvārikakammañca paṭisandhijanakameva na hoti. Tasmā tadā paṭisandhijanakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_2: kammaṃ purimabhāgeeva manodvāravasena siddhaṃ hoti. Tassaca ārammaṇabhūtameva upakaraṇabhūtamevavā
anya-e0301n0:973_3: ekantena kammanimittaṃnāma hoti. Yaṃ pana pañcadvārikassa antimajavanassa ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_4: hoti. Taṃ purimena niruddhena ārammaṇena vatthuto abhinnattāvā tassadisattāvā kammanimittanteva
anya-e0301n0:973_5: vuccatīti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pañcadvāre āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_6: kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇa santatiyaṃ uppannaṃ taṃsadisañca daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:973_7: Tattha yesu deyyadhammavatthūsu cetiyādīsuvā yehi satthādīhivā pubbe kammaṃ siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:973_8: Tesaṃ paccakkhe dharamānataṃ sandhāya santatiyaṃ uppannanti vuttaṃ. Tehi sadi savatthūnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_9: dharamānataṃ sandhāya taṃsadisañcāti vuttaṃ. Sadisavatthūnipi hi kammassa laddhokāsakāraṇāni
anya-e0301n0:973_10: hontiyeva. Yathā taṃ ito parittakena pāpakammena niraye ussadasāmante nibbattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_11: pubbe puññakaraṇakāle laddhanimittasadisaṃ nirayaggijālānaṃ saddaṃ sutvāvā vaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:973_12: disvāvā puññaṃ saritvā cavitvā sagge nibbattānaṃ aggijālāni viyāti.
anya-e0301n0:975_0: Mūlaṭīkāpāṭhaṃ avicāretvā taṃsadisañcātiettha naṭṭhacakāraṃ pāṭhaṃ disvā “manodvārika
anya-e0301n0:975_1: javanānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena saha samānattā tadekasantatipatitaṃ cutiāsannajavanagahi
anya-e0301n0:975_2: taṃpi paccuppannaṃ vaṇṇādikaṃ kammanimitta bhāvena vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ anupapannameva.
anya-e0301n0:976_0: Apica, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ aparassa maraṇasamaye ñātakā ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā
anya-e0301n0:976_1: karīyati. Cittaṃ pasādehīti vatvā pupphadāmadhajapaṭākādivasena rūpārammaṇaṃvā dhammasavanatūriyapūjādi
anya-e0301n0:976_2: vasena saddārammaṇaṃvā dhūmavāsagandhādivasena gandhārammaṇaṃvā idaṃ tāva sāyassu,
anya-e0301n0:976_3: tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhammanti vatvā madhuphāṇi tādivasena rasārammaṇaṃvā idaṃ
anya-e0301n0:976_4: tāva phusassu, tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhammanti vatvā cīnapaṭa somārapaṭādivasena
anya-e0301n0:976_5: phoṭṭhabbā rammaṇaṃvā pañcadvāre upasaṃharantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha rūpasaddagandhārammaṇāni
anya-e0301n0:976_6: sandhāya ṭīkāyaṃ santatiyaṃ uppannanti vuttaṃ. Rasaphoṭṭhabbā rammaṇāni sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:976_7: taṃsadisañcāti vuttaṃ. Tāni hi pathamaṃ sāyita phusitāni aññāni honti. Pacchā dinnāni
anya-e0301n0:976_8: aññānīti etthaca evaṃ upasaṃhaṭāni rūpārammaṇādīni pathamaṃ pañcadvārena gahetvā
anya-e0301n0:976_9: acavitvā pacchā puna atthi dāni evarūpānīti suddhena manodvārena gahetvā cavantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:976_10: tāni manodvāragahitāni paccuppannabhūtāni kammanimittāni hontīti veditabbānīti. Pathamatatīyāruppa
anya-e0301n0:976_12: vuttaṃ yathārahanti. Āruppesu uparibhūminibbattānaṃ arūpīnaṃ heṭṭhimajjhānāni paṭipassambhanti.
anya-e0301n0:976_13: Na ca te tāni puna āyūhantīti vuttaṃ heṭṭhimāruppa vajjitāti. Pamādapakkhe patitvā
anya-e0301n0:976_14: vissaṭṭhajjhānānaṃ tatoyevaca appahīnehi orambhāviya saṃyojanehi heṭṭhabhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhita
anya-e0301n0:976_15: mānasānaṃ kāmabhave uppajjamānānaṃ tesaṃ thapetvā tihetu kukkaṭṭhabhūtaṃ upacārajjhānacetanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:976_16: aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ okāsaṃ nalabhatīti vuttaṃ tathā kāmatihetukāti. Tathā hi aṅguttaraṭṭha
anya-e0301n0:976_17: kathāyaṃ-na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃnāma kammaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ. Ṭīkāyañca
anya-e0301n0:976_18: na hi tassa.La. Atthīti iminā tato cavantānaṃ upacārajjhānameva paṭisandhijanakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:976_19: kammanti dīpetīti vuttanti. Rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi pana tesaṃ natthiyeva. Evañca katvā
anya-e0301n0:976_20: yamakearūpadhātuyā cutassa arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassātivā arūpa dhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ
anya-e0301n0:976_21: upapajjantassātivā vuttaṃ. Na pana vuttaṃ arūpadhātuyā cutassa rūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassāti.
anya-e0301n0:976_22: Rūpa lokato cavantānaṃ pana aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ okāsaṃ nalabhatīti navattabbaṃ. Evaṃsantepi
anya-e0301n0:976_23: suṭṭhu vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ tesaṃ appanā pattajjhānavisesena suparibhāvitacittasantānattā
anya-e0301n0:976_24: jaccandhādivipatti janakaṃ dvihetukomakakammaṃpi okāsaṃ na labhati. Kuto apāyagāmikammanti
anya-e0301n0:978: “Upacārajjhānā nubhāveneva duhetuka tihetuka paṭisandhiyo siyu”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:979_0: Yadi hi taṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā. Duhetukapaṭi sandhi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:979_1: Na hi suṭṭhu vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ appanāvīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ tihetukomakaṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:979_2: sambhavatīti. Atha kammantarassa upatthambhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā. Sayaṃ balavatarassapi
anya-e0301n0:979_3: sato paṭisandhiṃ adatvā dubbalassa kammantarassa upatthambhane kāraṇaṃ natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:979_4: Yasmā pana rūpabrahmānaṃ upacārajjhānato aññānipi kāyavacīmanokammakusalāni uppajjantiyeva
anya-e0301n0:979_5: tāniyevaca kānici tihetukomakānipi kānici dvihetukukkaṭṭhānipi bhavanti. Oḷārikānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:979_6: pana nīvaraṇānaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhitattā savipattikapaṭi sandhijanakāni dvihetukomakāni
anya-e0301n0:979_7: tesaṃ nuppajjanti. Aparapariyāya bhūtānica tādisāni tesaṃ okāsaṃ nalabbhanti. Nānārammaṇesuca
anya-e0301n0:979_8: nesaṃ chandovā nikantivā pavattatiyeva. Yena nānākammānipi vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:979_9: Yenaca te cakkhu sotadvārehipi tato cavanti. Tasmā ettha upacārajjhānena kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:979_10: avatvā vuttanayeneva taṃkāraṇaṃ vattuṃ yuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmatihetumhā cutiyā
anya-e0301n0:979_11: paraṃ sabbā vīsati paṭisandhiyo siyuṃ. Itarā duhetukāhetukacutito paraṃ kāmesveva
anya-e0301n0:979_12: bhavesu dasapaṭisandhiyo siyunti yojanā. Evaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe visayappavattiyā saha
anya-e0301n0:979_13: vīthimuttacittānaṃ pavattākāraṃ dassetvā idāni pavattikāle paraṃparabhavesuca dassetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:979_15: anantarakālato. Tamevacittanti tassadise tabbohāro daṭṭhabbo. Yathā tāniyeva osadhānīti.
anya-e0301n0:979_16: Yāva cuticittuppādāti ettha cutiggahaṇena tadāsanna vīthicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:979_17: Asati vīthicittuppādeti antarantarā vīthicittānaṃ uppattiyā asati. Bhavassaaṅgabhāvenāti
anya-e0301n0:979_18: upapattibhavassa aviccheda kāraṇabhāvena. Tasmiṃti avattamāne pacchājātapaccayarahitānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:979_19: rūpadhammānaṃ vassodaka rahitānaṃ taruṇasassānaṃ viya milāta bhāvapattiyā upapattibhavo
anya-e0301n0:979_20: occhijjatīti. Cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati tameva cittanti sambandho. Yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:979_21: eva parivattantā pavattantīti yāva parinibbānacutiyā yathākkamaṃ parivattantā pavattantieva.
anya-e0301n0:979_22: Na pana parasamaye viya kadāci katthaci nivattiṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:981: “Yāva vaṭṭa mūla samucchedā”ti vuttaṃ, vaṭṭamūlasamucchedo vuccati arahattamaggo. Tato paraṃpi yāvakhandhaparinibbānā pavattantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:982_0: Ihāti imasmiṃ bhave. Iccayanti iti ayaṃ. Itisaddo ādiattho. Yathā iha paṭisandhica
anya-e0301n0:982_1: bhavaṅgañca āvajjanādi vīthiyoca cuticāti ayaṃ cittasantati pavattati. Tathā puna
anya-e0301n0:982_2: bhavantarepi sandhibhavaṅgādikā ayaṃcittasantati parivattati parivattamānā pavattatīti
anya-e0301n0:982_3: attho. Idāni yassa vipassanā maggaphalanibbānassa atthāya cittacetasikānaṃ pabhedapavattisaṅgahā
anya-e0301n0:982_4: paṭṭhapiyanti. Tadatthaṃ dassento gāthamāha. Tattha paṭisaṅkhāyāti paṭisaṅkhāna saṅkhātena
anya-e0301n0:982_5: vipassanā ñāṇena punappunaṃ ñatvā. Etanti yathāvuttaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ pabhedapavattividhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:982_6: Adhuvanti aniccaṃ. Adhigantvāti adhigamasaṅkhātena catumaggaññāṇena patilabhitvā
anya-e0301n0:982_7: sacchikatvā. Padanti saupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ. Budhāti paṇḍitā. Suṭṭhu anusaya mattaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:982_8: asesetvā sesakilesehi saddhiṃ ucchinnaṃ yathā vuttesu cittacetasikesu adhisayitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:982_9: taṇhāsineha saṅkhātaṃ bandhanaṃ etehīti susamucchinna sineha bandhanā. Samanti vūpasamanti
anya-e0301n0:982_10: vaṭṭadukkhasantāpā etasminti samo. Anupādisesanibbānaṃ. Essantīti gamissanti. Cirāyāti
anya-e0301n0:982_11: cirakālaṃ. Sundaraṃ adhigamāvahaṃ sīla dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ vataṃ etesanti subbatā.
anya-e0301n0:982_12: Suparisuddhasīlasallekha vuttinoti attho. Cirāya subbatā budhā etaṃ adhuvaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya
anya-e0301n0:982_13: accutaṃ padaṃ adhigantvā susamucchinnasinehabandhanā samaṃ essantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:987_0: 156. Evaṃ cittacetasike dvīhi pabhedappavattīhi dassetvā idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:987_1: dassento ādigātha māha. Tattha etaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti ettāvaṃ. Tena ettavatā. Nipātapadaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:987_2: etaṃ. Hi saddo padapūraṇe. Pabhedoca pavattica pabhedappavattiyo. Tāhi saha ye vattanti
anya-e0301n0:987_3: te sappabhedappavattikā. Ettāvatā sappabhedappavattikā cittacetasikā dhammā mayā
anya-e0301n0:987_4: vibhattā. Idāni rūpaṃ pavuccatīti yojanā. Saṅkhepato uddisanaṃ kathanaṃ samuddeso.
anya-e0301n0:987_5: Samuddiṭṭhassa rūpassa puna vibhajanaṃ vibhāgo. Samuṭṭhāti rūpaṃ etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:987_6: Kammādi. Kalā vuccanti avayavā. Tā appenti pavisanti etthāti kalāpo. Piṇḍīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:987_7: Pavattikkamatoti uppattikkamato. Salakkhaṇato sasambhāratoca mahantāni hutvā bhavanti
anya-e0301n0:987_8: pātubhavantīti mahābhūtāni. Tāni hi attano sabhāvatopi mahantānieva hutvā pātubhavanti
anya-e0301n0:990_0: Na hi sasambhāravatthuvaseneva tesaṃ ayaṃ vohāro pavattoti sakkā vattuṃ. Naca salakkhaṇato
anya-e0301n0:990_1: mahattena vinā tesaṃ sasambhārato mahattaṃnāma sambhavatīti. Tasmā yaṃ tesaṃ indriyānindriyabaddhasantānesu
anya-e0301n0:990_2: pathavipabbatādivasena samudde macchakacchapādivasena sasambhārato mahattaṃ. Taṃpi
anya-e0301n0:990_3: salakkhaṇamahattamūlakamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahābhūtātivā loke visaṃvāda kaṭṭhena māyākārāvā
anya-e0301n0:990_4: āvisanagahaṇesu acinteyyaṭṭhānaṭṭhena yakkhādayovā vañcakaṭṭhena yakkhiniyovā vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:990_5: Tenevaṭṭhena tehi sadisattā imānipi mahābhūtāviyāti mahābhūtāni. Ubhayatthapica mahantāni
anya-e0301n0:992_0: Yakkhiniṃ visuṃ upamāmattaṃ katvā “manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānā dīhivā sattānaṃ vañcikā yakkhinīādayo
anya-e0301n0:992_1: viya manāpa itthipurisarūpadassanādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni abhūtāni etesūti
anya-e0301n0:992_2: mahābhūtāti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ aṭṭhakathā ya na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:993_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi mahābhūtasāmaññatoti padassa vitthāre eva māyākāro yakkho yakkhinīti
anya-e0301n0:993_1: tayo mahābhūtā vuttāti. Catunnañcamahābhūtānanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Upādāyāti
anya-e0301n0:993_2: daḷhaṃ nissāya. Pavattanti pāṭhaseso. Upādāya rūpantivā samāsapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:995: “Upādāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:996_0: Na hi imasmiṃ pāṭhe katthaci yakāraviraho diṭṭho. Tathā hi mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upādāyati
anya-e0301n0:996_1: nissayatīti upādāyaṃ. Tameva rūpantipi vuttaṃ. Pathayatīti pathavī. Sahajātarūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:996_2: patiṭṭhāna bhāvena pakkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti attho. Puthu mahantī hutvā jāyatītipi pathavī.
anya-e0301n0:996_3: Pakārena thavīyati sabbesaṃ rūpasambhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā. Ayaṃ tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānā
anya-e0301n0:996_4: patiṭṭhānā vatthubhūtā bhūmi bhūtātiādinā nānāppakārena guṇapadena abhitthavīyatīti
anya-e0301n0:996_5: pathavī. Sāeva nisattanijīvaṭṭhena dhātūti pathavīdhātu. Āpeti sahajātarūpāni byāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:996_6: tiṭṭhati, appāyati vā tāni suṭṭhu brūheti vaḍḍhetīti āpo. Tānivā avippakiṇṇāni katvā
anya-e0301n0:996_7: bhuso pāti rakkhati, pivativā vivanto viya tāni saṅgaṇhati sampiṇḍetīti āpo. Soyeva
anya-e0301n0:996_8: dhātūti āpodhātu. Te jati tikkhabhāvena samujjalanto viya sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhe
anya-e0301n0:996_9: pakāsati, tejetivā niseti sahajātadhamme tikkhathāma bale karoti, paripācetivā usmāpetīti
anya-e0301n0:996_10: tejo, so eva dhātūti tejodhātu. Vāyati samīreti desantaruppatti hetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghāṭaṃ
anya-e0301n0:996_11: desantaraṃ gametīti vāyo. Vāyati vā sahajātadhamme apatamāne katvā vahatīti vāyo.
anya-e0301n0:996_12: Soeva dhātūti vāyodhātu. Tattha kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavī. Ābandhanalakkhaṇo āpo.
anya-e0301n0:996_13: Uṇhattalakkhaṇo tejo. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇo vāyo. Ettha siyā, kasmā pathavī kakkhaḷalakkhaṇāti
anya-e0301n0:996_14: vuttā. Nanu sā mudubhūtāpi hotīti. Saccaṃ, mudubhūtāpi pana sā sesabhūtattayaṃ upādāya
anya-e0301n0:996_15: kakkhaḷā tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Aññamaññaṃ upādāyeva pana ayaṃmudu ayaṃ kakkhaḷāti
anya-e0301n0:996_16: bhavati. Teneva mudukakkhaḷānaṃ dīgharassānaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānatā hoti. Mudubhūtāpi
anya-e0301n0:996_17: hi tato mudutaraṃ patvā kakkhaḷānāma jātā. Kakkhaḷāpi kakkhaḷataraṃ patvā mudubhūtānāma
anya-e0301n0:996_18: jātāti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇo āpoti vutto. Soca pakatiudake adhimattoti pakatiudakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:996_19: baddhaṃ ghanībhūtameva siyāti ce. Na. Ābandhitabbāya pathaviyā tattha paridubbalattāti,
anya-e0301n0:996_20: yattha pana pathavī balavatī hoti tattheva so baddhataraṃ ābandhatīti. Uṇhatta lakkhaṇo
anya-e0301n0:996_21: tejoti vutto. Evañcasati sītabhāvo tejoyeva na siyāti ce. Na. Usati dahati paripāceti
anya-e0301n0:996_22: pariṇa tabhāvaṃ gametīti uṇhonāma. Sītabhāvoca dahati paripāceti tabbhāvaṃ gametiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:996_23: Vuttañca mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tejoeva hi sītaṃ. Himapātasamayādīsu sītassa paripācakatādassana
anya-e0301n0:996_24: toti. Vitthambhana lakkhaṇo vāyoti vutto. So pana ghana thaddhesu silāthambhādīsu
anya-e0301n0:996_25: nalabbhatīti ce. Na. Tattha hi pathavī attanā sahajātavāyuvitthambhanaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0301n0:996_26: thāmappattā thiratarappattāca hutvā vahatīti. Cakkhatīti cakkhu. Samavisamaṃ ācikkhati
anya-e0301n0:996_27: samavisamajānanassa tammūlakattā. Rūpaṃvā assādeti āpātaṃ āgatāgatassa rūpassa anirākaraṇato.
anya-e0301n0:996_28: Taṃvā vibhāvetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Suṇanti suyyantivā ete nāti sotaṃ. Ghāyatīti
anya-e0301n0:996_29: ghānaṃ. Ghāyanti ghāyiyantivā etenāti ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittaṃ raso jīvitanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:996_30: Tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Athavā. Jīvitaṃ vahati etāyavā taṃ vahanti
anya-e0301n0:996_31: pavattenti jīvitavuttisampādanattāti jivhā. Jītivā jayo parājayovā vuccati. Tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:996_32: vahati vahantivā etāyāti jivhā. Sasambhārajivhā. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:997: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudārī jāyate mukhe;
anya-e0301n0:998: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, naro dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:999_0: Idha pana taṃ sahacaritattā jivhāti pasādarūpamo vuccati. Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ pāpadhammānañca
anya-e0301n0:999_1: āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo. Sasambhārakāyo. Idha pana taṃ sahacarito pasāda kāyoeva
anya-e0301n0:999_2: adhippeto. Pasīdantīti pasādā. Pasīdanti vā ettha candamaṇḍalādīni ārammaṇanimittāni
anya-e0301n0:999_3: tattha saṃsīdamānāni viya sarūpato sandissantīti pasādā, suparisuddhaādāsamaṇḍasadisā
anya-e0301n0:999_4: kammajamaṇḍā. Ime pana pañca daṭṭhukāmatādi nidāna kammasamuṭṭhāna bhūtapasāda lakkhaṇā
anya-e0301n0:999_5: rūpādi abhighātāraha bhūtapasādalakkhaṇā vā cakkhupasādādayo daṭṭhabbā. Tattha cakkhu
anya-e0301n0:999_6: tāva setamaṇḍala parikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe ūkāsirapamāṇe atimukhe ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_7: sarīrasaṇṭhānuppatti padesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale telamiva sattapicupaṭalāni sattaakkhipaṭalāni
anya-e0301n0:999_8: byāpetvā tiṭṭhati. Sotaṃ sotabilabbhantare aṅguliveṭhanākāraṃ upacitatanutambalomaṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_9: padesaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhati. Ghānaṃ nāsikabbhantare ajapadasaṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:999_10: tiṭṭhati. Jivhā sasambhāra jivhāmajjhe uppala dalagga saṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:999_11: tiṭṭhati. Kāyo pana mahanti yā kappāsa paṭalavaṭṭiyaṃ āsittatelaṃviya thapetvā pācaka
anya-e0301n0:999_12: tejassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ kesagga lomagga nakhagga sukkhacammānica avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_13: byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti. Te pana pañca yathārahaṃ pañcadvārikacittānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_14: sādhenti. Tesuca ekekassa catasso catasso dhātuyo sandhāraṇaābandhana paripācana
anya-e0301n0:999_15: samudīraṇa kiccehi upakāraṃ karonti. Yathākhatti yakumārassa catasso dhātiyo dhāraṇa
anya-e0301n0:999_16: nahāpana maṇḍana bījana kiccehīti. Utucittāhārāca naṃ upatthambhenti. Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_17: pitu jeṭṭhabhātu jeṭṭhabhaginiyoviya. Āyuca naṃ suṭṭhu anupāleti. Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_18: disāpāmokkho rājasammato mahābhisakkoviya. Vaṇṇādayoca naṃ parivārenti. Yathā taṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_19: khattiyakumāraṃ sahajātā amaccaputtā viyāti. Yasmā pana sattānaṃ cittaṃ nāma vicittaṃ
anya-e0301n0:999_20: hoti. Cittavicittatāya saññāvicittā. Saññāvicittatāya taṇhāvicittā. Taṇhāvicitta
anya-e0301n0:999_21: tāya kammāni vicittāni. Kammavicittatāya kammasamuṭṭhānāni bhūtāni vicittāni. Bhūtavicittatāya
anya-e0301n0:999_22: ime pasādā vicittā. Aññamaññaṃ asadisā honti. Tehi pasādamaṇḍabhūtāpi samānā keci
anya-e0301n0:999_23: rūpasseva abhighātārahā honti, na saddādīnaṃ. Keci saddādīnaṃ eva, na rūpassāti.
anya-e0301n0:999_24: Tasmā tesaṃ aññamaññañca aññarūpehica lakkhaṇato asaṃmissatā veditabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:1000_0: Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Vaṇṇavisesaṃ āpajjitvā hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāseti. Pakatiyāpi vā
anya-e0301n0:1000_1: yaṃkiñcidabbaṃ samavisamaṃvā pakāse tīti attho. Sappati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0301n0:1000_2: saddo. Saddayatīti saddo. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃvā attano vatthuṃvā ācikkhatīti attho. Sadativā
anya-e0301n0:1000_3: taṃ taṃ disaṃvā desaṃvā khaṇena vissarati vippharatīti saddo. Gandhayatīti gandho.
anya-e0301n0:1000_4: Attano vatthuṃsūcetīti attho. Gacchatīti go. Vāto. Tena dhārīyatīti gandho. Rasīyati
anya-e0301n0:1000_5: assādīyatīti raso. Rasantivā taṃ assādentīti raso. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Phusanañcettha
anya-e0301n0:1000_6: pasādena saha ghaṭṭanaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi saddhiṃ paṭihananañca veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1000_7: āpo dhātuyā natthīti vuttaṃ āpodhātuvivajjitanti. Kasmā pana taṃ tassā natthi. Nanu
anya-e0301n0:1000_8: sītatāvā dravatāvā phusitvā gayhatīti. Vuccate, sītatā hi tejoyeva, na āpo. Yadi
anya-e0301n0:1000_9: hi sā āpoyeva siyā. Pakkumite santatte loharasepissa sītatā labbhamānā siyā. So hi
anya-e0301n0:1000_10: raso āpādhiko hotīti. Evaṃ pana nalabbhati. Tasmā sā tejoyeva, na āpoti. Apica, sītuṇhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1000_11: ekasmiṃ kalāpe saha appavattanato orapārānaṃ viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānatoca viññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1000_12: Na hi sītakalāpe uṇhaṃ, uṇhakalāpevā sītaṃ saha pavattati. Yasmiṃca vatthumhi pubbe
anya-e0301n0:1000_13: sītasaññā saṇṭhāti. Pacchā tato sītatare āgate tasmiṃyeva puna uṇhasaññā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1000_14: Pubbe uṇhasaññāyaṃpi eseva nayo. Tathā uṇhe mande sītasaññā saṇṭhāti. Sīte mande uṇhasaññāti.
anya-e0301n0:1001_0: Atha pana dravabhāvabhūto āpo phusitvā gayhati. Ayo piṇḍādīsu ābandhanabhūtopi phusitvāva
anya-e0301n0:1001_1: gayheyya. Evañca sati yathā tesu itarāni tīṇi bhūtāni vinā itarītarena visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1001_2: kāyika sukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni honti. Tathā sopi vinā itarehi visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1001_3: ārammaṇabhūtoeva siyā. Na pana hoti. Yañhi tāni ayopiṇḍādīni phusantānaṃ kāyikaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1001_4: sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā uppajjati, taṃ saṇhathaddhatā vasenavā uppajjati. Sītuṇhatāvasenavā
anya-e0301n0:1001_5: abbhantarathambhanassa mandagāḷhatāvasenavā. No aññathāti. Tasmā purimabhāge tīṇi
anya-e0301n0:1001_6: bhūtāni phusitvāvā vaṇṇaṃ disvāvā pacchā bhāge suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena dīgharassādisaṇṭhānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1001_7: rattiyaṃ alātacakkaṃ vā taṃtaṃchiddavivaraṃvā jānantā viya pathamaṃ dravatāsahitāni
anya-e0301n0:1001_8: vilīnāni mudūni tīṇi bhūtāni pathaviṃ eva vā phusitvā pacchā suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena
anya-e0301n0:1001_9: visuṃ dravabhāvaṃ addatintabhāvaṃ jānanti. Evaṃ santepi taṃ phusitvā jānantā icceva
anya-e0301n0:1001_10: maññanti avisesavidunoti. Gunnaṃ abhiṇhaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro. Gocarasadisattā idha
anya-e0301n0:1001_11: gocaro. Gotivā idha cakkhādīni indriyāni vuccanti. Tāni viññāṇādhiṭṭhitāni hutvā
anya-e0301n0:1001_12: etesu caranti. Etānivātesu caranti pavattanti ghaṭṭentīti gocarā. Teyeva idha ekattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1001_13: upanetvā gocararūpanti vuttaṃ. Imānipana pañca yathākkamaṃ cakkhādīsu paṭihanana
anya-e0301n0:1002_0: Itthī vuccati avisadākārasaṇṭhitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Yassa pana dhammassa ānubhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1002_1: taṃ tathā saṇṭhāti pavattati. So itthi yā bhāvoti itthattaṃ. Puriso vuccati visadākārasaṇṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1002_2: khandhapañcakaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Tattha itthiliṅga itthinimitta itthi kutta
anya-e0301n0:1002_3: itthākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ itthattaṃ. Purisaliṅga purisanimitta purisakutta
anya-e0301n0:1002_4: purisākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ purisattaṃ. Tattha liṅganti padhānaṅgabhūtaṃ mahāsaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1002_5: Nimittanti paccaṅgabhūtaṃ khuddakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kuttanti kīḷālilādi kriyāviseso. Ākappoti
anya-e0301n0:1002_6: gamanādiko ākāravikāro. Sabbepete khandhapañcakassa pavattivisesāeva. Ye saddasatthesu
anya-e0301n0:1002_7: liṅganti vuccanti. Yesañca vasena ayaṃ itthīeva, na puriso. Ayaṃ purisoeva, na itthīti
anya-e0301n0:1002_8: sañjānanti. Yasmā panettha saṇṭhānādīnaṃ avisadādibhāvoeva atthato itthipurisatā
anya-e0301n0:1002_9: hoti. Tadubhayamuttabhāvoca napuṃsakatā. Soca akkharapada saṅkhātesu vacanesu ca
anya-e0301n0:1002_10: vacanatthesuca yathārahaṃ sandissatiyeva. Tasmā indriyarahitesupi padesuca rukkhādīsu
anya-e0301n0:1004: “Itthīnaṃ aṅgajātaṃ itthiliṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1005: Na hi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsuca nimittasaddoviya liṅgasaddo aṅgajāte pākaṭo diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n0:1008_0: Na hi liṅgasaddo viya ākappasaddo saṇṭhāne pākaṭo diṭṭhoti. Sesaṃpana tattha vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1008_1: yaṃkiñci aṭṭhakathāya asamentaṃpi tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva. Bhavanti pavattanti
anya-e0301n0:1008_2: taṃsahite khandhasantāne esā itthī, eso purisoti evaṃ pavattā sadda buddhiyo etenāti
anya-e0301n0:1008_3: bhāvo bhavantivā pātubhavanti taṃsahite khandhasantāne liṅgādīni etasmiṃ satīti bhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1008_4: So eva rūpanti bhāvarūpaṃ. Hadanti sattā taṃtaṃatthaṃvā anatthaṃvā pūrenti etenāti
anya-e0301n0:1008_5: hadayaṃ. Hadantivā sattā ito nānāvikakke osajanti muñcantīti hadayaṃ. Harantivā pariharanti
anya-e0301n0:1008_6: taṃ sattā jīvitaṃviya dayanti rakkhanticāti hadayaṃ. Vasanti nivasanti cittaceta
anya-e0301n0:1008_7: sikādhammā etthāti vatthu. Hadayañca taṃ vatthucāti hadayavatthu. Dhātudvayanissayalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1008_8: vatthurūpaṃ. Taṃ pana hadayakosabbhantare aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0301n0:1008_9: veditabbaṃ. Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana desanābhedarakkhanatthaṃ avatvā paṭṭhāneeva taṃ
anya-e0301n0:1008_10: vuttaṃ. Yathāha-vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu akusalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1008_11: khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayotiādi. Etthaca chahi vatthūhi aññaṃ vatthunāma
anya-e0301n0:1008_12: natthi. Tesuca purimāni pañca kusalādīnaṃ nissayāeva na honti. Tasmā tesaṃ nissayabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1008_13: tattha vuttaṃ vatthunāma visuṃ ekaṃ vatthurūpamevāti siddhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1010_0: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti pāṭhassa uddhaṭattā rūpasāmaññapasaṅgo hotīti taṃ visodhetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1010_1: yuttināma vuttā. Paṭṭhāne pana bahūsu anaññasādhāraṇesu ṭhānesu vatthunāmena visesetvā
anya-e0301n0:1011_0: Jīvanti sahajātadhammā yenāti jīvitaṃ. Tesaṃ jīvane ādhipaccayogena tesu indaṃ issaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:1011_1: attānaṃ karotīti indriyaṃ. Jīvitañca taṃ indriyañcāti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sahajātā nupālana
anya-e0301n0:1011_2: lakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Yathā hi bījanibbattāni uppalādīni bījevinaṭṭhepi udakānupālitāni
anya-e0301n0:1011_3: ciraṃpi kālaṃ jīvanti. Evamevaṃ niruddha kammanibbattāni kammajarūpāni kamme asantepi
anya-e0301n0:1011_4: jīvitānupālitāni santativasena vassasataṃpi vassasahassaṃpi kappaṃpi soḷasakappasahassānipi
anya-e0301n0:1011_5: jīvantiyeva, tathā hi jīvitarahitāni itararūpāni jīvantānināma nahonti. Tāni hi yena
anya-e0301n0:1011_6: ekena cittenavā utunāvā āhārenavā jāyanti. Tasmiṃ niruddhe nirujjhanti, paraṃ muhuttamattaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1011_7: santānaṃ ghaṭetuṃ nasakkonti. Tesu hi cittajarūpānaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ ekavīthi
anya-e0301n0:1011_8: ekajavanavāra ekasamāpattivārena paricchinnaṃ hoti. Utujāhārajānañca sabhāgeka utuāhāra
anya-e0301n0:1011_9: vasena paricchinnaṃ hoti. Kammajarūpānaṃ pana visuṃ santatipaccuppannaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1011_10: Tesaṃ ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ addhāpaccuppannameva hotīti. Yadi evaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1011_11: kathanti. Tehi jīvitayogena jīvantāeva honti. Evaṃsantepi tesaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1011_12: dissatīti. Vuccate, arūpadhammesu vipākāni tāva kammajarūpasadisāni. Tānipi hi asati
anya-e0301n0:1011_13: vīthicittuppāde yāvajīvaṃpi ekasantativasena pavattissantiyeva. Itarāni pana yassa
anya-e0301n0:1011_14: ārammaṇassa āpātāgatattā uppajjanti. Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadabhāvepi tadārammaṇā bahū
anya-e0301n0:1011_17: vattabbo. Teneva hi kilesasīsaṃ avijjā. Pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1013_0: Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādiyeva uppattiyāpi ṭhitiyāpi kāraṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā, taṅkhaṇe dharamānattā.
anya-e0301n0:1013_1: Kamma jānaṃ pana kammaṃ uppattiyāeva kāraṇaṃ, na ṭhitiyā. Kasmā, taṅkhaṇābhāvato.
anya-e0301n0:1013_2: Jīvitena pana anupālitattā eva tesaṃ khaṇaṭṭhiti siddhāti iminā dhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1013_3: “yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnaṃpi hi sahajātānaṃ pavattihetubhāvena anupālakaṃ. Na
anya-e0301n0:1013_4: hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ hoti. Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya kammassa taṅkhaṇābhāva
anya-e0301n0:1014_0: Dhammānañhi khaṇaṭṭhitināma ekakalāpagatasahajātapaccayā yattāeva hoti. Na nānākalāpagatajanakapaccayāyattā.
anya-e0301n0:1014_1: Itarathā uppādakkhaṇe labbhamānānaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ viya ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhamānāya
anya-e0301n0:1014_2: jaratāyapi kutocisamuṭṭhānatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā siyāti. Apica, khaṇaṭṭhitināma sabhāvasiddhāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1014_3: Na hi uppannā dhammā paccayavekallena attano khaṇesu paripuṇṇaṃ aṭṭhatvā antarāva
anya-e0301n0:1014_4: bhijjantīti atthi. Naca paccayādhimattena atire kataraṃ tiṭṭhantīti atthi. Tasmā
anya-e0301n0:1014_5: khaṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ upatthambhayamānāpi āhārādayo anupālayamānañca jīvitaṃ pacchā balavarūpasantati
anya-e0301n0:1014_6: pavattiatthāyaeva upatthambhenti pāletica. Na khaṇaṭṭhitipavattiyāti. Ettāvatā sabbesaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1014_7: khaṇaṭṭhitināma dharamānajanakāyattā vā jīvitāyattāvā nahotīti siddhaṃ hoti. Yadi
anya-e0301n0:1014_8: pana taṃ santatipavattimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃsati yujjeyyāti. Aṭṭha kathāyaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1014_9: santepica anupālana lakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ tedhamme pāletītiādivacane
anya-e0301n0:1014_10: yathāsantatiṭṭhiti labbhati. Tathā vicāretvā gahetabbāti. Idaṃ pana pācakagginā saha
anya-e0301n0:1014_11: sakalaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti. Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharīyati
anya-e0301n0:1014_12: ajjhoharīyatīti āhāro. Kabaḷīkāroca so āhārocāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Kabaḷīkāro āhārotipi
anya-e0301n0:1014_13: pāṭho. Idañca savatthuka vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Athavā, kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1014_14: attabhāvaṃ bhuso harati addhānaṃ pavattetīti āhāro. Khajja bhojjādike kabaḷīkāre
anya-e0301n0:1014_15: āhāro tannissitattā tappariyā pannattācāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Imasmiṃatthe sati nibbattita
anya-e0301n0:1014_16: ojā eva labbhati. Atthato pana aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sārabhūto upatthambhabalakāro
anya-e0301n0:1014_17: bhūtanissito paramasiniddhasi neho idha āhārarūpaṃnāma. Tattha aṅgamaṅgānusārino
anya-e0301n0:1014_18: rasassāti ajjhoharitvā āmāsaye patiṭṭhitāni āhāravatthūni pācakatejena vivecitāni
anya-e0301n0:1014_19: rasādibhāvena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchanti. Tattha paṇīta siniddha lahuka sineha koṭṭhāso
anya-e0301n0:1014_20: rasonāma. Ye loke rasadhātūti vuccati. So pācaka tejabalena tato uttaritvā rasaharaṇidhamanijālānusārena
anya-e0301n0:1014_21: heṭṭhāca uddhañca sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaranto anupharanto aṅgamaṅgānusārīti
anya-e0301n0:1014_22: vuccati. Tassa sārabhūto upatthambhaṃ balaṃ karotīti upatthambhabalakāro. So hi āmāsaye
anya-e0301n0:1014_23: patiṭṭhita mattova sakalasarīre bhūtesu upatthambhakabalaṃ janetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1016: “Aṅgamaṅgā nasāri rasahara saṅkhātāti” pāṭho. So duppāṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1017_0: Taṃ pana sendriyakāyopatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ āhārarūpaṃ. Ojālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Tattha udayati
anya-e0301n0:1017_1: pasavatīti ojā. Avasaddovā rakkhaṇe. Rakkhaṇañcettha upatthambhanameva. Avati janeticāti
anya-e0301n0:1017_2: ojā. Kiṃ avati. Attano nissayavatthuṃ. Kiṃca janeti. Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ. Udayānantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_3: rūpaṃ janetīti ojātipi vadanti. Aññāpadesarahitena kakkhaḷattādinā attano bhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1017_4: siddhaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ. Uppādādinā aniccatādināca saṅkhahalakkhaṇena sahitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_5: rūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ. Ujukatova kammādīhi paccayehi nipphāditaṃ rūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1017_6: Ruppanalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nippariyāyarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ. Yathā dukkhadukkhaṃ ajjhattaajjhattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1017_7: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇayutta tāya aniccatādikaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā sammasanārahaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_8: sammasanarūpaṃ. Te te dabbasambhārāvā rūpakalāpāvā visuṃvisuṃ bhuso kāsanti pakāsanti
anya-e0301n0:1017_9: etenāti ākāso. Nisatta nijīvaṭṭhena dhātu. Ākāsasaṅkhātā dhātūti ākāsadhātu. Parito
anya-e0301n0:1017_10: samantato chindati kalāpantarabhūtāni kalāpantara bhūtehi saddhiṃ asaṃmissaṃ ekattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_11: anupagamanaṃ karotīti paricchedo. Tehivā paricchindīyati attanovā paresaṃvā akatvāmajjhe
anya-e0301n0:1017_12: visuṃ thapīyati. Tesaṃvā chiddavivaramattabhūto. Na visuṃ eko uppādasahito sabhāvadhammo.
anya-e0301n0:1017_13: Nāpi kassaci rūpakalāpassa pakkhabhūtoti paricchedo. Vikāralakkhaṇarūpāni hi asabhāvadhammabhūtānipi
anya-e0301n0:1017_14: taṃtaṃ rūpakalāpesu sandissamānatā taṃtaṃrūpakalāpapakkhikānieva honti. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0301n0:1017_15: tehi rūpa kalāpehi sabbaso vimuttabhāvena bahibhūtattā kassaci rūpa kalāpassa pakkhabhūto
anya-e0301n0:1017_16: na hotīti. Asabhāvadhammattāca pana kenaci rūpena phusana pariyāyopi tassa sabbaso
anya-e0301n0:1017_17: natthīti katvā so asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_18: pana ghanapiṇḍavatthūsu paṭighaphoṭṭhabbasabhāvānaṃ nānā kalāpagatabhūtānaṃ aññamaññasaṃphuṭṭhatā
anya-e0301n0:1017_19: atthīti katvā asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ kaṃthitanti
anya-e0301n0:1017_20: vuttaṃ. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana ayaṃ niddeso ajaṭākāsaniddeso nahoti, paricchedarūpaniddesoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1017_21: Soca ghanapiṇḍa vatthūsueva veditabbo. Tesuca bhūtānaṃ asaṃphuṭṭhatānāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1017_22: Tasmā bhūtānaṃ aññamaññaabyāpitā ekattaṃ anupagatatāeva. Tattha asaṃphuṭṭhatānāma
anya-e0301n0:1017_23: yuttā siyāti adhippāyena abyāpikatā hi asaṃphuṭṭhatāti vuttaṃ. Atthato pana nānākalāpagatānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_24: bhūtānaṃ pariyantatā saṅkhāto antarāḷadhammo. Rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇaṃ paricchedarūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1017_25: Yā pana calamānena kāyaṅgena attānañca attasamaṅgino puggalassa adhippāyañca paccakkhe
anya-e0301n0:1017_26: ṭhite jane viññāpeti pākaṭaṃ katvā dasseti. Sayañca tena kāyaṅgena tehi janehi viññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1017_27: Sā kāyaviññattināma. Yā uccārīyamānena vācaṅgena saddena attānañca attasamaṅgino
anya-e0301n0:1017_28: puggalassa adhippāyañca sotapathe ṭhite jane viññāpeti. Sayañca tenavācaṅgena tehi
anya-e0301n0:1017_29: janehi viññāyati. Sā vacīviññattināma. Athavā, viññāpenti janā viññāyantivā janehi
anya-e0301n0:1017_30: aññamaññassa cittāni etāyāti viññatti. Sasambhāre aṅgapaccaṅgabhūte kāye pavattā
anya-e0301n0:1017_31: viññatti kāyaviññatti. Copana kāyasaṅkhāto kāyo evavā viññatti kāyaviññatti. Cittajasaddasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0301n0:1017_32: vācāya pavattā viññatti vacīviññatti. Copanavācā saṅkhātā vācā evavā viññatti vacīviññatti.
anya-e0301n0:1017_33: Tattha cittavasena yaṃkiñci kāyaṅgavikāraṃ karontassa taṃtaṃaṅgaṃ santambhantā sandhārentā
anya-e0301n0:1017_34: cālentā aṅgamaṅgānusārisaṅkhātā cittajavātakalāpā taṃtaṃaṅgaṃ pūretvā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1017_35: Uppajjantāca yathāvā tathāvā anuppajjitvā yassa tehi cittajavātakalāpeti sahajātassa
anya-e0301n0:1017_36: copanakāyassa ānubhāvena sabbe te kalāpā yathādhippetadisābhimukhāeva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1017_37: Ayaṃ copanakāyasaṅkhāto ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti nāma. Niyāmakasadisī hi ayaṃ kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0301n0:1017_38: Teca nāvāsadi sāti. Yathā hi niyāmako nāvāya mūlabhāge ṭhatvā ekaṃ mahāphiyaṃ daḷhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_39: gahetvā nadisote cāretvā sakalaṃ mahānāvaṃ icchitadisābhimukhaṃ niyojeti. Na yaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1017_40: taṃvā disaṃ gantuṃ deti. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekacittakkhaṇikā hi viññatti
anya-e0301n0:1017_41: tesaṃ mūlabhāgeeva labbhamānā te yathādhippetadisābhimukhe evaṃ katvā niyojetīti
anya-e0301n0:1017_42: sā niyāmakasadisī hotīti. Etthaca yadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu
anya-e0301n0:1017_43: javanesu pathama javanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu attanā sahajātarūpakāyaṃ saṃthambhetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_44: sandhāretuṃ sakkoti. Aparāparaṃ pana cāletuṃ nasakkoti. Dutīyādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0301n0:1017_45: Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahicittehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_47: cāletuṃ abhikkamāpetuṃ sakkotīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ abhikkamāmīti kāyaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ anekasahassesu
anya-e0301n0:1017_48: javana vāresu pavattamānesu yasmiṃvāre calanasaṅkhātaṃ desantarapāpanaṃ jāyati, taṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_49: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi katipayajavanavārehi calanaṃ jāyati. Yadi jāyeyya, iddhimantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_50: iddhiyāgamanaṃ viya sabbesaṃpi sīghataraṃ gamanaṃ paññāyeyya. Kasmā, ekaccharakkhaṇepi
anya-e0301n0:1017_51: anekakoṭisatasahassacikkapavattiyā sambhavato. Ayañca attho upari akkharuppattivicāraṇāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_52: pākaṭo bhavissatīti. Tasmā tato purimavāresu saṃthambhanasandhāraṇānieva sampajjantīti
anya-e0301n0:1017_53: veditabbaṃ. Yā cettha sattayugasakaṭopamā vuttā, sāpi nānājavanavīthīsu samuṭṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_54: vāyodhātūnaṃ aparāparaṃ upatthambhaneca yujjatiyeva. Tathā hi calanacittajarūpasantatiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_55: pavattāni utujarūpasaṅghāṭānipi viññattisahitāni viya tadākāravantāni savegāni savipphārānieva
anya-e0301n0:1017_56: pavattanti. Tasmā pubbāparapavattānaṃ nānā javanavīthīnaṃ antarantarā bhavaṅgasamayesupi
anya-e0301n0:1017_58: ekassa visaye itarāni ekasamuṭṭhānāni viya sabbaso tadanu parivattīni hontīti cittaje
anya-e0301n0:1017_59: calante itarānipi calanti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Calanañcettha pacchimapacchimānaṃ rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_60: purima purimānaṃ uppannadesato desantare yathāpavattasannivesākārena aparāparaṃ uppajjamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_61: veditabbaṃ. Na hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppanna dese anirujjhitvā kesaggamattaṃpi desantara
anya-e0301n0:1017_62: saṅkamanaṃnāma atthi. Itarathā khaṇikadhammatā abyāpāradhammatā avasavattitāca tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_63: nasiyāti. Yaṃkiñci vacībhedaṃ karontassa kaṇṭhaṭṭhānādi gataupādinnaka pathavīdhātūsu
anya-e0301n0:1017_65: sahevayo vacīghosasaṅkhāto cittajasaddo jāyati. So yena attanā saha jātena ākāravikārena
anya-e0301n0:1017_66: yathādhippāyaṃ taṃtaṃ vaṇṇavisesattaṃ upagacchati. Yenaca suṇantānaṃ taṃtaṃatthajotako
anya-e0301n0:1017_67: akkharasannipātabhūto padabyañjanaviseso upalabbhati. So copanavācāsaṅkhāto ākāravikāro
anya-e0301n0:1017_68: vacīviññattināma. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tassā pana cittasamuṭṭhānāya pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0301n0:1017_69: upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūto eko ākāravikāro vacī viññattināmāti vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:1017_71: sahaghaṭṭanaṃ paṭicca saddavisesapavattiyā paccayabhūtoti attho. Ghaṭṭanassa paccayo
anya-e0301n0:1017_72: pana calamānakaṇṭhapadesādivikārabhūto kāyaṅgavisesoeva siyā. Vikāradvayañca asaṃmissaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_73: katvā veditabbanti. Etthaca upādinnakapathavīhi saha ghaṭṭanaṃ cittajapathavīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_74: kiccaṃ. Yaṃ pana tāsaṃ yathāvā tathāvā aghaṭṭetvā yathā icchitakkharaṃ sampajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1017_75: Tathā ghaṭṭanapakāravidhānaṃ. Idaṃ kāyaviññattiyā kiccaṃ. Ghaṭṭanena saheva uppannasaddānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_76: taṃtaṃvaṇṇatta pattiyā vidahanameva vacīviññattiyā kiccaṃ. Kumbhathunatalaṃ viyaca
anya-e0301n0:1017_77: upādinnakapathavī. Paharaṇahattho viya cittajapathavī. Hatthapari vattana vikāro
anya-e0301n0:1017_78: viya kāyaviññatti. Saddavikāro viya vacīviññatti. Kumbhathunassa nānāsaddapabhedoviya
anya-e0301n0:1017_79: nānāvaṇṇabhedoti. Etthaca yadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmīti uppajjamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_80: cittaṃ aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Tesaṃ abbhantare citta samuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_81: ghaṭṭayamānāva uppajjati. Tena dhātughaṭṭanena saheva saddo uppajjatītica purimacittasamuṭṭhā
anya-e0301n0:1017_82: nāya upatthambhanakiccaṃpi natthītica vuttaṃ. Taṃpi anekasatesu javanavāresu pavattamānesu
anya-e0301n0:1017_83: yasmiṃvāre paribyattaṃ akkharaṃ pavattati, taṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva
anya-e0301n0:1017_84: hi mūla ṭīkāyaṃ upatthambhanakiccaṃ natthi laddhāsevanena citteneva ghaṭṭanassa balavabhāvatoti
anya-e0301n0:1017_85: vuttaṃ. Etthaca laddhāsevanenāti etena pubbabhāge nānājavanavīthīhi laddhāsevanabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1017_86: dasseti. Pathama javanacittassapi laddhāsevanatāya adhippetattā. Naca ekajavana vāramattena
anya-e0301n0:1017_87: paribyattaṃ ekakkharaṃ sampajjatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Kasmā, tassa ekadviaccharakkhaṇamattena
anya-e0301n0:1017_88: kālena vattabbattā ekaccharakkhaṇeca anekasatasahassānaṃ javanavīthīnaṃ pavattisambhavato. Vuttañca –
anya-e0301n0:1019: Timatto tu gīto ñeyyo, byañjanā aḍḍhamattikāti.
anya-e0301n0:1020_0: Milindapañheca sādhike vīhivāhasate vīhibījāni ekaccharakkhaṇe uppannassa cittassa
anya-e0301n0:1020_1: kalaṃpi naupenti. Kalabhāgaṃpi naupentīti dīpitaṃ. Ekakkharaṃ uccārentassaca tattakaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1020_2: kālaṃ uccāraṇacittabyāpāro sandissatiyeva. Naca paramatthato ekameva saddaṃ uccāremītivā
anya-e0301n0:1020_3: suṇomītivā sakkā niyametvā uccāretuṃ sotuñca. Tathā niyamentassapi saddānaṃ pubbāparato
anya-e0301n0:1020_4: anekasatasahassasseva uccāraṇa savana sambhavato. Ekamevāti abhimāno pana samūhaghana
anya-e0301n0:1020_5: santatighanehi paṭicchannattāeva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesamettha kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttana
anya-e0301n0:1020_6: yena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbanti. Etthaca viññattisaddo kāyena viññāpeti vācāya viññāpetītiādisu
anya-e0301n0:1020_7: bodhanattho. Sudinna kaṇḍe tikkhattuṃ viññāpetītiādīsu pavattanattho. Idha pana duvidhopi
anya-e0301n0:1020_8: yujjati. Evañhi sati paraṃ bodhetukāmatārahi tesu sabbesu kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanesupi
anya-e0301n0:1020_9: pavattakaviññattiyā labbhamānatā veditabbā hotīti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana paraṃ bodhetukāmatāya
anya-e0301n0:1020_10: vināpi abhikkamanādipavattanena so citta sahabhūvikāro adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti. Sayañca
anya-e0301n0:1020_11: viññāyatīti dvidhāpi viññattiyevāti vuttaṃ, tattha dvīsu bodhanaviññattīsu purimā
anya-e0301n0:1020_13: kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva viññāyati pacchimāca
anya-e0301n0:1020_14: vacīviññatti uccāriyamānaṃ saddaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva
anya-e0301n0:1020_15: viññāyati, na pañcadvārikajavanena. Sā hi attānaṃ jānanteeva parasatte attanā samaṅgino
anya-e0301n0:1020_16: puggalassa cittaṃ viññāpeti, na ajānante. Ñāpaka hetu hi nāma attānaṃ jānanteeva
anya-e0301n0:1020_17: ñāpetabbaṃ ñāpeti, no ajānante. Evañca katvā kāyaṅga copanaṃ disvāvā parāmasitvāvā
anya-e0301n0:1020_18: saddaṃ sutvāvā parassa taṃtaṃadhippāyaṃ jānantānaṃ tiracchāna gatānaṃpi pathadhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1020_19: viññattijānanaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati. Taṃjānanena vinā adhippāyajānanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0301n0:1020_20: Viññattiṃ jānantānaṃca purimasiddhasaṅketa sambandha jānanena vinā adhippāyajānanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1020_21: na sambhavatīti majjhe visuṃ pubbasaṅketa sambandhagahanaṃpi icchanti, dvīsu pana
anya-e0301n0:1020_22: pavattakaviññattīsu paraṃ abhikkamantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā disvā abhikkamanaviññattiñca
anya-e0301n0:1020_23: abhikkamanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā jānanti. Esanayo paṭikkamanādīsu. Tathā parassa
anya-e0301n0:1020_24: kathaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā sutvā kathanaviññattiñca kathanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā
anya-e0301n0:1020_25: jānanti. Paraṃ rattacittena kāyaṅgaṃ cālentaṃ disvā calanaviññattiñca rāgacittañca
anya-e0301n0:1020_26: jānanti. Rattassa kathaṃ sutvā kathana viññattiñca rāgacittañca jānanti. Esanayo
anya-e0301n0:1020_27: sabbāsu kāyikavācasikakriyāsūti. Lahuno bhāvo lahutā. Muduno bhāvo mudutā. Kammani
anya-e0301n0:1020_28: sādhu kammaññaṃ. Kammayogyanti attho. Kammaññassa bhāvo kammaññatā.
anya-e0301n0:1021_0: Adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā. Athaddhatā lakkhaṇā rūpassa mudutā. Sarīrakriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā
anya-e0301n0:1021_1: rūpassa kammaññatā. Aññamaññaṃ avijahantiyopi etā viruddhapaccayasappāya paccayānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_2: vasena asaṃmissato veditabbā. Tathā hi attano kāyaviruddhaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakriyaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1021_3: sevantānaṃ sarīragatā dhātuyo kadāci sakalasarīraṃvā sarīrekadesaṃvā khobhetvā visesato
anya-e0301n0:1021_4: pūtimukha sappasaṅkhātaāpo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā kāyaṃ asayhabhāraṃ viya garuṃ bhāriyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_5: karonti. Iriyā pathaparivattane kāyabhāriyanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādenti. Tadārūpassa
anya-e0301n0:1021_6: lahutā napavattati. Puna attano sarīrasappāyaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakiriyaṃvā sevantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_7: so dhātukkhobho vūpasammati. Kāyo sallahuko hoti. Iriyāpathaparivattane kāya bhāriyanimittaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_8: dukkhaṃnāma natthi. Tadā sā pavattati. Esanayo sesāsupi. Visesanato panettha mudubhāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_9: kaṭṭhamukhasappasaṅkhāta pathavīpariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃviya kāyaṃ thaddhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1021_11: kakkhaḷanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādentīti vattabbaṃ. Kammaññatāyaṃ satthamukhasappasaṅkhāta
anya-e0301n0:1021_12: vāyo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vāyovisamaṃ katvā dāmarikacorapariyuṭṭhitaṃ paccantaraṭṭhaṃ viya
anya-e0301n0:1021_13: kāyaṃ vivaṭṭamānaṃ karonti, sabbairiyāpathesu sukhaṃnāma natthīti vattabbaṃ. Tejodhātu
anya-e0301n0:1021_14: pana tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃpi mūlabhūtā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1022_0: Imā pana arogino kallabhāvoviya suparimadditacammassa mudubhāvoviya sudandhasuvaṇṇassa
anya-e0301n0:1022_2: visesākārā hontīti katvā vikārarūpaṃ nāma. Cayanaṃ cayo. Piṇḍavasena abhinibbattīti
anya-e0301n0:1022_3: attho. Ādito uparitoca cayo upacayo. Pathamābhinibbatti uparuparivaḍḍhicāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1022_4: Ayañhi upasaddo upaññattantiādīsu viya pathamattho upasittantiādīsu viyaca upari
anya-e0301n0:1022_5: atthoti. Vuttañca mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upasaddo pathamattho upariatthoca hotīti. Tenevahi
anya-e0301n0:1022_6: pāḷiyaṃ yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yorūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatīti
anya-e0301n0:1022_7: vuttaṃ. Tananaṃ vitthāraṇaṃ tati. Sambandhā tati punappunaṃvā tati santati. Yathā
anya-e0301n0:1022_8: pavattānaṃ āyatanānaṃ addhānapūraṇavasena pavattīti attho. Tattha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1022_9: sattānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamānibbattiatthena upacayonāma. Tato
anya-e0301n0:1022_10: paraṃ yāva sabbapathamaṃ uppannānaṃ cakkhu sota ghānajivhānaṃ uppādo, etthantare
anya-e0301n0:1022_11: rūpānaṃ uppādo upari vaḍḍhiatthena upacayonāma. Tato paraṃ yāvajīvaṃ catusantatirūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1022_12: uppādo santatināma. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nadītīre nikhātakūpasmiṃ udakuggamanakāloviya
anya-e0301n0:1022_13: ācayo nibbatti. Paripuṇṇakāloviya upacayo vaḍḍhi. Ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattīti.
anya-e0301n0:1024: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāvacakkhādi dasakānaṃ uppatti. Etthantare rūpuppādo upacayonāma. Tato paraṃ santati nāmāti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1025_0: Saṃsedajopavātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamā bhinibbatti atthena
anya-e0301n0:1025_1: paripuṇṇa vaḍḍhi atthenaca upacayo nāma, tato paraṃ rūpānaṃ uppādo santatināma. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1025_2: tisamuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃpi visuṃ visuṃ santatipaccuppannaṃnāma atthi. Tassaca ekekassa
anya-e0301n0:1025_3: nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavatti vasena tisso tissoavatthā honti. Tattha ekekasantatiyaṃ ādimhi
anya-e0301n0:1025_4: santatisīsarūpānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ uppādo nibbattināma. Tato vaḍḍhanarūpānaṃ uppādo
anya-e0301n0:1025_5: vaḍḍhīnāma. Vaḍḍhane samatte avaḍḍhitvā pabandhaṭṭhitivasena vattanavasenauppādopavattināma.
anya-e0301n0:1025_6: Tattha ca nibbattivaḍḍhiyo upacayonāma. Pavattisantati nāma. Saṅkhepato pana loke
anya-e0301n0:1025_7: sabbāsu indriyānindriyabaddharūpapavattīsu sandissamāne jāyana vaḍḍhana pavattanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0301n0:1025_8: avatthābhede disvā upacayasanta tiyo veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ nayo-rukkhatiṇādīnivā sākhā
anya-e0301n0:1025_9: pattapupphaphalādīnivā ādimhi jāyanti. Jāyitvā vaḍḍhanti. Vaḍḍhane samatte avaḍḍhitvā
anya-e0301n0:1025_10: pabandhavasena pavattitvā bhijjantīti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā, jīranti jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchanti
anya-e0301n0:1025_11: etāyāti jarā. Sāyeva jaratā. Uppādajarābhaṅgehi niccalati nakampatīti nicco asaṅkhata
anya-e0301n0:1025_12: dhammo. Na nicco anicco, saṅkhatadhammo. Aniccassa bhāvo aniccatā, bhaṅgo.
anya-e0301n0:1027: “Niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anugantabbanti anicca”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1028_0: Niccasaddo hi sāsane lokeca pākaṭo. So eva idha nakārayutto aniccoti vuttoti. Lakkhīyanti
anya-e0301n0:1028_1: sallakkhīyanti vinicchīyanti dhammā ime saṅkhatāti etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhata bhāvajānananimitanti
anya-e0301n0:1028_2: attho. Yathāha- aṅguttare tīṇi māni bhikkhave saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni
anya-e0301n0:1028_3: tīṇi, uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti. Nanu pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1028_4: jātināma āgatā. Tasmā sāpi idha vattabbāti vuttaṃ jātirūpamevātiādi. Etthāti rūpasamuddese.
anya-e0301n0:1028_5: Jananaṃ pātubhavanaṃ jāti. Jāyantivā etāyāti jāti, upacaya santati nāmenapavuccati
anya-e0301n0:1028_6: tassājātiyātathā avatthābhedayogatoti adhippāyo. Sā hi ādito paṭisandhirūpāni pātubhavantāni
anya-e0301n0:1028_7: karoti. Puna aparipuṇṇānica āyatanāni pūreti. Pūritāni ca dīghaṃpi addhānaṃ abbocchinnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1028_8: katvā pavatteti pabandhayatīti. Ekā dasavidhaṃpīti mahābhūtādibhāvena ekattaṃ upanayanavasena
anya-e0301n0:1028_9: ekā dasapabhedaṃpi. Kathaṃ sarūpavasena aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hotīti pucchitvā bhūtappasāda
anya-e0301n0:1028_10: visayātiādinā ekādasavidhasseva sarūpato dassanaṃ antogadhabhedānaṃ pubbe vuttabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1029_0: Cattāri bhūtāni pañcapasādā agahitagahaṇena cattāro visayā gocarā. Duvidho bhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1029_1: Ekaṃ hadayaṃ. Iti idaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitāhārarūpehi saha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ hoti
anya-e0301n0:1029_2: tathā eko paricchedo. Duvidhā viññatti. Agahitagahaṇena tividho vikāro. Catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1029_3: lakkhaṇanti dasa anipphannācāti rūpaṃ sarūpato aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ bhaveti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1029_4: Etthaca pacchimāni dasarūpāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānattā paccayehi nipphāditāni
anya-e0301n0:1029_5: rūpāni na hontīti anipphannāni nāma. Api cettha abhidhamme visuṃ uddiṭṭhāni niddiṭṭhānica
anya-e0301n0:1029_6: etāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānānīti vā paramatthato avijjamānānītivā nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1029_7: Vohārasiddha mattabhāvaṃ atikkamma tādisena suddhadhammagatiyā siddhena paramattha
anya-e0301n0:1029_8: lakkhaṇena upaladdhattā. Itarathā nibbattilakkhaṇarahitaṃ asaṅkhata nibbānaṃpi sabhāvato
anya-e0301n0:1029_9: anupalabbhamānaṃ paramatthato avijjamānañca nāma siyāti. Tasmā nibbatti lakkhaṇarahitattāeva
anya-e0301n0:1029_10: etāni anipphannānināma. Na sabhāvato anupalabbhamānattāti yuttaṃ siyāti. [Rūpasamuddeso]
anya-e0301n0:1030_0: 157. Rūpavibhāgesabbañca pana etaṃ yathāsamuddiṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhavīsati vidhaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n0:1030_1: ekavidhameva. Na sahetukā hetuka vasena duvidhaṃ. Tathāsappaccayaṭṭhena ekavidhameva.
anya-e0301n0:1030_2: Na sappaccayāpaccaya vasena duvidhanti evaṃ pavattaṃ ekavidhanayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1032: Ekavidhanayopi rūpavibhāgoevāti katvā “yathā uddiṭṭha rūpānaṃ ekavidhādinayaṃ dassanatthaṃ sabbañca panetantiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:1036_0: Tattha sabbaṃpi rūpaṃ hetusampayogā bhāvato ahetuka meva, na kiñci sahetukaṃ. Kiñci
anya-e0301n0:1036_1: ahetukanti evaṃ vibhāgo atthīti adhippāyo. Sappaccayaṃ sāsavaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyanti
anya-e0301n0:1036_2: pāṭho. Sappaccayaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavanti pana yutto. Pāḷiyaṃpi tathā diṭṭhattā
anya-e0301n0:1036_3: sabhāgayugaḷasambhavatocāti. Itarāni pana pāḷikamena asamentānipi sabhāga yugaḷattā
anya-e0301n0:1036_4: bhāgato yuttānieva. Tattha attano janakena paccayena saheva vattatīti sapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1036_5: Paccayehi saṅgamma karīyatīti saṅkhataṃ. Pañcupādā nakkhandhasaṅkhāte lokeeva pariyāpannanti
anya-e0301n0:1036_6: lokiyaṃ. Attānaṃ ārabbha pavattehi āsavehi saheva vattatīti sāsavaṃ. Akaniṭṭha brahmasantāna
anya-e0301n0:1036_7: bhūtaṃpi rūpaṃ kāmataṇhā visayabhāvena kāmeeva pariyāpannattā kāmāvacaraṃ. Natthi
anya-e0301n0:1036_8: attanā gahitaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃnāma assāti anārammaṇaṃ. Yo dhammo aññena payogena
anya-e0301n0:1036_9: pahīnopi samudayapahāne asati apahīnova hoti. Puna avassaṃ uppajjamānattā. Appahīnopi
anya-e0301n0:1036_10: tasmiṃ sati pahīnova hoti. Puna anuppajjamānattā. Tādiso dhammo pahānavāyāmassa aṭṭhānattā
anya-e0301n0:1036_11: appahātabbonāma. Rūpaṃpi edisameva hotīti vuttaṃ appahātabba mevāti. Aṭṭhānattā pahāna
anya-e0301n0:1036_12: vāyāmaṃ na arahatīti attho. Athavā, vinā samudayapahānena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1036_13: Yadi evaṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhave na tumhākaṃ. Taṃ pajahatha. Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1036_14: atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti idaṃ kathanti. Taṃpi tabbisayassa rāgassa pahānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1037: Rūpe kho rādha yo chando, yo rāgo, yānandī, yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha. Evaṃ taṃrūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti.
anya-e0301n0:1038_0: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi kusalādīsu appahātabbesu veditabboti. Evasaddo cettha purimapadesupi
anya-e0301n0:1038_1: yojetabbo. Itisaddo ādiattho, pakāratthovā. Tena pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ na hetu hetuvippayuttantiādiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1038_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa tassa puggalassa attabhāvapariyāpanno dhammasamūho ajjhattaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1038_3: Tasmiṃpica yattha taṇhāya atirekataraṃ daḷhapariggaho hoti. So cakkhādiko cittena
anya-e0301n0:1038_4: saha chabbidho dhammo ajjhattiko nāma. Ajjhatte vidito pākaṭoti katvā. Tathā hi so
anya-e0301n0:1038_5: ajjhattajjhattantipi vutto. Itarāni pana rūpādini phassādīnica tadupādāya taṇhāpariggahassa
anya-e0301n0:1038_6: mandattā bāhirāni nāma. Yathā hi loke maṇivā suvaṇṇaṃvā rajataṃvā bahigehe nidahitvā
anya-e0301n0:1038_7: thapitaṃ hoti. Pacchivā suppaṃvā ghaṭovā sarāvovā anto gehe thapito. Tattha pacchimāni
anya-e0301n0:1038_8: chaḍḍetvāpi purimāni rakkhanti. Tasmā tāneva taṇhāpariggahadaḷhatāya antoparibhogātveva
anya-e0301n0:1038_9: vuccanti. Pacchimāni pana bāhira paribhogātveva. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhapi
anya-e0301n0:1038_10: hi yadi sakkuṇeyya. Rūpādīni phassādinica sabbāni chaḍḍetvāpi cakkhādikaṃ chabbidhameva
anya-e0301n0:1038_11: avassaṃ rakkhissantīti. Iti taṇhā pariggahassa daḷhamandatā vaseneva tesaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1038_12: ajjhattika bāhiratā vuttā. Na pavattidesavasenāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1040_0: “Ajjhattikarūpaṃ atthabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā. Kāmaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1040_1: aññepi ajjhattasambhūtā atthi. Ruḷhīvasena pana cakkhādikameva ajjhattikanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1042: “Attasaṅkhātaṃpā cittaṃ adhikicca tassa dvārabhāvena pavattatīthi ajjhattaṃ. Tadeva ajjhattikanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1043: Tasmiṃ atthe hi sati cittassa ajjhattatā na sampajjati. Ajjhattadhamma ajjhattikammonañca aviseso āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1045: Athavā yadi mayaṃ na homa, tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissatīti vadantā viya attabhāvassa sātisayaṃ upakārakattā cakkhādineva visesato ajjhattikānīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ yuttataraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1046_0: Tathā upakārātisayattāeva hi tesu sattānaṃ pariggaha daḷhatā hotīti. Sattavidhaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1046_1: dvārarūpaṃnāma. Yathākkamaṃ vīthi cittānaṃ pāṇātipātādikammānañca pavattimukhattā.
anya-e0301n0:1046_2: Tattha pana pañca vidhaṃ pasādarūpaṃ upapattidvāraṃnāma. Viññattidvayaṃ kammadvāraṃnāmāti
anya-e0301n0:1046_3: oḷārikarūpaṃ pakatiyā thūlasabhāvattā ghaṭṭanasaṅkhātassaca attano kiccassa oḷārikattā.
anya-e0301n0:1046_4: Santikerūpaṃ dūre pavattassapi sīghataraṃ ñāṇena gahaṇayogyattā. Sappaṭigharūpañcāti
anya-e0301n0:1046_5: ettha paṭihananaṃ paṭigho. So duvidho visayavisayīnaṃ paṭighaṭṭanaṃ mahā bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1046_6: aññamaññapaṭighaṭṭananti. Tattha yena paṭighaṭṭanena pasāda dvārānaṃ bhavaṅgassaca
anya-e0301n0:1046_7: vikārappatti hoti. Idaṃ visayavisayīnaṃ paṭighaṭṭanaṃnāma. Yena ruppanalakkhaṇānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1046_8: rūpadhammānaṃ ruppana kuppana ghaṭṭana pīḷana bhijjanādayo pavattanti. Idaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1046_9: aññamaññapaṭighaṭṭanaṃ nāma. Paṭighena saha vattatīti sappaṭighaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1048_0: “Yo sayaṃ nissayavasenaca sampattānaṃ asampattānañca paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññapatanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1048_1: So paṭigho viyāti paṭigho. Yathāhi paṭighāte sati dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aññamaññapaṭimukhabhāve
anya-e0301n0:1048_2: sati arūpasabhāvattā dubbalassa bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ hotīti” evaṃ mahābhūtaghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1048_3: upamāmattaṃ katvā visayavisayighaṭṭanameva gahitaṃ. Taṃ anupapannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1049_0: Evañhi sati yāni loke ajjhattabahiddhāsantānesu ghaṭṭanāni dissanti. Yesaṃ vasena
anya-e0301n0:1049_1: rūpadhammesu aññamaññaṃ laggana bandhana thambhana dhāraṇa calanādīnivā vaḍḍhana
anya-e0301n0:1049_2: hāyana chedana bhedana vilīna vikiraṇādīnivā pavattanti. Tāni idha asaṅgahitāni siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1049_3: Naca tāni anuggaha upaghāta vasena pavattibhūta sannipāta saṅkhātaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃvinā
anya-e0301n0:1049_4: aññapakārānieva sakkā bhavitunti. Itaraṃ soḷasavidhaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhavasena sukhumarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1049_5: dūrerūpaṃ apaṭigharūpañca. Upādinnarūpaṃ nāma katthaci yaṃkiñci sarīraṭṭhakarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1049_6: vuccati. Katthaci kammasamuṭṭhāna meva tadubhayaṃpi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi tusaṃ ādinnaparāmaṭṭhattā
anya-e0301n0:1049_7: upādinnaṃ nāma nippariyāyato pana kammasamuṭṭhānameva upādinnaṃnāma. Kasmā tasseva
anya-e0301n0:1049_8: sattasantāne niccakālaṃ pavattivasena sātisayaṃ bhusaṃ ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhatāsambhavatoti
anya-e0301n0:1049_9: vuttaṃ kammajaṃupādinnarūpanti. Etaṃ mamātiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi bhusaṃ ādiyatīti upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1049_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā attano phalabhāvena ādinnaṃ gahitanti
anya-e0301n0:1049_11: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Saha nidassanena sanidassanaṃ. Nidassananti cakkhuviññāṇena daṭṭhabbabhāvo
anya-e0301n0:1049_12: vuccati. So pana dhammato anaññattepi aññe viya katvā upacarīyati. Evañhi sati atthavisesabodho
anya-e0301n0:1049_13: hotīti. Nidassanantivā cakkhuviññāṇakiccaṃ vuccati. Tena saha vattatīti sanidassanantipi
anya-e0301n0:1049_14: yujjatiyeva. Cakkhādidvayaṃ asampattavasena gocaraggāhikaṃ. Ghānādittayaṃ sampattavasena
anya-e0301n0:1049_15: gocaraggāhikanti pañcavidhaṃpi gocaraggāhikarūpanti yojanā. Tattha pasāde allīyitvā
anya-e0301n0:1049_16: laggitvā uppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sampattaṃnāma. Kesaggamattaṃpi muñcitvā uppannaṃ asampattaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1049_17: Kasmā panettha cakkhādidvayaṃ asampattameva gaṇhāti. Ghānādittayaṃ sampattamevāti,
anya-e0301n0:1049_18: paccayavisesato. Āloko hi rūpagahaṇe cakkhussa paccayo. Ākāsoca saddagahaṇe sotassāti
anya-e0301n0:1049_19: cakkhurūpesuca aññamaññaṃ laggitvā uppajjamānesu ālokaparivārassa okāso natthi. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:1049_20: sotasaddesuca ākāsaparivārassāti. Vāyuāpapathaviyo pana ghānādittayassa gandhādigahaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1049_21: paccayā honti. Tattha vāyunāma gandhākaḍḍhanako nāsavātoyeva, soca sampattasseva
anya-e0301n0:1049_22: paccayo. Āponāma jivhātemanako āpo, sopi sampattasseva paccayo. Na hi raso sukkhajivhāya
anya-e0301n0:1049_23: pharatīti. Pathavīca ghaṭṭanatthāya paccayo. Na hi dubbalapathavīsannissayo ālokovā
anya-e0301n0:1049_24: rajovākāye patamānopi pasāde ghaṭṭetīti. Iti paccayavisesato tesaṃ sampattāsampattavasena
anya-e0301n0:1049_25: gahaṇa viseso hotīti. Tattha cakkhussa tāva asampattagahaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Tañhi samīpe
anya-e0301n0:1049_26: akkhivaṇṇaṃvā bhamukamūlaṃvā napassati. Dūre pana mahantaṃ candamaṇḍalādikaṃvā phalikāditirohitaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1049_27: vaṇṇaṃ passati. Disādesavavatthānañcassa paññāyatīti. Sotassa pana kathanti, tattha
anya-e0301n0:1049_28: hi dūre saddo cirena suyyamāno dissati pacchimadisābhāge uppannopi saddo antarā mahante
anya-e0301n0:1049_29: cetiyādike antarite sati dakkhiṇapassatovā suyyati. Uttarapassatovā. Asuyyamānovā
anya-e0301n0:1049_30: hotīti. Vuccate, uppanno saddasaṅghāṭo āsanne ṭhitānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya yāva avasānā
anya-e0301n0:1049_31: kamena pākaṭībhūto hoti. Paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsoca balavā hoti. Ahaṃ suṇomīti pavattā
anya-e0301n0:1049_32: sallakkhaṇavīthiyo sīghataraṃ nirantaraṃ viya pavattanti. Dūre ṭhitānaṃ pana paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso
anya-e0301n0:1049_33: mandataro hoti. Ādito apākaṭo. Majjhevā avasānevā piṇḍavasena pākaṭībhūto. Sallakkhaṇavīthiyo
anya-e0301n0:1049_34: cirena parena pavattanti. Tasmā tesaṃ lahuṃ suto. Cirena sutoti atimāno hotīti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1049_35: saddonāma nissayadhātuparaṃparāya pavattitvā dūraṃpi desaṃ gacchatiyeva. Evaṃ gacchantoca
anya-e0301n0:1049_36: gatagataṭṭhāneeva ṭhatvā savanūpacāre ṭhitānaṃ sotasahassaṃpi ghaṭṭeti. Mahante pana
anya-e0301n0:1049_37: cetiyādike antarite sati yato ākāso ujuṃ vivaṭo hoti. Tato dakkhiṇapassatovā uttarapassatovā
anya-e0301n0:1049_38: gatagataṭhānatovasotaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Mandataro pana saddoasuyya mānopi hoti. Evaṃ gacchantoca
anya-e0301n0:1049_39: yāva sotapasāde allīyitvā nuppajjati. Tāva asampattoyeva hoti. Yo pana allī yitvā
anya-e0301n0:1049_40: uppajjati. So sampattonāma hoti. Na so suyyatīti. Yadi pana sotaṃ sampattavisayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1049_41: siyā. Yathā anto kucchigato gandho bahi naghāyiyati. Tathā anto kucchigato saddopi
anya-e0301n0:1049_42: bahi nasuyeyya. Gandhassa viya disādesavavatthānaṃ vissana siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1051: “Gantvā visayadesaṃ taṃ, pharitvā gaṇhatīti ce. Adhiṭṭhāna vidhā nepi, tassa so gocaro siyā.” Tipi vicāritaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1052: Na hi cakkhādidvayassa bahiddhā visayadesagamanasaṅgo atthīti. Gocaraṃ gaṇhātīti gocaraggāhikaṃ. Pasāda maṇḍabhūtattā āpātamāgataṃ ārammaṇanimittaṃ sampaṭicchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1054: Viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā taṃtaṃ gocaragahaṇa sabhāvattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1055_0: Vaṇṇoti rūpārammaṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ojāti āhāra rūpa māha. Vinibhujjatīti vinibbhogo.
anya-e0301n0:1055_1: Ṭhānato desato uppattikāraṇato visuṃvisuṃ vavatthapīyatīti attho. Navinibbho goti
anya-e0301n0:1055_2: avinibbhogo. So eva rūpanti avinibbhogarūpaṃ. Ācariyānandattherenapanettha gandharasaojā
anya-e0301n0:1055_3: katthaci vinībhuttā dissantīti pañcavidhameva avinibbhogarūpaṃ icchitaṃ. Taṃ parato
anya-e0301n0:1056_0: 158. Kammanti ekā cetanāeva. Sāyeva hi paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1056_1: vuttā. Yathāha-nānākkhaṇikā kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattāca rūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1056_2: kammapaccayena paccayoti. Cittanti pana sasampayuttadhammaṃ adhippetaṃ. Paṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n0:1056_4: dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetu paccayena paccayotiādi. Utūti tejoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1056_5: So hi kappasaṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ okāsa lokaṃpi nānāsarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena saka
anya-e0301n0:1056_6: laṃ rūpamayaṃ kāyaṃ sattalokaṃpi nānārukkhatiṇādīnaṃ abbhapaṭalameghavuṭṭhijalaaggi
anya-e0301n0:1056_7: vātādīnañca saṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃpi udayati pasavati janeti vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0301n0:1056_8: Tasmā utūti vuccatīti. Arati gacchati pavattatīti utūtipi vadanti. Āhāroti ojāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1056_9: Rūpavirāgabhāvanābhūtaṃ arūpakusalaṃ kammajarūpaṃ najanetīti vuttaṃ pañcavīsatividhaṃpīti.
anya-e0301n0:1056_10: Atisaṅkhatanti atītakāle yathākā lantare rūpaṃ janeti, tathā visesetvā suṭṭhukataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1056_11: Ajjhatti kasantāneti vuttaṃ, ajjhattasantāneti pana vattabbaṃ. Ajjhatta meva ajjhattikantivā
anya-e0301n0:1056_12: ikasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo. Paṭisandhimupādāyāti paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1056_13: upādāya. Khaṇekhaṇeti ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu. Ācariyānandatthero pana
anya-e0301n0:1056_14: sabbesaṃpi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ ekekassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva uppādaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva
anya-e0301n0:1056_15: nirodhañca āha. Ahaṃ panassā dhippāyo-sabbānipi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpāni cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva
anya-e0301n0:1057: Yassavā pana samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n0:1058: Tathā tāni cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva nirujjhanti. Na uppādakkhaṇe. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1059: Yassa kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, tassa abyākatā dhammā nirujjhantīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n0:1060: Arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya etaṃ yamakadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Rūpāni pana cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇepi uppajjanti. Uppādakkhaṇepi nirujjhantīti ce. Na. Evañhi sati –
anya-e0301n0:1061_0: Yassavā pana samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti. Arūpe taṇhāya
anya-e0301n0:1061_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati. Noca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1061_2: Pañcavokāre taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nirujjhati, dukkhasaccañca uppajjatītica.
anya-e0301n0:1063_0: Arūpe kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammā uppajjanti. Noca tesaṃ abyākatā
anya-e0301n0:1063_1: dhammā nirujjhanti. Pañcavokāre kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammāca uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1064_0: Evaṃ paripuṇṇapañhāeva uddhaṭā siyuṃ. Noti pana paṭisedhova uddhaṭo. Tasmā nayidaṃ
