anya-e0301n0:1064_1: arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sakkā vattunti. Cittajarūpaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce.
anya-e0301n0:1064_2: Tampi na. Kammajarūpassa vigahaṇe virodhassa yamakapāṭhantarassa abhāvato. Anulomassevaca bhāvato. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1065_0: Yassavāpana yattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjati. Tassa tattha jīvitindriyaṃ nauppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1065_1: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjati. Noca tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1066: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca nauppajjati. Jīvitindriyañca nauppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_0: Ettha hi asaññasattānanti etena rūpajīvitindriya meva vuttaṃ. Yadica taṃ cittassa
anya-e0301n0:1067_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇepi uppajjeyya, purimakoṭṭhāse pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1067_2: tesaṃ.La. Jīvitindriyaṃ nauppajjatīti vuttaṃ siyā, pacchimakoṭṭhāseca sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1067_3: icceva vuttaṃ siyāti. Pacchimakoṭṭhāse pana arūpa jīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
anya-e0301n0:1067_4: ce. Na. Tathā gahaṇatthaṃ yamaka pāṭhantarābhāvato sabbaññuvisayeca ṭhāne pāḷiyo
anya-e0301n0:1067_5: saṃsanditvā balavatiyā pāḷiyuttiyāeva ṭhātabbatoti. Yasmāca rūpadhammā nāma dandhapavattino
anya-e0301n0:1067_6: honti. Arūpadhammā lahupavattino ṭhitikkhaṇoca tesaṃ visuṃ gaṇanūpago natthi. Tasmā
anya-e0301n0:1067_7: aññoyeva rūpa dhammānaṃ khaṇapabandho. Añño arūpadhammānaṃ. Tattha sabbepi rūpadhammā
anya-e0301n0:1067_8: ekacittakkhaṇaparimāṇena attano uppādakkhaṇena yuttā khaṇe khaṇe nirantarameva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_9: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya sahuppannattāca pana dvinnaṃ tesaṃ uppādādivā nirodhantovā
anya-e0301n0:1067_10: yāvajīvaṃpisaheva hotītipi tassa adhippāyoti. Yamaka pāḷiyo pana nānātthā, nānābyañjanā,
anya-e0301n0:1067_11: gambhīroca satthu adhippāyo. Tasmā suṭṭhu vicāretvā sallakkhetabbo. Na pana dhammatā
anya-e0301n0:1067_12: esā yamakassa. Yadidaṃ yathālābhayojanāti katvā attano adhippāye ṭhatvā diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1067_13: yamakapāṭhaṃ yathālābhayo janāyaeva sakkā yojetunti. Rūpavirāgabhāvanāvisesabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1067_14: arūpakusalaṃ tasmiṃ loke rūpasahitaṃ paṭisandhiṃ najaneti. Suddhaarūpameva janeti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_15: Tasmā rūpasantatisīsassa sabbaso abhāvā tatruppannāni sabbāni chacattālīsacittāni
anya-e0301n0:1067_16: rūpaṃ janetuṃ na na sakkonti. Arūpavipākā pana tattheva niyamuppannāti arūpapākasseva
anya-e0301n0:1067_17: gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, aññānipi bahūni āruppe uppannāni anokāsatthā
anya-e0301n0:1067_18: rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpentīti vuttaṃ tattha anokāsatānāma ādito paṭṭhāya uppannassa rūpasantatisīsassa
anya-e0301n0:1069: “Rūpavirāgabhāvanānibbattattā hetuno tabbidhuratāyā”tipi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1070_1: Jhānaṅgavirahena aṅgadubbalānipi rūpaṃ na janentīti dvipañcaviññāṇagahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1070_2: Itarā nipi pana pannarasakāmarūpa paṭisandhicittāni khīṇāsavānaṃ parinibbānacuti
anya-e0301n0:1070_3: cittanti imāni cittāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentiyeva. Evaṃsantepi tāni sabbānipi bhavaṅgakāle
anya-e0301n0:1070_4: akhīṇāsavānañca cutikāle samuṭṭhāpentīti tesaṃ idha agahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1072: Paṭisandhicittaṃ pana cuticittañca ekūnavīsati bhavaṅgasseva antogadhattā cittantaraṃ na hotīti na tassa vajjanaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha ekūnavīsati bhavaṅgassevāti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1073_0: Arūpavipākassa sarūpato vajjitattāti. Kasmā pana yathā vuttāni pannarasa paṭisandhicittāni
anya-e0301n0:1073_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentīti, paridubbalattā. Cittañhināma uppādakkhaṇeeva
anya-e0301n0:1073_2: paripuṇṇaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā balavaṃ hoti. Rūpañca ṭhitikkhaṇeva.
anya-e0301n0:1074_0: Tasmā attano balavantakkhaṇe uppajjamānabhāvena dubbalaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya uppannattā
anya-e0301n0:1074_1: sayaṃpi paridubbalaṃ hotīti sabbānipi tāni tadā rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhā pentīti. Etthaca
anya-e0301n0:1074_2: keci anantarāsevanādipaccayā cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva pharanti. Rūpassa pana upatthambhakabhūtā
anya-e0301n0:1074_3: utuāhārā pacchājātapaccayadhammāca ṭhitikkhaṇeevapharantīti tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1076_0: “Pacchājāta paccayarahitaṃ pana āhārādīhica anupatthaddhaṃ dubbalavatthuṃ nissāya
anya-e0301n0:1076_1: pavattattā attanoca āgantukatāya kammajarūpehica cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0301n0:1076_2: ṭhitattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha pacchājāta paccaya rahitanti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1077_0: Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe pacchājāta paccaya rahitassa piutussa rūpajanakabhāvassa
anya-e0301n0:1077_1: vakkhamānattā. Na hi attanā avijjamānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ purimacittakkhaṇe ṭhitassa
anya-e0301n0:1077_2: kassaci rūpassa pacchājāta paccayo hoti. Atthi paccayekadesattā tassa paccayassāti.
anya-e0301n0:1077_3: Khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ pana pakatiyāva vūpasantavaṭṭamūle santāne pavattattā santataraṃ
anya-e0301n0:1077_4: hoti. Puna āyusaṅkhārānaṃ parikkhayena dubbalatare pariyantagate ca vatthumhi nissitattā
anya-e0301n0:1077_5: dubbalatarañca hotīti taṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti, ācariyānandatthero pana sabbasattānaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1077_6: cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti icchati. Yathāha-khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittanti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1078_0: Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1078_1: pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati. Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ yeca rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:1078_2: arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ, cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vacī saṅkhāro
anya-e0301n0:1079_0: Pana vacanato aññesaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati. Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpaka
anya-e0301n0:1079_1: cittassa gabbhagamanādi vinibaddhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthi, na ca yuttaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1079_2: cutoca cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa pavattatīti. Nāpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti pāḷi atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1081_0: Tasmiṃ pāṭhe tesaṃ cavantānaṃ noca kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti vacanaṃ na kevalaṃ cuticittasseva
anya-e0301n0:1081_1: rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvaṃ sādheti, athakho tato purimānaṃ sabbesaṃ maraṇāsanna cittānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1081_2: rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvaṃpi sādhetiyevāti dīpeti. Cuti cittasmiṃhi kāyasaṅkhārassa nirodhe
anya-e0301n0:1081_3: paṭisiddhe tato pubbe yāva sattarasamacittā etthantare tassa uppādopi paṭisiddhoeva
anya-e0301n0:1082: Kāyasaṅkhāroti hi assāsapassāso vuccati. Soca suṭṭhu oḷāriko rūpadhammoti nacuticitte tannirodhābhāva vacanena itarāni sukhumānipi rūpāni cuticittaṃ najanetīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1084: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagamanādi vinibaddhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1085: Tānieva hi gabbhagamanādīni imassatthassa sādhakāni bhavituṃ arahanti oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa asamuṭṭhāpakaṃpi cittaṃ itaraṃ sukhumarūpaṃ pana samuṭṭhāpetiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1087: Na ca yuttaṃ cutoca cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa pavattatīti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1088: Na hi cutito paraṃ katipayakhaṇamattaṃ cittajarūpapavattiyā koci virodho atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1090: Nāpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti pāḷi atthīti vuttaṃ. Tatthapi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetītipi natthi, aññatra kāyasaṅkhārāti na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1091_0: Evaṃ pana yuttaṃ siyā, yathā rūpadhammā ādito paṭisandhikāle ekacittakkhaṇamatte
anya-e0301n0:1091_1: paccayaparittatāyavā attano dandhavutti tāyavā dubbalā honti, tathā pariyosānepi
anya-e0301n0:1091_3: sakkā vattuṃ. Tasmā vatthussa ādiantanissitāni paṭisandhicuticittāni samadubbalānieva
anya-e0301n0:1093: Abhidhammatthavikāsaniyañca pāḷivirodhaṃ maññamāno kiñcimattampi avicāretvā ṭīkāsu vuttanayameva suṭṭhu vikāsayitvā gatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1094_0: Pathamabhavaṅgamupādāyāti pathama bhavaṅgacittassa uppādakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya. Jāyantamevāti
anya-e0301n0:1094_1: uppādakkhaṇe uppādakkhaṇe uppajja mānameva, na tiṭṭhantaṃ. Naca bhijjamānanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1094_2: Kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pañcasattatividhe citte. Appanājavananti abhiññādvayavajjitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1094_3: chabbīsatividhaṃ appanājavanacittaṃ. Iriyāpathanti gamanavajjitaṃ tividhaṃpi iriyāpathaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1097_0: Na hi aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ calanaphandanamattaṃpi viññattiyā vinā sijjhati. Kuto gamanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1097_1: Naca yathāvuttaṃ appanājavanaṃ viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ sakkotīti. Pi saddena taṃ
anya-e0301n0:1097_2: nakevalaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakamattaṃti dasseti. Sannāmetīti sandhāreti ayamevavā pāṭho
anya-e0301n0:1097_3: siyā, vakkhamānehi cittehi abhisaṅkhataṃ yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ apatamānaṃ acalamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1097_4: dhāreti upatthambhetīti attho. Upatthambhanañcettha yathāpavattassa iriyāpathassa
anya-e0301n0:1097_5: rakkhanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Naukkhipitvā viya abhinīharaṇaṃ. Itarathā thambhanaviññattiyā
anya-e0301n0:1097_6: pasaṅgo siyāti. Etthaca yathānisinnassavā ṭhitassavā bhavaṅga citte abbokiṇṇe pavattamāne
anya-e0301n0:1097_7: aṅgāni osīdanti patanti. Na tathā imasmiṃ chabbīsatividhe jāgaraṇacitte vakkhamānesucadvattiṃsa
anya-e0301n0:1097_8: vidhesu jāgaraṇacittesupavattamānesu. Tesu pana pavattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni
anya-e0301n0:1097_9: honti. Na osīdanti na patanti. Pubbe yathā thapitāneva pavattantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1099: “Na eva metesu dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsati yā jāgaraṇacittesu pavattamānesū”ti pāṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1100_0: Na evametesu chabbīsatiyā jāgaraṇacittesu vakkhamāne suca dvattiṃsa vidhesu pavattamānesūti
anya-e0301n0:1100_1: pana pāṭho yutto. Voṭṭhabbananti manodvāre āvajjanamāha. Na hi pañcadvārikāni javana
anya-e0301n0:1100_2: cittānipi viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Iriyāpathupatthambhana mattaṃ vā pisaddena gahithaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1100_3: sandhāya voṭṭhabbanādīni pañcadvārikānipi gahitāniti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthaca iriyāpathonāma
anya-e0301n0:1100_4: gamanādinā tena tena avatthāvisesena pavattā rūpadhammāeva. Evaṃ santepi kiñcicittaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1100_5: rūpa sāmaññameva janeti na tatoparaṃ. Kiñci aññacittassa vasena yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1100_6: rakkhituṃeva sakkoti, na appavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ pavattetuṃ. Kiñci viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:1100_7: appavattañca iriyāpathaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti. Aññānica kāyika vācasika vikārāni janetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1100_8: sakkoti. Yānica cittāni uttarakiccaṃ janetuṃ sakkonti. Tāni heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimaṃ kiccaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1100_9: janetuṃ sakkontiyevāti dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1102: “Yaṃpana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato iriyāpathu patthambhakaṃ. Iriyā pathassa viññattiyā saha avinābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1103_0: Idha hi iriyāpathupatthambhanaṃnāma viññattirahitamevā dhippetaṃ, na viññattisahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1103_1: Itarathā appanājavanānaṃpi viññattijanakatā āpajjeyyāti. Somanassajavanāni terasāti
anya-e0301n0:1103_2: hasituppādena saddhiṃ lobhamūlato mahā kusalato mahā kriyato ca cattāricattārīti
anya-e0301n0:1103_3: terasa somanassajavanāni. Tesupana kusalā kusalato aṭṭhaputhujjanānaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttā
anya-e0301n0:1103_4: kusalakusalato chasekkhānaṃ. Kriyato pañcakhīṇāsavānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1103_5: ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattanti vacanato vicāraṇakiccarahito hasituppādo sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1103_6: nasambhavatīti evaṃ pavatto vādo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittoyeva. Tasmiṃvāde hi sati
anya-e0301n0:1103_7: itaresaṃpi ahetukacittānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttamahā kriyajavanānañca buddhānaṃ asambhavo
anya-e0301n0:1103_8: āpajjati. Tasmā tesaṃ hasituppādacittena pavattassa sitakammassa pubbāparapavattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1103_9: ñāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇapubbaṅgamatā ñāṇānuparivattatā ca veditabbāti. Sītuṇhotu samaññātāti
anya-e0301n0:1103_10: idaṃ sītaṃ idaṃ uṇhanti evaṃ sabba lokiyamahājanehi suṭṭhu paricchinditvā ñātā. Ṭhitippattāvāti
anya-e0301n0:1103_11: attano ṭhitibhāvaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇaṃvā pattāeva. Na pana cittamiva jāyanta mattāti attho. Kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0301n0:1105: “Pacchājātādipaccayupatthambhalābhena ṭhitikkhaṇeeva utuojānaṃ balavabhāvoti vuttaṃ tejodhātu ṭhitippattātiādi”. Tattha pacchājātapaccayavacanaṃ heṭṭhā vicāritameva.
anya-e0301n0:1106_0: Apica, yadi utuno balavabhāvo rūpuppādanañca pacchājātapaccayāyattaṃ siyā. Evaṃ sati
anya-e0301n0:1106_1: so paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeyya, tadā pacchājātapaccayasseva
anya-e0301n0:1106_2: abhāvato. Vakkhatica ṭhitikālamupādāya utusamuṭṭhānāti. Etthaca ṭhitikālanti paṭisandhicittassa
anya-e0301n0:1106_3: ṭhītikālo vuttoti. Tasmā pacchājātapaccayavacanaṃ vicāretvā sampaṭicchitabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1106_4: Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāroti kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidho ajjhattasantāna gatoasitapītakhāyitasāyitavasena
anya-e0301n0:1106_5: catubbidho, bahiddhasantā nagatoca ojāsaṅkhāto duvidhāhāro. Tadubhayāpica saṃsagga
anya-e0301n0:1106_6: vasena laddhupatthambhā evarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentīti vuttaṃ ajjhoharaṇa kāleti. Etthaca
anya-e0301n0:1106_7: bahiddhāsambhūtena utunā saha ajjhatta sambhūtānaṃ catusamuṭṭhānānaṃ utuojānaṃ viya
anya-e0301n0:1106_8: bahiddhāsambhūtāya ojāyapi ajjhattaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhānaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1108: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe thapitamatto eva aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhoharīyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_0: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana yadi bahiddhasambhūtā ojā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya, evaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1109_1: sati yathā bahiddhasambhūto utu ajjhattañca bahiddhāca rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:1109_2: sā bahiddhāpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya. Na pana samuṭṭhāpeti. Tasmā sā ajjhattaṃ patvāpi
anya-e0301n0:1109_3: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhā petiyeva. Ekantena pana ajjhattaojāeva samuṭṭhāpeti. Sā pana tassā
anya-e0301n0:1109_4: upatthambhanapaccayoeva hotīti adhippāyena mukhe thapitamattoeva. Na saṅkhādito.
anya-e0301n0:1109_5: Tattakenapi abbhantarassa paccayo hotiyeva, kenāha aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0301n0:1109_6: majjhimaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana upādinnakā utu ojānāma suṭṭhu paṇītarūpā honti,
anya-e0301n0:1109_7: tasmā bahiddhā ojāpi ajjhattaṃ patvā tena utunā suṭṭhu sediyamānā tāyaca ojāya suṭṭhu
anya-e0301n0:1109_8: upatthambhīya mānā sarīre medasinehupacayavasena rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetiyevāti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1109_9: Ajjhoharaṇakāleti idañca suṭṭhu balavabhāvappatta kālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Visuddhimagge
anya-e0301n0:1109_10: pana mātarā paribhuttāhāropi dārakassa sararaṃ pharitvā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Sarīre
anya-e0301n0:1109_11: makkhitāhā ropi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti vuttaṃ. Mukhe thapitamattoeva aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpetītica
anya-e0301n0:1109_12: pubbe vuttanti. Ṭhāna pattovāti attano ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ pattoeva. Etthaca catūsu samuṭṭhānesu
anya-e0301n0:1109_13: utueva mahanto mahāthāmo mahāvipphāroca hoti. So hi sakalassapi okāsalokassa bahiddhā
anya-e0301n0:1109_14: saṅkhāralokassaca samuṭṭhā pako vināsako ca hoti. Sattalokassaca soeva mahanto ajjhattasambhārabhūto
anya-e0301n0:1109_15: hoti. Itarāni pana tīṇi tassa parivāramattānieva sampajjantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_0: Hadaya indriya rūpāni kammajāneva, na cittajādini. Yadievaṃ vippasannāni kho te āvuso
anya-e0301n0:1110_1: sāriputta indriyāni. Katarena tvaṃ etarahi vihārena viharasīti kasmā vuttanti. Indriyasambhārānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1110_2: vaṇṇānaṃ samāpatti cittasamuṭṭhitānaṃ visadavippasannatāvasena upacari tattāti. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:1110_3: hi ekābaddhapavattāni catujarūpāni ekasmiṃ vippasanne sabbāni vippasannāneva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_4: Milāteca milātānevāti. Utucittāhārā pana tesaṃ navannaṃ upatthambhanapaccayā hontīti
anya-e0301n0:1110_5: veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca uppalapadumāni viya kammajarūpāni daṭṭhabbāni. Tesaṃ bījaṃ viya
anya-e0301n0:1110_6: kammaṃ. Kaddamodakāni viya utuāhārādīni. Viññatti dvayaṃ cittajameva. Tathā hi taṃ
anya-e0301n0:1110_7: cittasahabhū cittānuparivattidhammesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭhanti. Saddocittotujoti kasmā
anya-e0301n0:1110_8: vuttaṃ. Nanunidhikaṇḍasutte suvaṇṇatā susaratā susaṇṭhānaṃ surūpatātiādinā tādisena
anya-e0301n0:1110_9: kammavisesena saddasampattināma vuttāti. Saccaṃ, kammavisesena pana yathā suvisado
anya-e0301n0:1110_10: sumadhuro saddo pavattati, tathā ṭhānakaraṇagatānaṃ upādinnakasarīrānaṃ susaṇṭhitatā
anya-e0301n0:1110_11: vāta semhādīhi apalibuddhatāca hoti. Tasmā tammūlikāsaddasampatti kammaphalesu pakkhipitvā
anya-e0301n0:1110_12: susaratāti vuttā. Na ekantena saddassa kammajanitattāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1111_0: Lahutādittayaṃ utucittāhārehi sambhotīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Nanu appābādhasaṃvattanikā
anya-e0301n0:1111_1: esā māṇava paṭipadā, yadidaṃ avihiṃsāti vuttaṃ. Appābādha paccayasamuṭṭhitañca etaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1111_2: rūpattayaṃ. Tathā hi dandhattādi kara dhātukkhota paṭipakkhapaccaya samuṭṭhānatā
anya-e0301n0:1111_3: etassa vuttāti. Vuccate, kammajarūpānināma udake pakkhittāni satapākatelāni viya
anya-e0301n0:1111_4: pakatiyāva kammānurūpaṃ lahu mudu kammañña bhūtāni honti. Tasmā tesaṃ visuṃ lahutādi
anya-e0301n0:1111_5: vikāronāma natthi. Yato tesaṃ ekasmiṃbhave ekāaddhā paccuppannatāva labbhatīti. Evañca
anya-e0301n0:1111_6: katvā yamakesupi tesaṃ kālabhedo paṭisandhivutiparicchinnena addhā paccuppanneneva
anya-e0301n0:1111_7: gahitoti. Yasmā pana cittaṃnāma nānānīvaraṇabhedavasenavā sukha dukkha pīti passaddhi
anya-e0301n0:1111_8: saddhā paññādi vasenavā nānā khaṇesu nānā avatthā yuttaṃ hoti. Tathā utuāhārāca sappāyā
anya-e0301n0:1111_9: sappāyabhedavasena. Tasmā tehi tīhi samuṭṭhita rūpānieva nānākhaṇesu garukalahukādi
anya-e0301n0:1111_10: vasena nānāvikārayuttāni honti. Yato tesaṃ santati samaya vasena kālabhedo labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1111_11: Evañca katvā yamakesupi akammajānaṃ pavattikāle khaṇasantativasenapi kālabhedo gahitoti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_12: Nanu kammavipākajā ābādhāti vuttaṃ. Satica kamma samuṭṭhāne ābādharūpe tatovuṭṭhānabhūto
anya-e0301n0:1111_13: kammajo lahutādi guṇopi visuṃ labbhamāno siyāti. Na. Yesañhi vasena imasmiṃ sarīre
anya-e0301n0:1111_14: kammavipākajānāma ābādhā uppajjanti. Tāni upapīḷakupa ghātakakammānipi gatikālapayoga
anya-e0301n0:1111_15: vipattiyo labhamānāni eva sarīraṭṭhakā pathavādayo vātapittādayoca utusamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0301n0:1111_16: dhātuyo khobhetvā nānābādhe uppādenti. Utusamuṭṭhānāsu pana khubbhitāsu itarāni tadanugatikāni
anya-e0301n0:1111_17: eva honti. Teneva hi sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jigacchāyapi ruppati, vipāsāyapi
anya-e0301n0:1111_18: ruppatītiādinā utupadhānova rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanapaccayo vuttoti. Tasmā kevalaṃ kammasamuṭṭhāno
anya-e0301n0:1111_19: ābādhonāma natthi. Yato yathāvutto kammajo lahutādiguṇonāma visuṃ labbhamāno siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1112_0: Yasmā pana avihiṃsā kammanibbattā sattā tesaṃ upapīḷakādīnaṃ kammānaṃ suvidūratāyaceva
anya-e0301n0:1112_2: honti. Tasmā tadatthaṃ sandhāya appābādhasaṃvattanikā esā māṇavapaṭipadā. Yadidaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1112_3: avihiṃsāti vuttaṃ, na pana appābādhanimittassa lahutādittayassa kammasamuṭṭhānatāya.
anya-e0301n0:1112_4: Evañca katvā rūpakaṇḍena kammassakaṭattārūpesu eva etaṃ rūpattayaṃ niddiṭṭhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1112_5: Rūpakalāpānāma ekasmiṃ paramāṇusmiṃpi bahuvidhā hutvā pavattanti. Tasmā catujarūpa
anya-e0301n0:1112_6: kalāpesu ghanabhāvena pavattamānesu kalāpantarabhūtā ākāsadhātupi dissamānāeva hotīti
anya-e0301n0:1112_7: katvā catujesu tassā gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Kāmaṃ sabbānipi anipphannarūpāni kenaci paccayena
anya-e0301n0:1112_8: anipphāditāni honti. Tesu pana na tathā lakkhaṇarūpāni. Yathā itarāni cittādi paccaya
anya-e0301n0:1112_9: visesena dissamāna visesāni hontīti vuttaṃ lakkhaṇarūpāni na kutoci jāyantīti. Jāyamānādi
anya-e0301n0:1112_10: rūpānanti jāyamāna jiyyamāna miyyamānānaṃ rūpakalāpānaṃ. Sabhāvattāti jātijarāmaraṇasaṅkhātalakkhaṇasabhāvamattattā.
anya-e0301n0:1112_11: Etthaca rūpakaṇḍe utusamuṭṭhānanti ca āhārasamuṭṭhānanti ca vuttaṃ natthi. Paṭṭhāne eva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1113_0: Ettha siyā, jaratā aniccatā pāḷiyameva na kutoci samuṭṭhānāti vuttā. Tasmā idhapi
anya-e0301n0:1113_1: tāsaṃ nakutoci samuṭṭhānesu gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Upacayasantatiyo pana pāḷiyaṃpi kutoci
anya-e0301n0:1113_2: samuṭṭhānesu vuttā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi tāhi saddhiṃ visati kammajarūpāni sattarasa cittajarūpāni
anya-e0301n0:1113_3: cuddasa utujarūpāni terasa āhāraja rūpāni vuttāni. Tasmā idha tāsaṃ nakutocisamuṭṭhānatā
anya-e0301n0:1113_4: navattabbāti. Vuccate, rūpajanakānaṃ jananabyāpāronāma attanā janitarūpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1113_5: eva pharati. Na-tato paraṃ, tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe labbhamānā upacayasantatiyoyeva kutoci
anya-e0301n0:1113_6: jātapariyāyaṃ arahanti, na jaratā aniccatāyoti katvā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathā yaṃca tāsaṃeva
anya-e0301n0:1113_7: kutoci samuṭṭhānesu gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Apica, pubbe ajātā dhammā paccaye sati jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1113_8: Asati na jāyantīti atthi. Jātā pana dhammā paccaye sati jiyyanti, miyyanti. Asati
anya-e0301n0:1113_9: najiyyanti namiyyantīti natthi, tasmā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ pavatti ekantena paccayāyattā
anya-e0301n0:1113_10: hoti. Pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ pavatti pana ekantena paccaya nirapekkhā hotīti iminā pariyāyena
anya-e0301n0:1113_11: tāsaṃ tesu gahaṇaṃ agahaṇañca veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana suttapadesu jarāmaraṇaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0301n0:1113_12: saṅkhataṃ paṭicca samuppannanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ jātiyā satieva tadubhayaṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1113_13: Asati na paññāyatīti iminā pariyāyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Idha pana pubbe vuttanayena
anya-e0301n0:1113_14: itara anipphannarūpāni viya cattāripi etāni cittādipaccayavisesena dissamānavisesāni
anya-e0301n0:1113_15: na hontīti catunnaṃpi na kutoci jātatā vuttā. Evaṃsantepi sārataraṃ pāḷinayaṃ atidhāvanto
anya-e0301n0:1113_16: viya hotīti upacayasanta tīnaṃ kutoci samuṭṭhānesu saṅgahoeva seyyoti. [Rūpasamuṭṭhānanayo]
anya-e0301n0:1114_0: 159. Eko eva jāti saṅkhāto uppādo etesanti ekuppādā. Ekoeva aniccatāsaṅkhāto nirodho
anya-e0301n0:1114_1: etesanti ekanirodhā. Ekasaddo cettha saṅkhāne pavatto. Tasmā tena yāni rūpāni ekāyaeva
anya-e0301n0:1114_2: jātiyā jāyanti. Ekāya eva aniccatāya nirujjhanti. Tesaṃ piṇḍi idha rūpakalāponāmāti
anya-e0301n0:1114_3: dasseti. Ye pana kalāpagata rūpagaṇanāya ekasmiṃ kalāpepi anekāni jātiādīni kappenti,
anya-e0301n0:1114_4: tesaṃ mūlaṭīkāya nasameti. Yuttica natthi. Vuttañhi tattha ekekakalāpa pariyāpannānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1114_5: rūpānaṃ saheva uppādādipavattito ekekakalāpassa uppādādayo ekekāva hontīti yathā
anya-e0301n0:1114_6: ekekassa kalāpassa jīvitindriyaṃ kalāpā nupālakaṃ upādāya rūpanti vuccati. Evaṃ kalāpuppādādi
anya-e0301n0:1114_7: sabhāvā jātiādayo upādāyarūpānicceva vuccanti. Evaṃ vikārapariccheda rūpānica yojetabbānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1114_8: Yadica yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo. So rūpassa upacayotica yo rūpassa upacayo. Sārūpassa
anya-e0301n0:1114_9: santatītica vuttattā tāni jātiādīni lakkhaṇarūpāni visuṃvisuṃ rūpānaṃeva, nakalāpassāti
anya-e0301n0:1114_10: vucceyyuṃ. Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūtiādinā vuttattā
anya-e0301n0:1114_11: cakkhādi jīvitādīnipi ekasmiṃ kalāpe anekānieva āpajjeyyuṃ. Tasmā tathā kappanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1114_12: akatvā ekasmiṃ kalāpe aññāni upādārūpāni viya lakkhaṇarūpānipi ekekānievāti niṭṭhaṃ gantabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1115_0: Eko samāno mahābhūtasaṅkhāto nissayo etesanti ekanissayā. Ettha pana samānatthe ekasaddo
anya-e0301n0:1115_2: yuttāni. Tāni ekantena sahavuttīni nāma hontīti vuttaṃ sahavuttinoti. Dasaparimāṇāniassātidasakaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1115_3: Dasannaṃ samūho vā dasakaṃ. Cakkhunā upalakkhitaṃ dasakanti cakkhudasakaṃ. Cakkhupadhānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1115_4: dasakaṃ cakkhudasakaṃ. Esanayo sesesupi. Yasmā pana cittajo saddo viññattivikārena
anya-e0301n0:1115_5: vinā napavattati. Viññattivikāroca tena saddena vinā napavattati. Tasmā cittajaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1115_6: saddanavakaṃvā vacīviññattinavakaṃvā nasambhavatīti adhippāyena vacīviññatti sadde
anya-e0301n0:1115_7: hi ca sahavacīviññatti dasakanti vuttaṃ. Ettha pana viññatti vikāro saddena vinā
anya-e0301n0:1115_8: napavattatīti idaṃ tāva yujjati. Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1115_9: Idaṃ taṃrūpaṃ vacīviññattīti hi vuttaṃ. Viññattivikārarahitaṃ pana cittajaṃ saddanavakaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1115_10: Aṭṭhakathāsu āgatameva. Yathāha-paṭiccasamuppāda niddesesu paṭisandhikkhaṇato uddhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1116_0: Mahāaṭṭhakathā nayena viññatti rahito vitakka vipphāra saddonāma asota viññeyyo cittajo
anya-e0301n0:1116_1: saddo labbhati. So pana saṅgahakārena paṭisiddho. Yathāha-paṭṭhānepi cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1116_2: saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti āvataṃ. Tasmā vinā viññattighaṭṭanāya
anya-e0301n0:1116_3: uppajjamāno asota viññeyyo vitakkavipphārasaddonāma natthīti. Visuddhimagge assāsa
anya-e0301n0:1116_4: passāse cittajaṃ saddanavakaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha-cittaje assāsa passāsa koṭṭhāsepi ojaṭṭhamakañceva
anya-e0301n0:1116_5: saddocāti navāti, saddanavakeca āgate saddalahutādi dvādasakaṃpi āgatameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1116_6: Tasmā suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, saddanavakaṃ, kāyaviññatti nākaṃ, vacīviññatti dasakaṃ, lahutādekā
anya-e0301n0:1116_7: dasakaṃ, saddalahutādidvādasakaṃ, kāyaviññatti lahutādi dvādasakaṃ, vacīviññattisaddalahutādi
anya-e0301n0:1116_8: te rasakanti aṭṭhacittajakalāpā paccetabbāti. Saccasaṅkhepe pana sadda lahutādi dvādasakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1116_9: visuṃ agahetvā cittaja kalāpā satteva vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1118_0: Mahāṭṭhakathānayena viññattirahite asota viññeyye vitakka vipphārasadde saddanavakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1118_1: dassetvā puna vādantaraṃ dassentena. Apica, mahājanasannipātassa dūrato apaññāyamānakkharapadabyañjanattho
anya-e0301n0:1118_2: cittasamuṭṭhānanighosasaddo aviññattiko evāti vadanti. Tathā migapakkhīnaṃca aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1118_3: bhāsaṃ ajānantānaṃ andhadamiḷādinaṃ aviññattiko cittasamuṭṭhānasaddo atthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1119_0: Tattha viññattirahito asotaviññeyyo vitakkavipphāra saddo aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0301n0:1119_1: Mahājanasannipātassa citta samuṭṭhāna nighosasaddopi āsanne ṭhitānaṃ paññāyamānakkharapada
anya-e0301n0:1119_2: byañjanattho saviññattikoeva hoti. Itarathā sabbepi citta jasaddā dūratare ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1119_3: apaññāyamāna padabyañjanāeva hontīti sabbepi viññattirahitā siyunti. Naca migapakkhiādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1119_4: cittajo saddo viññattirahito hoti. Samānajātiyānaṃ paresaṃ adhippāyattha viññāpanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1121: Saddanavakaṃ panettha accharā saṅghāta pāṇippahārādi sadda sahitaṃ aṭṭhakamevāti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1122_0: Tādiso hi saddo cittapaccayo utusamuṭṭhānoeva. Tasmā visuddhimagge vuttanayena assāsapassāsevā
anya-e0301n0:1122_1: avacīghosesu kadāci cittasahitesu ukkāsita khipita vamita chaḍḍitasaddādīsu pivā
anya-e0301n0:1122_2: etaṃ saddanavakaṃ veditabbanti. Utujakalāpesu pacchimā dvepi kasmā bahiddhā nalabbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1122_3: Nanu bahiddhāpi rūpānaṃ lahu garu mudu thaddha kammaññatā dissantīti. Saccaṃ, tā
anya-e0301n0:1122_4: pana bhūtānaṃ omattādhimatta vasena honti, na pana lahutādittayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1122_5: Kasmā pana ākāsadhātuca lakkhaṇarūpānica rūpakalāpesu nagahitānīti vuttaṃ kalāpānantiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1122_6: Ākāsadhātukalāpānaṃ pariccheda mattattā kassaci rūpakalāpassa aṅgabhūtā avayavabhūtā
anya-e0301n0:1122_7: na hoti, lakkhaṇarūpānica sabbesaṃpi kalāpānaṃ uppādādi lakkhaṇa mattattā vikārarūpāni
anya-e0301n0:1122_8: viya kalāpānaṃ bhedakarāni aṅgabhūtāni kalāpavisesapaññāpanassa kāraṇabhūtāni na
anya-e0301n0:1122_9: honti. Tasmā tāni tesu nagahitānīti dasseti. Etena ekuppādātiādinā pubbe vuttaniyamo
anya-e0301n0:1122_10: nipphannarūpānaññeva, na anipphannarūpānaṃ. Tesaṃ pana kalāpa bheda karaṇa meva kalāpaṅganti
anya-e0301n0:1122_11: ca dīpeti. Evañca katvā ekanirodhaṅgarahitassapi viññattidvayassa kalāpabheda karattāeva
anya-e0301n0:1122_12: tesu gahaṇaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hotīti veditabbanti. [Kalāpayojanā]
anya-e0301n0:1123: 160. Yathārahanti sabhāvakā bhāvakānaṃ paripuṇṇāpari puṇṇindriyānañca arahānurūpato. Anūnānīti paripuṇṇāni. Nañhi idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ kāmaloke pavattiyaṃ na labbhatīti atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1125: “Yathārahanti sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ anurūpato”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1126: Na hi anūnānīti idaṃ puggalavasena visesanaṃ hotīti. Saṃsedajānañcevaopapātikānañcāti ettha mahāsīhanādasutte-
anya-e0301n0:1127_0: Catasso kho imā sāriputta yoniyo. Katamā catasso, aṇḍajā yoni jalābujā yoni saṃsedajāyoni
anya-e0301n0:1127_1: opapātikā yonīti. Ye kho te sāriputta sattā aṇḍakosaṃ abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja
anya-e0301n0:1127_2: jāyanti, ayaṃ vuccati sāriputta aṇḍajā yoni. Ye kho te sāriputta sattā vatthikosaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1127_3: abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja jāyanti. Ayaṃ vuccati sāriputta jalābujā yoni. Ye kho
anya-e0301n0:1127_4: tesāri puttasattāpūtimacchevā jāyanti. Pūtikuṇapevā pūtikummāsevā candanikāyavā oḷigallevā
anya-e0301n0:1127_5: jāyanti, ayaṃ vuccati sāriputta saṃsedajā yoni. Devā nerakā ekacce ca manussā ekacceca
anya-e0301n0:1127_6: vinipātikā ayaṃ vuccati sāriputta opapātikā yonīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1128_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca aṇḍe jātā aṇḍajā. Jalābumhi jātā jalābujā. Saṃsede jātā saṃsedajā.
anya-e0301n0:1128_1: Vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppattitvā viya nibbattā abhinibbattāti opapātikā. Abhinibbhijja
anya-e0301n0:1128_2: jāyantīti bhinditvā nikkhamanavasena jāyanti. Pūti kuṇapetiādīhi aniṭṭhaṭṭhānāneva
anya-e0301n0:1128_3: dassitāni. Iṭṭhesu sappi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu sattā jāyantievāti vuttaṃ. Etthaca
anya-e0301n0:1128_4: purimesu dvīsu pāḷinayena aṇḍaṃ vuccati aṇḍakoso. Jalābuvuccati vatthikoso, tato
anya-e0301n0:1128_5: jātā vijātā nikkhantāti aṇḍajā jalābujātica vuccantīti veditabbā. Tattha jaraṃ jīraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1128_6: bhedaṃ yāti upetīti jalābūti saddanītiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Jalaṃ vuccati kalalaṃ. Taṃ āvunāti
anya-e0301n0:1128_7: paṭicchādeti avativā rakkhatīti jalābu, gabbhapaliveṭhanāsayo. Saṃsīdanti etthāti
anya-e0301n0:1128_9: koca allakilinnapadeso. Upapattikkhaṇeeva paripuṇṇaaṅgapaccaṅgattā tato tato uppatitvā
anya-e0301n0:1130_0: Aṇḍajādayopi aṇḍakosādimhi okkamantā uppatantā eva nāma hontīti tesaṃpi opapātikattapasaṅgaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1130_1: maññamāno upapāto nesaṃ atthīti opapātikāti vatvā ukkaṃsagati paricchedavasena cettha
anya-e0301n0:1130_2: visiṭṭhaopapāto gahito. Yathā abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbāti vadati.
anya-e0301n0:1131_0: Ukkaṭṭhavasenāti paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvasaṅkhātena ukkaṃsatāvena, tattha opapātikā aṅgapaccaṅgehi
anya-e0301n0:1131_1: saha sabbaso paripuṇṇena attabhāvena jāyanti. Puna tesaṃ vaḍḍhanakiccaṃ natthi. Saṃsedajānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1131_2: pana āyatanāni eva paripuṇṇāni honti. Aṅgapaccaṅgāni pana puna vaḍḍhitvāeva paripuṇṇāni
anya-e0301n0:1131_4: na labbhanti jātibadhira jaccaghānakānaṃ abhāvakānañca sambhavatoti appoyo. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:1131_5: tāni sabbānipi sugati duggati jātiyānaṃ ahetukasaṃsedajānaṃ kadāci nalabbhanti. Sugatiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1131_6: pana opapātikabhāvonāma seṭṭho attabhāva paṭilābhoti nayena kenaci omakena kammena
anya-e0301n0:1131_7: labbhati. Tasmā sugatijāti yānaṃ opapātikānaṃ aparipuṇṇindriyatānāma natthi aññatra
anya-e0301n0:1131_8: abhāvakehi ādikappikehiti. Duggatijātiyānaṃpi pana tesaṃ kadāci cakkhu sota bhāva
anya-e0301n0:1131_9: vekallatāeva vattabbā. Na ghānavekallatā. Kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthīti
anya-e0301n0:1131_10: hi aṭṭha kathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Jivhāvekallatānāma sabbesaṃpi natthi yevāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1132: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasā yatanāni pātubhavanti. Kassaci dasa. Kassaciaparāni dasa. Kassaci nava. Kassaci sattāyatanāni pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_0: Tattha kāmadhātuyanti kāmaloke. Upapattikkhaṇeti paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe.
anya-e0301n0:1133_1: Kassaci ekādasā yatanānītiādisu catūsu vākyesu saṃsedajopapātikā vuttā. Kassaci sattāyatanānīti
anya-e0301n0:1133_2: ettha pana gabbhaseyyakova vutto. Tattha yasmā sattāyatanaṃ nāma paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1133_3: na labbhati. Pavatti kāleyeva labbhati. Tasmā ekādasayatanānīti vuttaṃ. Kassaci dasāti
anya-e0301n0:1133_4: cakkhuvekallavasena. Kassaci aparāni dasāti sota vekallavasena. Kassaci navāti cakkhusota
anya-e0301n0:1133_5: dvaya vekalla vasena vuttaṃ. Yadica aghānako opapātikonāma siyā. Tadā suddhajaccaghānakena
anya-e0301n0:1133_6: saddhiṃ tayo dasakavārā vuttā siyuṃ. Tathā jaccandhaghānaka jaccabadhiraghānakehi
anya-e0301n0:1133_7: saddhiṃ tayo navakavārā ekoca aṭṭhakavāro vutto siyā tiṇṇaṃ vipannānaṃ vasena. Tathā
anya-e0301n0:1133_8: avuttattā pana natthi aghānako opapāti koti viññāyatīti. Tasmiṃ pana vibhaṅge indriyavāre
anya-e0301n0:1133_9: napuṃsakānaṃ opapātikānanti avuttattā thapetvā ādikappike abhāvakopi opapātiko natthiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1133_10: Pāḷiyaṃ avuttaṃpi pana saṃsedajānaṃ vuttapakāraṃ cakkhādivekallaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasena
anya-e0301n0:1133_11: veditabbaṃ. Yathāha-sattati ukkaṃsatova rūpāni saṃsedajopapāta yonīsu. Athavā, avakaṃsato
anya-e0301n0:1133_12: tiṃsāti. Tattha tiṃsāti jivhākāya vatthu dasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsarūpānīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_13: Idañhi vacanaṃ saṃsedajānaṃ vasena vuttanti mahāṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ācariyā nandattherena
anya-e0301n0:1133_14: pana yamake ghānajivhānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāva vuttitā vuttāti jivhā vekallatā viya
anya-e0301n0:1133_15: ghānavekallatāpi natthīti icchitaṃ. Indriya yamake pana –
anya-e0301n0:1134_0: Yassavā pana itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa ghānindriyaṃ uppajjatīti. Aghānakānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1134_1: itthīnaṃ upapajjantīnaṃ tāsaṃ itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, noca tāsaṅghānindriyaṃ uppajjatītica.
anya-e0301n0:1134_2: Yassavā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa ghānindriyaṃ uppajjatīti. Aghānakānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1134_3: purisānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, noca tesaṃ ghānindriyaṃ uppajjatītica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1135: Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena ghānavekallatāpi atthīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1137_0: Apare pana yamake ghānajivhānaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti ajivhassa asambhavato aghānakassapi
anya-e0301n0:1137_1: abhāvameva vaṇṇenti. Tatthāpi yathā cakkhusotāni rūpabhave ghāna jivhāhi vinā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1137_2: Na evaṃ ghānajivhā aññamaññaṃ vinā pavattanti. Dvinnaṃpi rūpabhave anuppajjanatoti
anya-e0301n0:1137_3: evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kāmabhave apavatti vasena tesaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti na na sakkā vattunti vuttaṃ. Taṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1138_0: Okāsavāre hi ekantasahacāritā vuttamattena puggalesu ekantasahacāritā na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1138_1: Gabbhe mātukucchimhi sentīti gabbhaseyyakā. Rūpādīsu khandhesu sañjanti laggantīti
anya-e0301n0:1138_2: sattā. Yathāha-rūpe kho rādha yo chando, yo rāgo, yā nandi, yā taṇhā, tatra satto,
anya-e0301n0:1138_3: tatra visatto, tena sattoti vuccatītiādi. Gabbhaseyyāca te sattācāti samāso. Aṇḍajāceva
anya-e0301n0:1138_4: jalābujāca. Tīṇidasakāni pātu bhavanti. Yāni kalalanti vuccanti. Bhāvadasakaṃ kadāci
anya-e0301n0:1138_5: nalabbhati napuṃsakassāti adhippāyo. Evañcakatvā dhammahadayavibhaṅge gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1138_6: sattānaṃ ahetukānaṃ napuṃsakānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe cattārindriyāni pātubhavanti kāyindriyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1138_7: manindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ upekkhindriyanti vuttaṃ. Tatoparanti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇato
anya-e0301n0:1138_8: paraṃ. Pavattikāleti ekadasame sattāhe. Tathā hi kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sesāni
anya-e0301n0:1138_9: cattāri sattasattati rattimhi jāyantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha sesānīti kāyāyatana manāyatanato
anya-e0301n0:1138_10: avasesāni cattāri cakkhusotaghānajivhā yatanāni. Sattasattatirattimhīti ekādasamasattāhassa
anya-e0301n0:1138_11: pariyosānarattimhi. Ayañca attho yamakaṭīkāya dīpetabbo. Vuttañhi tattha –
anya-e0301n0:1139: Gabbhaseyyakassa pacchimabhavikassa upapajjantassa ekadasa masattāhā orato ṭhitassa rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, noca cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1140_0: Yaṃ pana yassavā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1140_1: Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1140_2: tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha. Noca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti ettha
anya-e0301n0:1141_0: Taṃ ye ekādasamasattāhā orato kālaṅkarissanti. Tesaṃ ghānāyatanānibbattakakammena
anya-e0301n0:1141_1: gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttantica vuttaṃ. Etthaca cakkhughānesu vuttesu sotajivhā
anya-e0301n0:1143: “Pavattikāleti sattame sattāheti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1144: Aṭṭhakathā virodhato īdisesu ca ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathā pamāṇatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1146: “Ṭīkākāramatena ekādasame sattāhe vāti” vuttaṃ. Tampi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1147: Nahi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddiṭṭhato vutto vinicchayo ṭīkākāra matonāma sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1149_1: ghāna dasakaṃ. Tato sattāhā tikkamena jivhādasakanti evaṃ anukkamenāti vuttaṃ”. Taṃpi na daṭṭhabba.
anya-e0301n0:1152: “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi hi ayamattho dassito vā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1153_0: Na hi sānāma aṭṭhakathā atthi. Yattha īdiso uppattikkamo dassito siyā. Nanu paṭiccasamuppādaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0301n0:1153_2: ce.Na. Tañhi viññāṇādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvapavattikkamena
anya-e0301n0:1153_3: pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ pañcapadaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Āyatananiddesaṭṭhakathāsu pana so paṭikkhittoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1153_4: Naca aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitto uppattikkamo therena idha kamenāti iminā pāṭhena dassitoti
anya-e0301n0:1153_5: sakkā vattunti. Tasmā kamenāti idhapi desanakkamenāti attho. Desitānīti sambandhoca veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1155: Sākhāvatthaṃ atikkamma pacchā sattame sattāhe cakkhu sotaghānajivhādasakāca uppajjanti. Ṭīkākāropana ekādasame sattāheti āhāti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi nayujjati yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1156: Ettha ca kalalādīnaṃ uppattikkamo saṃyuttake vutto. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1157: Pathamaṃ kalalaṃ hoti, kalalā hoti abbudaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1158: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesiyā nibbattate ghano;
anya-e0301n0:1159: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpicāti.
anya-e0301n0:1160_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ. Tattha pathamanti pathamena paṭisandhiviññāṇena tissoti vā
anya-e0301n0:1160_1: phussotivā nāmaṃ natthi. Athakho tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabindupamāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1163: Kalalā hoti abbudanti tasmā kalalā sattāhaccayena maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇaṃ abbudaṃnāma hoti, kalalanti nāmaṃ anta radhāyati. Vuttaṃpi cetaṃ –
anya-e0301n0:1166_0: Abbudā jāyate pesīti tasmāpi abbudā sattāhaccayena vilīna tipusadisā pesināma sañjāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1166_1: Sā maricaphāṇitena dīpetabbā. Gāmadārakā hi supakkāni maricāni gahetvā sāṭakantare
anya-e0301n0:1166_2: bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā pīḷetvā maṇḍaṃ ādāya kapāle pakkhipitvā ātape thapenti. Taṃ sukkhamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1166_3: sukkhamānaṃ sabbabhāgehi muccati. Evarūpā pesi hoti. Abbudanti nāmaṃ antaradhāyati. Vuttaṃpi cetaṃ –
anya-e0301n0:1169: Pesiyā nibbattate ghanoti tato pesito sattāhacca yena kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhāno ghanonāma maṃsapesi piṇḍo nibbattati. Pesītināmaṃ antaradhāyati. Vuttaṃpi cetaṃ –
anya-e0301n0:1174_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyantīti pañcame sattāhe dvinnaṃ hatthapādānaṃ sīsassaca atthāya pañcapīḷakā
anya-e0301n0:1174_1: jāyanti. Yaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃpañcame kho bhikkhave sattāhe pañcapīḷakā jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_2: Saṇṭhanti kamma toti. Kesā lomā nakhāpicāti dvācattālīsame sattāhe etāni jāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_3: Ettha ca chaṭṭhasattāhādayo chasattāhā pasādanissayānaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ anukkamena
anya-e0301n0:1174_4: vaḍḍhitvā pariṇatakālā honti. Cakkhādīni pana ekādasama sattāhassa pariyo sānadivase
anya-e0301n0:1174_5: ekato jāyantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha tilatelassa yathābindūtiādinā
anya-e0301n0:1174_6: kalalassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ thokaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1174_7: pavattamānaṃ. Na hi tadā tādisaṃ pakaticakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ vaṇṇajātaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1174_8: tassa paññāyeyyāti. Anumānato pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ekāya ūkāya sattamo bhāgo likkhānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1174_9: Likkhāya chattiṃsatimo bhāgo rathareṇunāma. Rathareṇussa chattiṃsatimo. Tajjārī nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1174_10: Tajjāriyā chattiṃsatimo aṇunāma. Aṇussa chattiṃsatimo bhāgo paramāṇunāma. So pana
anya-e0301n0:1174_11: ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa āpātaṃ nāgacchati. Dibbacakkhusseva āgacchatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1174_12: vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ chattiṃsa parimāno aṇu pana titticchidda tālacchiddehi paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu
anya-e0301n0:1174_13: vaṭṭivaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyatīti vuttaṃ. Sakalaṃ pana kalāpattayaparimāṇamattabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1174_14: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paramāṇutopi parittakameva siyā. So hi santānānubandhavasena pavattattā
anya-e0301n0:1174_15: khaṇe khaṇe upacitarūpakalāpasamūhoeva hotīti heṭṭhima koṭiyā ekūnapaññāsakalāpaparimāṇoeva
anya-e0301n0:1174_16: siyā. Tato parittake sati santāna ghaṭanasseva asambhavatoti. Yaṃ pana mahāṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1174_17: te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ dhātūnaṃ cuṇṇamanasikārānurūpamattavasena
anya-e0301n0:1174_18: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Dutīyacittanti pathama bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Ṭhitikālanti paṭisandhi
anya-e0301n0:1174_19: cittassa ṭhitikālaṃ. Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva abbudabhāva pesibhāva
anya-e0301n0:1174_20: ghanabhāvādi pattakāle mātuyā āmāsayagatāya ajjhohaṭāhāra sinehabhūtāya ojāya jalābumūlā
anya-e0301n0:1175: Yañcassa bhuñjati mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1176: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato tiroti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca tena so tattha yāpetīti tassa hi nātito uṭṭhito nāḷo mātuudara paṭalena
anya-e0301n0:1177_1: ekābaddho hoti. So uppaladaṇḍako viya chiddo. Tena āhāraraso saṃsaritvā āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_2: samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ so dasamāse yāpeti. Mātukucchigato tiroti mātuyā tiro kucchigato.
anya-e0301n0:1177_3: Mātukucchiyā abbhantaragatoti atthoti vuttaṃ. Tattha pana nābhināḷassa uṭṭhitakālaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_4: sandhāya nātito uṭṭhito nāḷoti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi abbudādikāle tassa nātināḷonāma
anya-e0301n0:1177_5: uṭṭhito siyāti. Saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ pana yaṃkiñci laddhaṃvā attano kheḷaṃvā ajjhoharaṇakāle
anya-e0301n0:1177_6: ojāpharaṇaṃ upādāya. Tena vuttaṃ ojāpharaṇamupādāyaāhārasamuṭṭhānāti. Cuticittopari
anya-e0301n0:1177_7: sattarasamacittassāti cuticittato upari pubbakāle sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa.
anya-e0301n0:1177_8: Kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti tesaṃ tato paṭṭhāya anuppannattāyeva tato satta rasamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_9: cuticittaṃnāma hoti. No aññathāti. Puretaranti tassa sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃeva
anya-e0301n0:1177_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatoparanti cuticittato parasmiṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇaparimāṇe khaṇe.
anya-e0301n0:1177_11: Cittajāhārajarūpañcāti cittajarūpasantānaṃ āhāraja rūpasantānañca vocchijjati anupādinnakasantāne
anya-e0301n0:1177_12: tesaṃ uppattiyā asambhavato. Yamettha vattabbaṃ taṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāne vuttameva. Bhāvadasakaṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:1177_13: kāmarāganidānakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti tabbirāga bhāvanākammanibbatte rūpaloke tassa
anya-e0301n0:1177_14: alābho vutto. Āhārajakalāpānica na labbhanti ajjhohaṭā hārā bhāvato, tatoyevaca sarīragatassa
anya-e0301n0:1177_15: ajjhattāhārassapi rūpasamuṭṭhānā bhāvato. Ācariyānandatthero pana tattha labbhamāna
anya-e0301n0:1177_16: rūpakalāpesupi gandharasānaṃ ojāyaca abhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti. Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1177_17: pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, sotā yatanaṃ, manā yatanaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1177_18: dhammāyatananti ca, pañcadhātuyo pātubhavanti cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, sotadhātu,
anya-e0301n0:1177_19: manoviññāṇa dhātu, dhammadhātūtica, tayo āhārā pātubhavanti phassāhāro, manosañcetanā
anya-e0301n0:1177_20: hāro, viññāṇā hāroti ca vibhaṅgevuttattā. Etthaca pāḷiyaṃ rūpaloke phoṭṭhabbe paṭikkhittepi
anya-e0301n0:1177_21: kiccantarasabbhāvā mahābhūtānaṃ tattha paṭilābho avārito eva hoti. Gandhādīnaṃ pana
anya-e0301n0:1177_22: kiccantarameva natthi. Yena te dhammamattabhāvepi tiṭṭheyyaṃ tasmā tesaṃ avacanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_23: tattha abhāvameva dīpetīti ācariyassa adhippāyo. Tathā pana bhūtacatukkaṃ tattha
anya-e0301n0:1177_24: atthiyeva, yathāha-asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtātiādi. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_25: pana phoṭṭhabba dhātuca tattha paṭikkhittā. Tasmā sabbesaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammabhāve
anya-e0301n0:1177_26: samānepi yena kiccavisesena gandho raso phoṭṭhabbaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārotica vuccati. Tassa
anya-e0301n0:1177_27: natthitāya tesaṃ tena nāme na tattha anupalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya vibhaṅge kathāvatthumhi
anya-e0301n0:1177_28: yamake sūti sabbattha tesaṃ tattha paṭikkhepo. Mahābhūtānaṃ pana nisanda dhammamattabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1177_29: vijjamānānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu anupavesoti yutto siyāti vadanti. Tīṇidasakāni
anya-e0301n0:1177_30: jīvitanavakañcāti ettha ācariyānanda matiyā cakkhusattakaṃ sotasattakaṃ vatthusattakanti
anya-e0301n0:1177_31: evaṃ tīṇi sattakāni jīvitachakkañcāti vattabbaṃ. Abhiricchatīti alabbhamāne pathamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_32: vajjite tattha labbhamānatāvasena avasissati. Atirekaṃvā hotīti attho. Etthaca rūpaloke
anya-e0301n0:1177_33: viya kāmaloke jīvitanavakaṃ kasmā visuṃ na vuttanti. Rūpaloke pana āhārupatthambhakassa
anya-e0301n0:1177_34: aññassaca sakalasarīrabyāpino anupālaka jīvitassa abhāvā etadeva tadubhayaṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n0:1177_35: ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ anupāletīti pākaṭaṃ tattha jīvitanavakanti visuṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmaloke
anya-e0301n0:1177_36: pana aññāni upatthambhakā nupālakāni bahūni pākaṭānica honti. Tasmā jīvitanavakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1177_37: apākaṭanti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ siyā. Kāmalokepi pana etaṃ asitādipācakaggivasena
anya-e0301n0:1177_38: tassevaca udayabhūtassa sakalasarī rānupālakassa usmāsaṅkhātassa kāyaggino vasena
anya-e0301n0:1178: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1179: Apaviddho tadā seti, niratthaṃva kaliṅgaranti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1180_0: Tattha āyūti tesu dvīsu aggīsu patiṭṭhitaṃ jīvitameva vuccati. Usmāti te dve aggayo
anya-e0301n0:1180_1: vuccanti. Yesu tikkhamandavasena visama bhūtesu kāye nānābādhā uppajjanti. Yathāha-bahvābādho
anya-e0301n0:1180_2: hoti bahvātaṅko. Visamavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannā gato hoti atiuṇhāyaatisītalāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1180_3: Samabhūtesu pana sattā nirābādhā honti. Yathāha-appābādho hoti. Appātaṅko. Samavepākiniyāgahaṇiyā
anya-e0301n0:1180_4: samannāgatohoti. Nātisītāya naccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāyāti. Keci pana asitādipācakaggismiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1180_5: eva etaṃmaññanti. Therenacanāmarūpaparicchedejīvitanavakaṃ nāma, rūpaloke visuṃ siyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1181_0: Visuddhimagge pana sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanava kañceva tīṇi ojaṭṭhamakāni
anya-e0301n0:1181_1: cāti tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti vuttaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhasūti pācakaggiassāsa
anya-e0301n0:1181_2: passāsavajjitesu tīsu tejokoṭṭhāsesu pañcasu vāyo koṭṭhāsesūti aṭṭhasu. Iti kāmalokepi
anya-e0301n0:1181_3: sakalasarīrabyāpīsu tejovāyo koṭṭhāsesu labbhamānattā etaṃ sakala sarīreeva daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_4: Ettha siyā, kasmā panettha kāmaloke viya rūpaloke rūpakalāpānaṃ nirodhakkamo na vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_5: Visesābhāvato, rūpalokepi hi maraṇakāle pana cuticitto pari sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikāla
anya-e0301n0:1181_6: mupādāya kammajarūpāni nuppajjantītiādiko nirodhakkamo kāmalokasadisoyeva. Kevalaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1181_7: panettha āhārajarūpa nirodhonāma natthi, tathā kaḷevara nikkhepoca. Tasmā tatthapi
anya-e0301n0:1181_8: cuticittato paraṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇa parimāṇe ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittajarūpasantānaṃ vocchijjati.
anya-e0301n0:1181_9: Tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparaṃparā ekadviti accharākālamattaṃpi pavattitvā vocchijjatīti
anya-e0301n0:1181_10: yuttaṃ. Naca ettakamattena kālena pavattamānāyapi rūpasantatiyā matakaḷevaraṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:1181_11: sakkā laddhuṃ. Passantānaṃ ekakkhaṇena viya sarīrassa antaradhānassa paññāyanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_12: Yathāca rūpaloke, tathā kāmalokepi upapattidevānaṃ aññesañca opapātikānanti. Tesañhi
anya-e0301n0:1181_13: sarīrāni paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva sabbaso paripuṇṇena kammajakāyena nibbattattā kammajarūpehi
anya-e0301n0:1181_14: ghanapūritāni sallahukabharāni ca honti. Itararūpāni kammajarūpesu patiṭṭhāya pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_15: Tasmā tesaṃ cutikāle kammajarūpesu niruddhesu tāni tinna patiṭṭhāni hutvā ciraṃ santānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1181_16: ghaṭṭetuṃ nasakkonti. Thokaṃ pavattitvā sabbaso nirujjhanti. Sarīranikkheponāma tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1183: “Maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesaṃpi tisamuṭṭhānāni dvisamuṭṭhānānica saheva nirujjhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1184_0: Evañhi sati sabbesaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ maraṇāsannacittāni rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpentīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1184_1: Na hi maraṇāsanna citta samuṭṭhitāni rūpāni kammajarūpehi saheva nirujjhantīti sakkā
anya-e0301n0:1184_2: vattunti. Yathācatāni kammajarūpanirodhato thokaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhanti. Tathā utujarūpānipi
anya-e0301n0:1184_3: cittajarūpanirodhato thokaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhantīti na na sakkā viññātuṃ. Naca tāvattakena
anya-e0301n0:1184_4: kālena tesu pavatta mānesupi sarīranikkheponāma sakkā bhavitunti. Brahmānaṃ pana
anya-e0301n0:1184_5: thina middhādīnaṃ nīvaraṇajātiyānaṃ atthitāya tadanurūpaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ tadanugatikānañca
anya-e0301n0:1184_6: utujarūpānaṃ lahukagarukatādivikāro na na sambhavatīti lahutādittayaṃpi gahetvā vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1184_7: tevīsarūpesūti. Ghānādittayabhāvadvayavajjāni tevīsarūpāni honti. Tāniyeva cakkhu
anya-e0301n0:1184_8: sotavatthu viññattidvayavajjāni asaññīnaṃ sattaraseva rūpāni hontīti yojanā. Asaññīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1184_9: pana garulahutādipakāro cinte tabbo. Na vā cintetabbo rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanavikārassa
anya-e0301n0:1184_10: bahukāraṇattāti. Upapattiyanti kāmarūpāsaññīnaṃ paṭisandhiyā uppādakkhaṇe. Uppādakkhaṇoeva
anya-e0301n0:1184_11: hi ekantena upapattikhaṇonāma hotīti. Pavattetūti paṭisandhiyā ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n0:1184_12: sakale pavattikāle pana nakiñcipi nalabbhati. Labbhatiyevāti adhippāyo. Na hi idaṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:1184_13: rūpaṃ pavatte nalabbhati. Paṭisandhiyaṃeva labbhatīti atthīti. [Rūpapavattikkamo]
anya-e0301n0:1185_0: 161. Evaṃ cittacetasika rūpasaṅgahaṃ katvā idāni yathā nuppattaṃ nibbānasaṅgahaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_1: karonto nibbānaṃpanātiādi māha. Nibbānaṃ pana nibbānanti pavuccatīti sambandho. Lokuttarasaṅkhātanti
anya-e0301n0:1185_2: lokuttaranti bhagavatā kathitaṃ, yathāha-katame dhammā lokuttarā. Cattāroca ariyamaggā
anya-e0301n0:1185_3: cattārica sāmaññaphalāni asaṅkhatāca dhātu, ime dhammā lokuttarāti. Etena nibbānassa
anya-e0301n0:1185_4: paññattimattabhāvaṃ nivatteti. Na hi lokavohārasiddhā paññatti lokuttarānāma sakkā
anya-e0301n0:1185_5: bhavitunti. Catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbanti cakkhumantena candamaṇḍalaṃviya cakkhunā
anya-e0301n0:1185_6: paṭiladdhamaggañāṇehi ariyajanehi catūhi ariyamaggañāṇehi paccakkhato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1185_7: Paṭivijjhitabbanti attho. Tattha catumaggañāṇenāti etena tādi samhā paṭipattimaggato
anya-e0301n0:1185_8: vimukhānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ jaccandhānaṃ viya canda maṇḍalassa tassa avisayabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_9: dasseti. Na ca jaccandhānaṃ cakkhumhi anupaladdhamattena candamaṇḍalaṃ natthināma
anya-e0301n0:1185_10: hotīti. Sacchikātabbanti etena paramatthato vijjamānabhāvaṃ dasseti. Yañhi kiñci
anya-e0301n0:1185_11: paramatthato vijjamānaṃ nahoti. Taṃ sarūpato kassa paccakkhaṃnāma bhavissatīti. Tadubhayena
anya-e0301n0:1185_12: panassa paññavantānaṃ kalyāṇakaputhujjanānaṃ anumānato siddhataṃ dīpeti, na hi anumānatopi
anya-e0301n0:1185_13: attano buddhiyaṃ asiddhassa apākaṭassa sacchikiriyāya vāyāmopināma atthi. Yena sacchikiriyā
anya-e0301n0:1185_14: siddhiyāti. Evaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato vijjamānataṃ dassetvā idāni kevalaṃ vijjamānamattameva
anya-e0301n0:1185_15: na hoti. Athakho mahātejavantaṃ mahojavantañca taṃ hotīti dassetuṃ maggaphalānamālambaṇabhūtanti
anya-e0301n0:1185_16: vuttaṃ. Etena nibbānena vināmagga phalānaṃ akiccasiddhiṃ dasseti. Tato tassa mahātejavanta
anya-e0301n0:1185_17: taṃ mahojavantatañca dīpeti. Yathā hi mahiddhiko eko rājā hoti. Tassa raṭṭhe ekasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_18: mahāgāme eko gāmabhojako ekoca corajeṭṭhako mahāparivāro vasati. Teca aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_19: vadhāya parisakkantā vicaranti. Tattha gāmabhojako nagaraṃ gantvā rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
anya-e0301n0:1185_20: So na cirasseva rājavallabho hoti. Rājato mahatiṃ āṇaṃ labhati. Taṃ sutvā corajeṭṭhako
anya-e0301n0:1185_21: idāni idhavasantassa mamajīvitaṃ natthīti attano parivārena saddhiṃ aṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1185_22: Gāmabhojakoca taṃaṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭhaṃpi muñcituṃ adatvā gahetvā vadhi. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_23: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahiddhikarājā viya hi nibbānaṃ. Gāma bhojako viya ñāṇaṃ. Corajeṭṭhako
anya-e0301n0:1185_24: viya moho. Parivāra corā viya sesakilesā. Pubbe rañño anupaṭṭhā nakāle gāmabhojako
anya-e0301n0:1185_25: viya puthujjanañāṇaṃ. Upaṭṭhānakāle gāma bhojako viya maggañāṇanti. Taṇhā pavattamānā
anya-e0301n0:1185_26: ajjhattabahiddhādi bhedesu khandhādidhammesu vinandhamānāva pavattati. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1187_0: Tasmā sā veḷugumbe veḷusākhā viya vinanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena vānasamaññaṃ labhatīti
anya-e0301n0:1187_1: vuttaṃ vānasaṅkhātāyataṇhāyāti. Nikkhantattāti nissaṭattā. Tassā visayabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0301n0:1187_2: ṭhitattāti attho. Etena vānato nikkhantanti nibbānanti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Sabhāvatoti
anya-e0301n0:1187_4: sabbaso abhāvaṭṭhenāti attho. Ekavidhaṃpīti yathā cittaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhaṃpi jātidhammattā
anya-e0301n0:1187_5: jātibhūmisampayogādi bhedena kāla disādesapuggalabhedenaca vatthuto bhinnameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1187_6: Na tathā idaṃ nibbānaṃ. Idaṃ pana sabhāvatopi vatthutopi abhinnameva hutvā ekavidhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1187_7: hoti. Idañhi anamatagge saṃsāre atīte etarahi anāgateca parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1187_8: paccekabuddhānaṃvā buddhasāvakānaṃvā sabbesaṃpi ekameva hoti. Kasmā, aniddisitabbadhammattā.
anya-e0301n0:1187_9: Viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Tattha viññāṇanti
anya-e0301n0:1187_10: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena siddhattā etaṃ tabbhāvenaeva suṭṭhu abhibyattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1187_11: katvā ñātabbaṃ. Anidassananti animittadhammattā bālaputhujjanānaṃ dassanavisayabhūtena
anya-e0301n0:1187_12: kenacinimittena nidassituṃvā kālabhedena disādesapuggalasantāna bhedena hīnapaṇītādibhedena
anya-e0301n0:1187_13: ca bhinnaṃ katvā nidassituṃvā nārahatīti attho. Anantanti pubbantāparantavirahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1187_14: Sabbatopabhanti vaṭṭadukkhapaṭipakkhasiddhehi anantehi guṇobhāsehi sabbato pabhāvantanti
anya-e0301n0:1187_15: attho. Tathā aniddisitabbadhammattāca pana anamatagge saṃsāre sabbāsuca disāsu asukasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1187_16: nāma kāle asukāyanāma disāya natthīti navattabbaṃ. Kasmā, ariyamaggaṃ bhāventena
anya-e0301n0:1187_17: yadā kadāci yattha katthaci avassaṃ adhigantabbatāvasena sabbadā sabbattha ca labbhamānattā.
anya-e0301n0:1188_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yākāci loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti. Yāca antalikkhā
anya-e0301n0:1188_1: dhārā papatanti. Na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyati. Eva meva
anya-e0301n0:1188_2: kho bhikkhave bahūcepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti. Na tena
anya-e0301n0:1189_0: Aṭṭhakathāsuca na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyatīti asaṅkhyeyyepi
anya-e0301n0:1189_1: mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ nasakkoti. Tadāpi tucchā
anya-e0301n0:1189_2: nibbāna dhātūti nasakkā vattuṃ. Buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi
anya-e0301n0:1189_3: sattā amataṃ ārādhenti. Tadāpi nasakkā vattuṃ pūrā nibbānadhātūti vuttaṃ. Brahmanimantanasutteca
anya-e0301n0:1189_4: viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañca sabbatopabhanti
anya-e0301n0:1189_5: sabbato pabhāsampannaṃ. Nibbānato hi añño koci dhammo pabhassaratarovā jotivantatarovā
anya-e0301n0:1189_6: parisuddhatarovā paṇḍara tarovā natthi. Sabbatovā pabhūtameva hoti. Nakatthaci natthīti
anya-e0301n0:1189_7: sabbatopataṃ. Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāyaṃnāma nibbānaṃ natthīti navattabbanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1190_0: Evaṃsantepi etaṃ niruddhatekālikadhamma sannissayena viññāya mānattā niruddhadhammabhedena
anya-e0301n0:1190_1: bhinnaṃ katvā upacarituṃ labbhatīti vuttaṃ saupādisesātiādi. Tattha upādīyati taṇhādiṭṭhīhi
anya-e0301n0:1190_2: bhusaṃ gaṇhīyatīti upādi. Upādinnakhandhapañcakaṃ. Soyeva ekadesenavā anavasesenavā
anya-e0301n0:1190_3: pahīnehi kammakilesehi sesoti upādiseso. Saṃvijjati tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā
anya-e0301n0:1190_4: adhigatakāleti saupādisesā. Nibbānadhātūti nibbūtisa bhāvo. Saupādisesāca sā nibbānadhātucāti
anya-e0301n0:1190_5: samāso. Natthi tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā adhigatakāleti anupādisesā, anupādisesāca
anya-e0301n0:1190_6: sā nibbānadhātucāti viggaho. Vuttañhetaṃ iti vuttake-dve mā bhikkhave nibbānadhātuyo.
anya-e0301n0:1190_7: Katamā dve, saupādisesāca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesāca nibbānadhātūtiādi. Tattha purimā
anya-e0301n0:1190_8: kilesanibbānaṃnāma. Pacchimā khandhanibbānaṃnāma. Purimāvā diṭṭhadhammika nibbānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1190_9: Pacchimā samparāyika nibbānaṃnāma. Yathāha-ekā hi dhātu idha diṭṭhadhammikā saupādisesā
anya-e0301n0:1190_10: bhavanetti saṅkhayā. Anupādisesā pana samparāyikāti. Aṅguttare pana sattanipāte ubhatobhāgavimutta
anya-e0301n0:1190_11: paññāpi muttānaṃ dvinnaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhupādisesavasena kāyasakkhidiṭṭhipatta
anya-e0301n0:1190_12: saddhāvimuttadhammānusārīsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ sekkhānaṃ āraddhavipassa kassaca yogīkalyāṇaputhujjanassa
anya-e0301n0:1190_13: kilesu pādisesavasena saupādisesatā anupādisesatāca vuttā. Tattheva navanipāte antarāparinibbāyī,
anya-e0301n0:1190_15: pañcannaṃ anāgāmīnaṃ sakadāgāmissa tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannānanti navannaṃ sekkhapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1191_0: Nettiyaṃ pana arahattaphalaṃpi saupādisesanibbānanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha nādhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1191_1: Etthaca maggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ khayo saupādi sesaṃnāma. Cuti anantare khandhānaṃ anuppādo
anya-e0301n0:1191_2: anupādisesaṃnāma. Yasmā pana paṭisandhivandhānāma kilesesu satieva jāyanti. Asati
anya-e0301n0:1191_3: najāyanti, tasmā tepi kilesakkhayena saheva khiyyanti. Yāvacutiyā pavattamānaṃ paccuppannakhandhasantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1191_4: pana khīṇāsavassapi purimabhave pavattakammakilesānaṃ phalanisandabhūtaṃ sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1191_5: dhamma tāsiddhaṃ. Tasmā taṃ khīṇesupi kilesesu yāvacutiyā pavatta tiyeva. Cutikkhaṇe
anya-e0301n0:1191_6: tassa nirodhopi dhammatānirodho eva. Yo pana tadanantare punabhavassa anuppādo. So
anya-e0301n0:1191_7: kilesakkhayena saheva siddho. Na kevalaṃ tadanantare puna bhavasseva. Tato paraṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1191_8: anamatagga saṃsāre bhavaparaṃparāya anuppādopi tena saheva siddho. Sabbañcetaṃ ekameva
anya-e0301n0:1191_9: nibbānaṃ. Evaṃsantepi khandhāvasesassa bhāvā bhāvalesaṃ upādāya ayaṃ bhedo vuttoti
anya-e0301n0:1191_10: vuttaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyenāti duvidha paññāpanassa kāraṇalesenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1192_0: Yasmā pana saṅkhatadhammānāma sapalibodhadhammattā nānāpalibodhehi niccakālaṃ janaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1192_1: pīḷenti. Santasukhaṃnāma laddhuṃ nadenti. Sanimitta dhammattāca kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnañca
anya-e0301n0:1192_2: sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ vatthu bhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Sapaṇihitadhammattāca sabbadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1192_3: mūlabhūtaṃ āsādukkhaṃnāma niccakālaṃpi janenti. Tasmā tappaṭipakkhasiddhena guṇabhedena
anya-e0301n0:1192_4: tividhaṃbhedaṃ dassetuṃ suññatantiādi māha. Tattha sabbapalibodha vivittattā suññataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1192_5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā hi sati bālānaṃ yattakā pāpakammapalibodhā apāya dukkhapalibodhāca
anya-e0301n0:1192_6: sandissanti. Paṇḍitānaṃca tato attānaṃ rakkhanatthaṃ yattakā kalyāṇakammapalibodhā
anya-e0301n0:1192_7: sandissanti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhinirodhoyeva sabbe te sakkāyadiṭṭhimūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1192_8: sakkoti. Na vinā tena añño koci. Tasmā sonirodho tehi palibodhehi vivitto hoti, tathā
anya-e0301n0:1192_9: rāgakkhayoyeva rāgamūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkoti. Na vinā tena añño koci. Dosakkhayoyeva
anya-e0301n0:1192_10: dosamūlake. Mohakkhayoyeva mohamūlaketiādi vattabbaṃ. Iti nibbānaṃ sabbapali bodhehi
anya-e0301n0:1193_0: Nimittaṃ vuccati uppādapavattamūlako oḷārikākāro. Yena samannāgatā saṅkhatadhammā
anya-e0301n0:1193_1: sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇānañca vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Tathā sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1193_2: sabbesaṃ verānaṃ sabbesaṃ rogādi anatthānaṃ vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Yato te
anya-e0301n0:1193_3: māradheyyātipi maccudheyyātipi vuccanti. Kāla disā desa santānādi bhedena hīnapaṇītādi
anya-e0301n0:1193_4: bhedenaca bhedaṃ gacchanti. Nibbānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ nimittadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1193_5: siddhattā natthi. Tasmiṃ nimittanti animittaṃ. Tañhi sabbesaṃ kile sādīnaṃ anatthānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1193_6: vatthubhūte nimittadhamme viddhaṃsetvā tesaṃ anatthānaṃ abhāvaṃ sādhentaṃ niccaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1193_7: tiṭṭhati. Naca taṃ kālabhedena bhinnaṃ hoti. Idaṃ atīte asukakappe asukabuddhassa
anya-e0301n0:1193_8: nibbānaṃ, idaṃ anāgate, idaṃ etarahīti. Nāpi disābhedena bhinnaṃ. Idaṃ dasasu disāsu
anya-e0301n0:1193_9: asukāyanāma disāya nibbānaṃ, idaṃ asukāya nāmāti. Nacāpi desabhedenavā santānabhedenavā
anya-e0301n0:1193_10: bhinnaṃ. Idaṃ manussaloke idaṃ devaloke idaṃ brahmaloketi vā idaṃ manussānaṃ idaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1193_11: devānaṃ idaṃ brahmānantivāti. Tathā paṇītādi bhedena bhinnaṃ na hoti. Idaṃ sabbaññubuddhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1194_0: Paṇihitaṃ, paṇidhānaṃ, paṇidhi, patthanā, āsā, jīghacchā, pipāsāti atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1194_1: Saṅkhatadhammāca labbhamānāpi bhijjanadhammattā punappunaṃ laddhuṃ āsā dukkhaṃnāma
anya-e0301n0:1194_2: vaḍḍhenti. Āsādukkhassa pariyantonāma natthi. Sabbañca dukkhaṃ āsāmūlakaṃ hoti. Āsāsadisaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1194_3: dukkhanidānaṃnāma natthi, nibbānaṃ pana sayaṃ pipāsavinayadhammattā āsāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1194_4: sabbaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃvā chandapaṇidhiṃvā vinentaṃ vidhamentaṃ vattatīti natthi. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1194_5: paṇihitanti appaṇīhitaṃ. Etthaca duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitasukhaṃ santisukhanti. Tattha
anya-e0301n0:1194_6: manussa dibba brahma sampattiyo labhitvā anubhavanavasena pavattaṃ pītisomanassa
anya-e0301n0:1194_7: sukhaṃ vedayitasukhaṃnāma. Taṃ pana khaṇekhaṇe vijjuviya bhijjanadhammaṃ. Sampattiyoca
anya-e0301n0:1194_8: aniccadhammā. Sabbe te apariyantaṃ āsādukkhaṃ bhiyyo vaḍḍhentiyeva. Tasmā sabbaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1194_9: vedayitasukhaṃnāma āsā dukkhajanakattā ekantena dukkhameva hoti. Yathāha-yaṃkiñci
anya-e0301n0:1194_10: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti. Dhammasenāpatināca katamaṃ taṃ āvuso sāriputta
anya-e0301n0:1194_11: nibbāne sukhaṃ, yadettha vedayitaṃ natthīti puṭṭhena etadevettha āvuso nibbāne sukhaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1194_12: yadettha vedayitaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ. Santisukhaṃnāma attani uppannānaṃvā uppajjituṃ
anya-e0301n0:1194_13: paccupaṭṭhi tānaṃvā kilesādīnaṃ apāyadukkhādīnañca attano sammāpayogaṃ paṭicca vimuccanasukhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1194_14: Etadevettha ekantasukhaṃ acalasukhaṃ. Etasmiñhi asati puthujjanānaṃ manussa dibbabrahmasampattiyo
anya-e0301n0:1194_15: anubhavantānaṃpi avassaṃ pattabbaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhitāneva honti aviciniraya bhayādīnīti.
anya-e0301n0:1194_16: Tasmā sabbassa vedayitasukhamūlakassa āsādukkhassa santisukhadīpakaṃ idaṃ appaṇihitapadaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_0: Ākāra bhedenāti tividhassa suññatādikassa guṇakoṭṭhāsassa bhedena. Etthaca yadetaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_1: anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ anusayitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva
anya-e0301n0:1195_2: nirujjhanaṃ khiyyanaṃ. Taṃ khayadhātu nirodhadhātu saṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_3: Ekā dhammadhātu hoti. Eko paramatthadhammo hoti. Khayaṭṭhena nirodhaṭṭhena sabhāvato
anya-e0301n0:1195_4: vijjamānattā, na hi taṃ paññattirūpaṃ hoti. Kāye ñāṇeca sarūpato upaladdhattā, duvidhañhi
anya-e0301n0:1195_6: ussahati. Ussahitvā tuleti. Tulayitvā padahati. Pahitatto samāno kāyenaceva paramatthasaccaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_7: sacchikaroti. Paññāyaca taṃ paṭivijjha passatīti. Tattha anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_8: niccaṃ santāpetvā paridayhitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva nirujjhanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_9: nibbāyanaṃ kāyasacchikaraṇaṃnāma. Evaṃ kāyena sacchikatvā puna paccavekkhanto ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_10: taṃ nirujjhanaṃ ñāṇena paccakkhato passati. Niruddhā me kilesāti jānāti, idaṃ ñāṇasacchikaraṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1195_11: Tesu kāya sacchikaraṇaṃ anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepeti. Ñāṇasacchikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1195_12: anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādeti. Paññattidhammesu eva rūpaṃ sacchikaraṇaṃnāma natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_13: Tassa pana nirujjhanassa suññatadhammattā mandabuddhīnaṃ tasmiṃ tucchasaññā niratthakasaññā
anya-e0301n0:1195_14: saṇṭhāti. Animitta dhammattā tasmiṃ abhāvamattasaññā paramatthato avijjamānasaññā
anya-e0301n0:1195_15: saṇṭhāti. Appaṇihitadhammattā taṇhāvasikā janā tasmiṃ sukhaṃ nāma kiñci natthīti maññanti.
anya-e0301n0:1196_0: Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhamattaṃ nibbānaṃnāma nahoti. Tañhi abhāvamattaṃ paññattirūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1196_1: hoti. Nibbānañcanāma gambhīrādīnaṃ anantaguṇānaṃ vatthu hoti, naca abhāvamattaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1196_2: vatthu bhavituṃ arahati. Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ. Naca abhāvamatte kiñci
anya-e0301n0:1196_3: sukhaṃnāma sakkāladdhuṃ. Tasmā yo tassa khayanirodhassa paccayo atthi. Yassaca ānubhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1196_4: so khayanirodho sijjhati. Eta deva nibbānaṃ nāmāti icchanti. Tesaṃpi vaṭṭadukkha
anya-e0301n0:1196_5: santito atirekapayojanaṃnāma nalabbhati. Nibbānassaca guṇapadāni nāma anantānaṃ vaṭṭadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1196_6: paṭipakkhavasena sijjhanti, no aññathā. Tasmā yattakāni aguṇapadāni vaṭṭadhammesu
anya-e0301n0:1196_7: labbhanti, tattakāni tesaṃ khaya nirodhe anantāni guṇapadāni hutvā sijjhanti. Yo
anya-e0301n0:1196_8: khayanirodhopi tāva visuṃ dhammabhāvenaviññātuṃ dukkarogambhīro hoti. Yato taṃ abhāvamattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1196_9: paññattirūpaṃ maññanti. Guṇapadānaṃ panassa gambhīrabhāve vattabbamevanatthi. Santisukhañca
anya-e0301n0:1196_10: nāma vaṭṭadukkhānaṃ vūpasantatāeva. Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti hi vuttaṃ. Vūpasantatātica
anya-e0301n0:1196_11: tesaṃ sabbaso khayanirodhoevāti vaṭṭadukkhapariyāpannānaṃ sabba vedayītasukhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1196_12: ukkaṃsagatā tassa khayanirodhassa paramasukhatā siddhā hotīti. Tassa pana paramatthato
anya-e0301n0:1197_0: Atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ. No ce taṃ bhikkhave abhavissa ajātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1197_1: abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, na yimassa jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1197_2: paññāyetha. Yasmāca kho bhikkhave atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa
anya-e0301n0:1198_0: Tattha ajānanaṃ ajātaṃ. Jātikkhayoti attho. Abhavanaṃ abhūtaṃ. Abhāvoti attho. Akaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1198_1: akataṃ. Asaṅkharaṇaṃ asaṅkhataṃ. Uppādetuṃvā pavattetuṃvā saṅkhāradukkhassa abhāvoti
anya-e0301n0:1198_2: attho. Jātikkhayotivā visuṃ ekā dhammadhātu hoti. Tasmā visuṃ dhammabhāvaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:1198_3: natthi jātaṃ etthāti ajātantīpi yujjatiyeva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, saṅkhatadhammānāma
anya-e0301n0:1198_4: paccaye sati jāyanti. Asati na jāyantīti jātaṃ viya ajātaṃpi tesaṃ atthi. Paramatthato
anya-e0301n0:1198_5: vijjamānaṃ hotīti attho. Yadica ajātaṃnāma natthi, jātameva atthi. Evaṃsati attani
anya-e0301n0:1198_6: kilesānaṃ ajātatthāya sammā paṭipajjantānaṃpi sabbe kilesadhammā jātāyeva siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1198_7: No ajātā. Kasmā, ajātassanāma natthitāyāti. Esanayo sabbesu duccaritadhammesu apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhesu,
anya-e0301n0:1198_8: diṭṭhadhammeca sabbesu rogābādhabhayupaddavesu. Evañca sati loke sabbe purisakārā
anya-e0301n0:1198_9: purisathāmā purisaparakkamā niratthakā eva siyunti imamatthaṃ sandhāya no cetaṃ bhikkhave.La.
anya-e0301n0:1198_10: Paññāyethāti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana ajātaṃnāma ekantena atthiyeva. Tasmā attani ajātatthāya
anya-e0301n0:1198_11: sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ te ekantena najāyanti. Evaṃ sati sabbe purisakārā purisathāmā
anya-e0301n0:1198_12: purisaparakkamā satthakā eva hontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya yasmāca kho bhikkhavetiādi
anya-e0301n0:1198_13: vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā avijjānirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho. Saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho.La.
anya-e0301n0:1198_14: Dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evaṃ vuttassa nirodhassa paramatthato vijjamānabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1198_15: dasseti. Atthi saddassa vijjamānatthavacanattā. Tattha nirodho duvidho jātanirodho
anya-e0301n0:1198_16: ajātanirodhoti. Tattha uppajjitvā nirodho jātanirodhonāma. Maccūtica maraṇantica
anya-e0301n0:1198_17: etassevanāmaṃ. Ajjhattapariyā pannānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ uppādassapi sabbaso abhāvo ajāta
anya-e0301n0:1198_18: nironāma. Yo sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbupadhinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānanti
anya-e0301n0:1198_19: vuccati. Ayamidhādhippeto, ayameva hi sabbapalibodhehi suññattā suññatonāma. Kilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1198_20: jārāmaraṇādīnañca vatthubhūtassa nimittassa abhāvā animittonāma. Sabbadukkhānaṃ nidānabhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:1198_21: āsādukkhassa abhāvā appaṇihitonāma. Tena vuttaṃ suññataṃanimittaṃ appaṇihitañceti
anya-e0301n0:1198_22: tividhaṃ hotīti. Padantiādi nibbānassa vevacanāni. Tañhi visuṃ asaṃmisso kevalo upalabbhamāno
anya-e0301n0:1198_23: eko paramattha dhammoti padaṃ nāma. Koṭṭhāsattho hi padasaddo. Yathā padaso dhammaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1198_24: vāceyyāti. Cavanābhāvena accutaṃ. Pubbantāparante atikkamma pavattattā accantaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1198_25: Saṅkharaṇakiccarahitattā asaṅkhataṃ. Attano uttaritarassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvato
anya-e0301n0:1198_26: anuttaranti. Vānamuttā taṇhā vimuttā, mahante sīlakkhandhādike dhamme esiṃsu adhigacchiṃsūti mahesayo, buddhā.
anya-e0301n0:1203_0: 162. Evaṃ chahi paricchedehi cattāro paramatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṃ taṃtaṃrāsisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1203_1: samuccayaṃ dassento ādigātha māha. Ye salakkhaṇā dvāsattatividhā vatthudhammā mayā
anya-e0301n0:1203_2: vuttā. Idāni tesaṃ samuccayaṃ yathāyogaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā. Tattha salakkhaṇāvatthudhammāti
anya-e0301n0:1203_3: padehi dasavidhāni anipphannarūpāni paṭikkhipati. Na hi tāni attano āvenikabhūtena
anya-e0301n0:1203_4: sabhāva lakkhaṇena aniccatādi sāmaññalakkhaṇenaca salakkhaṇāni honti. Ekantaparamatthatāya
anya-e0301n0:1203_5: abhāvato. Tatoyevaca vatthudhammāca nahonti. Sarūpato anupalabbhamānattā. Dabbavācako
anya-e0301n0:1203_6: hi idha vatthusaddo. Dabbañcanāma idha sarūpato labbhamāno sabhāvo eva. Etena nibbānassapi
anya-e0301n0:1203_7: maggaphala paccavekkhanañāṇesu sarūpato labbhamāna sabhāvatā vuttā hoti. Anipphannarūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1203_8: viya ca vatthudhamma sannissayena dissamānadhammamattabhāvaṃ vā paññattidhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1203_9: viya parikappitākāramattabhāvaṃvā sasavisāṇa kacchapalomādīnaṃ viya sabbaso abhūta
anya-e0301n0:1203_10: parikappita mattabhāvaṃvā nivāretīti veditabbaṃ. Etthaca dvāsattatividhāsalakkhaṇāvatthudhammāti
anya-e0301n0:1203_11: vacane payojanaṃ nadissati. Tesu hi dvāsattatividhesu ekacce eva dhammā purimesu
anya-e0301n0:1203_12: tīsu saṅgahesu āgatā. Pacchimeca sabbasaṅgahe anipphannarūpānipi adhippetānievāti.
anya-e0301n0:1203_13: Etthaca vatthudhammāsalakkhaṇāti padehi anipphannarūpānaṃ salakkhaṇatā paṭikkhipane
anya-e0301n0:1203_14: yaṃ vattabbaṃ. Taṃ rūpasamuddesa dīpaniyaṃ vuttamevāti. Ekantākusalajātiyānaṃ āsava
anya-e0301n0:1203_15: catukkādīnaṃ saṅgaho akusalasaṅgaho, na akusala sampayuttattāyeva akusalabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1204_0: Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, bujjhanti etāyāti katvā. Bodhiyā pakkhā bodhipakkhā.
anya-e0301n0:1204_1: Bodhisambhārāti attho. Bodhi pakkhesu bhavā antogadhāti bodhipakkhiyā. Tesaṃ saṅgahoti
anya-e0301n0:1204_2: bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho. Sabbesaṃ anavasesānaṃ paramatthadhammānaṃ saṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:1204_3: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madaniyaṭṭhenaca āsava sadisattā āsavā. Yadica tadubhayaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n0:1204_4: āsavānāma siyuṃ. Ime lobhādayo eva āsavānāma siyuṃ. Pupphāsavādayo hi loke cha pañca
anya-e0301n0:1204_5: rattimattaṃ vā sattaṭṭharattimattaṃ vā sayaṃpi kumbhesu parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti. Kumbheca
anya-e0301n0:1204_6: parivāsaṃ gāhāpenti. Ime pana anamatagge saṃsāre sayaṃpi sattasantāne parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1204_7: Sattasantānañca parivāsaṃ gāhāpenti. Sakalaṃ sattasantānaṃ sadā āsavapūritameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1204_8: Yathāha-cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati. Ettha
anya-e0301n0:1204_9: nivīsamānā nivīsatītiādi. Tattha esā taṇhā pariyuṭṭhānavasena uppajjamānā ettheva
anya-e0301n0:1204_10: uppajjati. Uppajjitvāca puna anusayabhāvena parivāsaṃ katvā nivīsamānā ettheva nivīsatīti
anya-e0301n0:1204_11: attho. Yāvaca ariyamaggadhovanaṃ nalabbhati. Tāva santānaṃ gūthapūritakūpaṃ viya
anya-e0301n0:1204_12: dubbisodhaṃ katvā pavattati. Pupphāsavādayoca madaṃ janentā muhuttameva janenti.
anya-e0301n0:1204_13: Ime pana yāva ariyamaggaṃ nalabhati. Tāva niccamadaṃ janenti. Tasmā ekantena imeyeva
anya-e0301n0:1204_14: cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madani yaṭṭhenaca āsavānāma bhavituṃ arahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1205_0: Visandanaṭṭhenavā āsavasadisattā āsavā, yathā hi kudhita kuṭṭhino mahāvaṇamukhehi
anya-e0301n0:1205_1: yūsasaṅkhāto āsavo visanditvā pilotikakhaṇḍāni dūseti, evaṃ imepi chahidvārehi visanditvā
anya-e0301n0:1205_2: chaḷārammaṇānidūsentīti. Āyataṃvā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savantipasavanti vaḍḍhentīti āsavā.
anya-e0301n0:1205_3: Athavā, bhavato ābhavaggā dhammato āgotratumhā savanti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti
anya-e0301n0:1205_4: āsavā. Āsaddassa avadhiatthajotakattā. Avadhica duvidho mariyādavisayo abhividhivisayocāti
anya-e0301n0:1205_5: tattha yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ bahikatvā pavattati. So mariyādavisayo
anya-e0301n0:1205_6: nāma. Yathā āpātaliputtā devo vuṭṭhoti. Yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1205_7: byāpetvā anto katvā pavattati, so abhividhivisayonāma. Yathā ābrahmalokā bhagavato
anya-e0301n0:1205_8: kittisaddo abbhuggatoti. Idha pana abhividhivisayo daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā bhavaggañca gotrabhuñca
anya-e0301n0:1205_9: byāpetvā anto katvā savantīti attho veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1207_0: Avadhica mariyādaabhividhivasena duvidhoti vatvā puna taṃ vibhāvento “tattha āpātaliputtā
anya-e0301n0:1207_1: devo vuṭṭhotiādīsuviya kriyaṃ bahikatvā pavatto mariyādo. Ābhavaggāsaddo abbhuggatotiādīsuviya
anya-e0301n0:1207_2: kriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhī”ti vadati. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1208_0: Na hi avavidhivisayabhūto bhavaggo lokattayabyāpakaṃ saddassa abbhuggamanakriyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1208_1: byāpetvā pavattati. Naca avadhibhūto attho kriyaṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti
anya-e0301n0:1208_2: yutto. Kriyāeva pana taṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti yutto. Evañca katvā mūlaṭīkāyaṃ-duvidhohi
anya-e0301n0:1208_3: avadhi abhividhivisayo anabhividhivisayoca. Abhividhivisayaṃ kriyābyāpetvā pavattati,
anya-e0301n0:1208_4: ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso gatoti. Itaraṃ bahikatvā, āpātaliputtā vuṭṭho devoti. Kāmeti
anya-e0301n0:1208_5: icchatīti kāmo. Soeva āsavoti kāmāsavo. Kāmīyativā oḷārikena kāmena icchīyatīti kāmo.
anya-e0301n0:1208_6: Pañcakāmaguṇamukhena desito sabbo kāmāvacaradhammo. Idha pana taṃ nāmena tadārammaṇā
anya-e0301n0:1208_7: taṇhāeva adhippetā, kāmoeva āsavoti kāmāsavo. Kāmāvacaradhammesu assādanābhinandana
anya-e0301n0:1208_8: vasena pavatto kāmarāgo. Therena pana ayamatthova icchito. Vakkhati hi kāmabhava
anya-e0301n0:1210: Purimatthova vutto. So anupapanno, theramatānugatassa idhādhippetassa atthassa avuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:1211_0: Bhavāsavoti ettha duvidho bhavo kammabhavo upapattibhavo ca. Tattha mahaggatakusaladhammā
anya-e0301n0:1211_1: kammabhavo. Taṃnibbattā vipāka dhammā upapattibhavo. Idhapi bhavasaddena tadārammaṇā
anya-e0301n0:1211_2: taṇhāeva adhippetā. Bhavoeva āsavoti bhavāsavo. Tasmiṃ duvidhe bhave nikantivasena
anya-e0301n0:1213: “Sassata diṭṭhisahagatoca rāgo ettheva saṅgayhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1214_0: Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigata vippayutta lobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjatīti hi
anya-e0301n0:1214_1: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttaṃ. Yattha pana kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti āgataṃ. Tattheva
anya-e0301n0:1214_2: sassatadiṭṭhi sahagato rāgo yākāci kusalākusala kammabhavanikanti yākāci upapattibhavapatthanā.
anya-e0301n0:1214_3: Sabbā bhavataṇhāyaṃ saṅgahitāti yuttā. Idha pana yathāvuttaṃ bhavāsavaṃ thapetvā
anya-e0301n0:1214_4: sabbo lobho kāmāsave eva saṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1217_0: Yākāci diṭṭhi diṭṭhāsavo. Yokoci moho avijjāsavo. Ettha siyā, kasmā ime eva āsavāti
anya-e0301n0:1217_1: vuttā. Nanu aññepi mānādayo cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhādiyuttā eva hontīti. Saccaṃ. Imesu
anya-e0301n0:1217_2: pana kāmāsave parivuṭṭhe sati sabbekāmavisayā mānādayo parivuṭṭhāeva honti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1217_3: vimutte vimuttāeva, tathā bhavāsave parivuṭṭhe sati bhavavisayā. Diṭṭhāsaveca parivuṭṭhe
anya-e0301n0:1217_4: sati diṭṭhivisayāti. Avijjāpana tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃpi mūlabhūtāti. Iti ime eva pārivāsiyaṭṭhādīsu
anya-e0301n0:1217_5: padhānabhūtā honti. Itare pana tadanubandhamattāeva sampajjantīti na te āsavāti visuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1217_6: vattuṃ arahantīti. Attani patitaṃ janaṃ anassāsikaṃ katvā ajjhottha ranto hanati
anya-e0301n0:1217_7: māretīti ogho. Pakatimahogho. Tathā avahananaṭṭhena duttaraṭṭhenaca oghasadisāti
anya-e0301n0:1217_8: oghā. Yadica avahaññanaṭṭheca duttaraṭṭhenaca oghānāma siyuntiādiko pasaṅgo mānādīnañca
anya-e0301n0:1218_0: Vaṭṭasmiṃvā bhavayantakevā satte yojentīti yogā. Bhavantaracutiyā saha bhavantarapaṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1218_1: gantenti ghaṭentīti ganthā. Abhijjhāti sabbassa rāgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā rūpārūpa
anya-e0301n0:1218_2: rāgāpi ettha saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Byāpādotipi sabbo doso eva. Idaṃ saccāti nivesoti
anya-e0301n0:1218_3: idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti pavatto micchābhiniveso. Vaṭṭadukkhato vimuttiyā amaggabhūtaṃyeva
anya-e0301n0:1218_4: gosīlagovatādikaṃ parato āmasanaṃ tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇaṃ sīlabbataparāmāso.
anya-e0301n0:1218_5: Etthaca paratoti bhūtasabhāvapaccanikatoti attho. Kāyasaddo pana sabbattha rūpakāye
anya-e0301n0:1218_6: nāmakāyeca pavattoti atitakāyena paccuppanna kāyaṃ paccuppannakāyenaca anāgatakāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1218_7: gantheti ghaṭetīti kāyagantho. Athavā, kāye gaṇṭhoti kāyagaṇṭho. Ajjhatta gaṇṭhoti
anya-e0301n0:1218_8: attho. Nigaṇṭhonāṭaputtotiādīsuviya gaṇṭhasaddo gaṇṭhiyaṃ pavatto. Bhusaṃ ādiyanti
anya-e0301n0:1218_9: amuñcanagāhaṃ gaṇhantīti upādānāni. Kilesabhūto kāmoeva upādānaṃ kāmu pādānaṃ. Vatthubhūtaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1219_0: Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo tividha mahādiṭṭhiyo aññāpivā sāsane lokeca sandissamānā viparītagāhabhūtā
anya-e0301n0:1219_1: diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Yathāgahitaṃvā purimadiṭṭhiṃ idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
anya-e0301n0:1219_2: upādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Goṇakukkurādīnaṃ taṃtaṃpakaticārittaṃ sīlaṃ nāma. Tameva
anya-e0301n0:1219_3: suṭṭhuṃ samādinnaṃ vataṃnāma. Tadubhayaṃ saṃsāramuttiyā maggoti daḷhagahaṇaṃ sīlabbatu
anya-e0301n0:1219_4: pādānaṃ nāma. Attavādupādānanti ettha attā vuccati parikappabuddhiyā gahito ekekasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1219_5: satta santāne padhānissaro. Yaṃ lokiyamahājanā sattotivā puggalotivā jīvotivā tathāgatotivā
anya-e0301n0:1219_6: lokotivā sañjānanti. Yañca nānātitthiyā issaranimmitaṃvā adhiccasamuppannaṃvā accantasassataṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1219_7: ekaccasassataṃvā ucchedaṃvā paññapentīti. Taṃ attānaṃ abhivadanticeva upādiyantica
anya-e0301n0:1219_8: sattā etenāti attavā dupādānaṃ. Vīsatividhā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Tattha abhivadantīti visiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1219_9: padhānaṃ katvā vadanti. Upādiyantīti daḷhaṃ ādiyanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1220_0: Tattha katamā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Idha assutavā puthujjano rūpaṃ attato samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1220_1: Rūpavantaṃvā attānaṃ. Attani vā rūpaṃ. Rūpasmiṃvā attānaṃ. Vedanaṃ attato samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1220_2: Vedanāvantaṃvā attānaṃ. Attanivā vedanaṃ. Vedanāpavā attānaṃ. Saññaṃ. Saṅkhāre. Viññāṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_0: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti rūpameva attāti gaṇhāti. Rūpavantaṃvā attānanti
anya-e0301n0:1221_1: attā me rūpavāti gaṇhāti. Attani vā rūpanti attānaṃ paṭicca rūpaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_2: Rūpasmiṃvā attānanti rūpaṃ paṭicca attā tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti. Kathaṃ rūpakāyaṃ uddissa
anya-e0301n0:1221_3: ajja ahaṃ thaddhomhīti vā ajja ahaṃ mudukomhītivā vadanto pathavi saṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1221_4: attato samanupassatināma. Ajja mama kāyo thaddhotivā mudūtivā vadanto sesadhammevā
anya-e0301n0:1221_5: dhammamuttakaṃvā attānaṃ gahetvā taṃ attānaṃ pathavīvantaṃ samanupassatināma. Ajja
anya-e0301n0:1221_6: thaddhabhāvovā mudubhāvovā mayi jātoti vadanto attani pathaviṃsa manupassatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_7: Ajjāhaṃ thaddhabhāve ṭhitomhi mudubhāve ṭhito mhīti vadantopathavimhi attānaṃ samanussatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_8: Ayaṃ pathavimhi caturāvatthikāya saṃkkāyadiṭṭhiyā pavattākāro. Sesesu sattavīsatirūpesu
anya-e0301n0:1221_9: yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbo. Ahaṃ marāmi marissāmītiādinā hi aniccatāyaṃpi sādiṭṭhi pavattatiyeva.
